Sentence: Le score reste serré jusqu'à la dernière minute.
Sentence_IPA: /lə skɔʁ ʁɛst se.ʁe ʒys.ka la dɛʁ.njɛʁ mi.nyt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh skor rest say-RAY zhus-kah lah dair-NYEHR mee-newt
Sentence_Translation: The score stays tight until the last minute.

Sentence: Le jeu est facile au début,puis dur.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ʒø ɛ fa.sil o de.by pɥi dyʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh zhuh eh fah-SEEL oh day-BEW pwee deur
Sentence_Translation: The game is easy at first,then hard.

Sentence: La règle est simple,mais il oublie toujours.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁɛɡl ɛ sɛ̃pl mɛ il u.bli tu.ʒuʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah regl eh sehnpl meh eel oo-BLEE too-ZHOOR
Sentence_Translation: The rule is simple,but he always forgets.

Sentence: Il veut gagner ce soir,alors il s'entraîne.
Sentence_IPA: /il vø ɡa.ɲe sə swaʁ a.lɔʁ il sɑ̃.tʁɛn/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: eel vuh gah-NYAY suh swar ah-LOR eel sahn-TREN
Sentence_Translation: He wants to win tonight,so he trains.

Sentence: Je déteste perdre,mais j'apprends à rester calme.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə de.tɛst pɛʁdʁ mɛ ʒa.pʁɑ̃ a ʁɛs.te kalm/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh day-TEST pair-druh meh zhah-PRAHN ah res-TAY calm
Sentence_Translation: I hate losing,but I learn to stay calm.

Sentence: Je vais essayer encore,même si c'est difficile.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vɛ e.sɛ.je ɑ̃.kɔʁ mɛm si sɛ di.fi.sil/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh veh ess-eh-YAY ahn-KOR mem see seh dee-fee-SEEL
Sentence_Translation: I’m going to try again,even if it’s difficult.

Sentence: Il veut réussir sans stress avant la fin.
Sentence_IPA: /il vø ʁe.y.siʁ sɑ̃ stʁɛs a.vɑ̃ la fɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: eel vuh ray-ew-SEER sahn stress ah-VAHN lah fehn
Sentence_Translation: He wants to succeed without stress before the end.

Sentence: La fin arrive vite,alors je profite.
Sentence_IPA: /la fɛ̃ a.ʁiv vit a.lɔʁ ʒə pʁɔ.fit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah fehn ah-REEV veet ah-LOR zhuh proh-FEET
Sentence_Translation: The end comes quickly,so I make the most of it.

Sentence: Au début je comprends peu,puis mieux ensuite.
Sentence_IPA: /o de.by ʒə kɔ̃.pʁɑ̃ pø pɥi mjø ɑ̃.sɥit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: oh day-BEW zhuh kon-prahn puh pwee myuh ahn-sweet
Sentence_Translation: At first I understand little,then better later.

Sentence: La partie est courte,mais on s'amuse bien.
Sentence_IPA: /la paʁ.ti ɛ kuʁt mɛ ɔ̃ sa.myz bjɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah par-TEE eh koort meh ohn sah-mewz byehn
Sentence_Translation: The game is short,but we have fun.

Sentence: Je garde une place libre pour toi ce soir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ɡaʁd yn plas libʁ puʁ twa sə swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh gard een plass leebr poor twah suh swar
Sentence_Translation: I keep a free seat for you tonight.

Sentence: Assieds-toi à côté de moi,s'il te plaît.
Sentence_IPA: /a.sjɛ twa a ko.te də mwa sil tə plɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah-syeh twah ah koh-TAY duh mwah seel tuh pleh
Sentence_Translation: Sit next to me,please.

Sentence: Dans le coin,il y a une vieille lampe.
Sentence_IPA: /dɑ̃ lə kwɛ̃ il j a yn vjɛj lɑ̃p/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: dahn luh kwehn eel y ah een vyeh-y lahmp
Sentence_Translation: In the corner,there is an old lamp.
Sentence_Breakdown: Dans|in|Prep|/dɑ̃/|dahn;le(Art)|the|Art|/lə/|luh;coin(le)|corner|Noun|/kwɛ̃/|kwehn;il y a|there is|Expr|/il j a/|eel y ah;une(Art)|a|Art|/yn/|een;vieille|old|Adj|/vjɛj/|vyehy;lampe(la)|lamp|Noun|/lɑ̃p/|lahmp

Sentence: Le centre du village est plein le samedi.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɑ̃tʁə dy vi.laʒ ɛ plɛ̃ lə sam.di/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh sahntr duh vee-LAZH eh plehn luh sam-DEE
Sentence_Translation: The village centre is busy on Saturday.

Sentence: La boutique ferme tôt,donc j'achète maintenant.
Sentence_IPA: /la bu.tik fɛʁm to dɔ̃k ʒa.ʃɛt mɛ̃.tə.nɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah boo-TEEK fairm toh donk zhah-SHET mehn-tuh-nahn
Sentence_Translation: The shop closes early,so I buy now.

Sentence: Ce magasin est cher,mais la qualité est bonne.
Sentence_IPA: /sə ma.ɡa.zɛ̃ ɛ ʃɛʁ mɛ la ka.li.te ɛ bɔn/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: suh mah-gah-ZEHn eh shair meh lah kah-lee-TAY eh bon
Sentence_Translation: This shop is expensive,but the quality is good.

Sentence: Le prix augmente encore,alors je compare partout.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pʁi oɡ.mɑ̃t ɑ̃.kɔʁ a.lɔʁ ʒə kɔ̃.paʁ paʁ.tu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh pree ohg-MAHNT ahn-KOR ah-LOR zhuh kon-PAR par-TOO
Sentence_Translation: The price goes up again,so I compare everywhere.

Sentence: La promotion finit ce soir,j'en profite vite.
Sentence_IPA: /la pʁɔ.mɔ.sjɔ̃ fi.ni sə swaʁ ʒɑ̃ pʁɔ.fit vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah proh-moh-SYOHN fee-NEE suh swar zhahn proh-FEET veet
Sentence_Translation: The sale ends tonight,so I take advantage quickly.

Sentence: À la caisse,je paie en espèces aujourd'hui.
Sentence_IPA: /a la kɛs ʒə pɛ ɑ̃ n‿ɛs.pɛs o.ʒuʁ.dɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah lah kess zhuh pay ahn n-ess-PESS oh-zhoor-dwee
Sentence_Translation: At the till,I pay in cash today.

Sentence: Je n'ai plus d'espèces,je paie par carte.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə n‿e ply dɛs.pɛs ʒə pɛ paʁ kaʁt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh nay plew dess-PESS zhuh pay par kart
Sentence_Translation: I’ve no cash left; I pay by card.

Sentence: Ma carte bancaire ne passe pas ici.
Sentence_IPA: /ma kaʁt bɑ̃.kɛʁ nə pas pa i.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah kart bahn-kair nuh pahss pah ee-SEE
Sentence_Translation: My bank card won’t go through here.

Sentence: Je pose le panier lourd près de la porte.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə poz lə pa.nje luʁ pʁɛ də la pɔʁt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pohz luh pah-NYAY loor preh duh lah port
Sentence_Translation: I put the heavy basket near the door.

Sentence: Le sac est trop lourd,je le porte mal.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sak ɛ tʁo luʁ ʒə lə pɔʁt mal/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh sak eh tro loor zhuh luh port mal
Sentence_Translation: The bag is too heavy; I carry it badly.

Sentence: Ce produit est utile,mais il coûte cher.
Sentence_IPA: /sə pʁɔ.dɥi ɛ y.til mɛ il kut ʃɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: suh proh-DWEE eh ew-TEEL meh eel koot shair
Sentence_Translation: This product is useful,but it costs a lot.

Sentence: La qualité compte plus que le prix parfois.
Sentence_IPA: /la ka.li.te kɔ̃t ply kə lə pʁi paʁ.fwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah kah-lee-TAY kont plew kuh luh pree par-FWAH
Sentence_Translation: Quality matters more than the price sometimes.

Sentence: Cette marque est connue,mais je compare encore.
Sentence_IPA: /sɛt maʁk ɛ kɔ.ny mɛ ʒə kɔ̃.paʁ ɑ̃.kɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: set mark eh koh-NEW meh zhuh kon-PAR ahn-KOR
Sentence_Translation: This brand is known,but I still compare.

Sentence: La taille est mauvaise,je change demain.
Sentence_IPA: /la taj ɛ mo.vɛz ʒə ʃɑ̃ʒ də.mɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah tye eh moh-vezh zhuh shah(n)zh duh-MEHN
Sentence_Translation: The size is wrong; I’ll change it tomorrow.

Sentence: Je préfère cette couleur,elle va avec tout.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁe.fɛʁ sɛt ku.lœʁ ɛl va a.vɛk tu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pray-FAIR set koo-LUR ell vah ah-VEK too
Sentence_Translation: I prefer this colour; it goes with everything.

Sentence: Un prix bas attire beaucoup de monde ici.
Sentence_IPA: /œ̃ pʁi ba a.tiʁ bo.ku də mɔ̃d i.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: uhn pree bah ah-TEER boh-KOO duh mohnd ee-SEE
Sentence_Translation: A low price attracts lots of people here.

Sentence: L'entrée est petite,mais le plat est énorme.
Sentence_IPA: /lɑ̃.tʁe ɛ pə.tit mɛ lə pla ɛ e.nɔʁm/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lahn-TRAY eh puh-TEET meh luh plah eh ay-NORM
Sentence_Translation: The starter is small,but the main is huge.

Sentence: Le plat arrive chaud,je goûte tout de suite.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pla a.ʁiv ʃo ʒə ɡut tu də sɥit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh plah ah-REEV shoh zhuh goot too duh sweet
Sentence_Translation: The dish arrives hot; I taste it straight away.
Sentence_Breakdown: Le(Art)|the|Art|/lə/|luh;plat(le)|dish|Noun|/pla/|plah;arrive|arrives|Verb|/a.ʁiv/|ah-reev;chaud|hot|Adj|/ʃo/|shoh;je(Pron)|I|Pron|/ʒə/|zhuh;goûte|taste|Verb|/ɡut/|goot;tout de suite|straight away|Adv|/tu də sɥit/|too duh sweet

Sentence: Le dessert est sucré,mais pas trop lourd.
Sentence_IPA: /lə de.sɛʁ ɛ sy.kʁe mɛ pa tʁo luʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh day-SAIR eh sew-KRAY meh pah tro loor
Sentence_Translation: The dessert is sweet,but not too heavy.

Sentence: Je pose la serviette propre sur mes genoux.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə poz la sɛʁ.vjɛt pʁɔp syʁ me ʒə.nu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pohz lah sair-VYET prop sewr may zhuh-NOO
Sentence_Translation: I put the clean napkin on my knees.

Sentence: Le verre est vide,tu peux remplir encore ?
Sentence_IPA: /lə vɛʁ ɛ vid ty pø ʁɑ̃.pliʁ ɑ̃.kɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh vair eh veed tew puh rahn-PLEER ahn-KOR
Sentence_Translation: The glass is empty; can you refill again?

Sentence: La bouteille est froide,je la garde au frigo.
Sentence_IPA: /la bu.tɛj ɛ fʁwad ʒə la ɡaʁd o fʁi.ɡo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah boo-TAY-yuh eh frwad zhuh lah gard oh free-GOH
Sentence_Translation: The bottle is cold; I keep it in the fridge.

Sentence: Dans le frigo il reste un peu de fromage.
Sentence_IPA: /dɑ̃ lə fʁi.ɡo il ʁɛst œ̃ pø də fʁɔ.maʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: dahn luh free-GOH eel rest uhn puh duh froh-MAZH
Sentence_Translation: In the fridge there’s a bit of cheese left.

Sentence: Le fromage sent fort,mais il est bon.
Sentence_IPA: /lə fʁɔ.maʒ sɑ̃ fɔʁ mɛ il ɛ bɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh froh-MAZH sahn for meh eel eh bon
Sentence_Translation: The cheese smells strong,but it’s good.

Sentence: Je mets du beurre sur le pain chaud.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɛ dy bœʁ syʁ lə pɛ̃ ʃo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh meh dew bur sewr luh pehn shoh
Sentence_Translation: I put butter on the warm bread.

Sentence: Il manque de la farine pour faire un gâteau.
Sentence_IPA: /il mɑ̃k də la fa.ʁin puʁ fɛʁ œ̃ ɡa.to/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: eel mahnk duh lah fah-REEN poor fair uhn gah-TOH
Sentence_Translation: We’re missing flour to make a cake.

Sentence: Je réduis le sucre parce que c'est trop sucré.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁe.dɥi lə sykʁ paʁs kə sɛ tʁo sy.kʁe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ray-dwee luh sew-kr pars kuh seh tro sew-KRAY
Sentence_Translation: I reduce the sugar because it’s too sweet.

Sentence: Ajoute un peu de sel,c'est meilleur ainsi.
Sentence_IPA: /a.ʒut œ̃ pø də sɛl sɛ mɛ.jœʁ ɛ̃.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah-zhoot uhn puh duh sel seh meh-YUR eh(n)-SEE
Sentence_Translation: Add a bit of salt; it’s better like this.

Sentence: La sauce est trop épaisse,je mets de l'eau.
Sentence_IPA: /la sos ɛ tʁo e.pɛs ʒə mɛ də lo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah soss eh tro ay-PESS zhuh meh duh loh
Sentence_Translation: The sauce is too thick; I add water.

Sentence: Je prends un bol chaud pour la soupe.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ bɔl ʃo puʁ la sup/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn uhn bol shoh poor lah soop
Sentence_Translation: I take a warm bowl for the soup.

Sentence: La soupe est prête,on mange en silence.
Sentence_IPA: /la sup ɛ pʁɛt ɔ̃ mɑ̃ʒ ɑ̃ si.lɑ̃s/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah soop eh pret ohn mahnzh ahn see-LAHNS
Sentence_Translation: The soup is ready; we eat quietly.

Sentence: J'ai perdu la clé,donc j'attends dehors.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe pɛʁ.dy la kle dɔ̃k ʒa.tɑ̃ də.ɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay pair-DEW lah klay donk zhah-TAHN duh-OR
Sentence_Translation: I lost the key,so I wait outside.

Sentence: La serrure bloque souvent quand il fait humide.
Sentence_IPA: /la sɛ.ʁyʁ blɔk su.vɑ̃ kɑ̃ il fɛ y.mid/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah seh-RUHR blok soo-VAHN kahn eel feh ew-MEED
Sentence_Translation: The lock often jams when it’s damp.

Sentence: La fenêtre est ouverte,mais il fait froid.
Sentence_IPA: /la f(ə).nɛtʁ ɛ u.vɛʁt mɛ il fɛ fʁwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah fuh-NETR eh oo-vert meh eel feh frwah
Sentence_Translation: The window is open,but it’s cold.

Sentence: Je tire le rideau pour cacher la lumière.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tiʁ lə ʁi.do puʁ ka.ʃe la ly.mjɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh teer luh ree-DOH poor kah-SHAY lah lew-MYEHR
Sentence_Translation: I pull the curtain to block the light.

Sentence: Le mur est sale,je le nettoie demain.
Sentence_IPA: /lə myʁ ɛ sal ʒə lə ne.twa.je də.mɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh mewr eh sahl zhuh luh net-wah-YAY duh-MEHN
Sentence_Translation: The wall is dirty; I’ll clean it tomorrow.

Sentence: Le sol est mouillé,fais attention en entrant.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɔl ɛ mu.je fɛ a.tɑ̃.sjɔ̃ ɑ̃ ɑ̃.tʁɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh sol eh moo-YAY feh ah-tahn-SYOHN ahn ahn-TRAHN
Sentence_Translation: The floor is wet; be careful coming in.

Sentence: Le plafond fuit encore quand il pleut fort.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pla.fɔ̃ fɥi ɑ̃.kɔʁ kɑ̃ il plø fɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh plah-FON fwee ahn-KOR kahn eel pluh for
Sentence_Translation: The ceiling leaks again when it rains hard.

Sentence: L'escalier est sombre,j'allume la lumière.
Sentence_IPA: /lɛs.ka.lje ɛ sɔ̃bʁ ʒa.lym la ly.mjɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: less-kah-LYAY eh sohmbr zhah-LEWM lah lew-MYEHR
Sentence_Translation: The staircase is dark; I switch on the light.

Sentence: Je rate une marche et je manque de tomber.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁat yn maʁʃ e ʒə mɑ̃k də tɔ̃.be/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh rat een marsh ay zhuh mahnk duh tom-BAY
Sentence_Translation: I miss a step and almost fall.

Sentence: L'ascenseur est en panne,on monte à pied.
Sentence_IPA: /la.sɑ̃.sœʁ ɛ ɑ̃ pan ɔ̃ mɔ̃t a pje/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah-sahn-SUR eh ahn pahn ohn mohnt ah pyeh
Sentence_Translation: The lift is out of order; we go up on foot.,le + ascenseur -> l'ascenseur

Sentence: La panne dure longtemps,donc on attend dehors.
Sentence_IPA: /la pan dyʁ lɔ̃.tɑ̃ dɔ̃k ɔ̃ na.tɑ̃ də.ɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah pahn deur lohn-TAHN donk ohn nah-TAHN duh-OR
Sentence_Translation: The breakdown lasts a long time,so we wait outside.

Sentence: La lumière clignote,je change l'ampoule demain.
Sentence_IPA: /la ly.mjɛʁ kli.ɲɔt ʒə ʃɑ̃ʒ lɑ̃.pul də.mɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah lew-MYEHR klee-NYOT zhuh shah(n)zh lahn-POOL duh-MEHN
Sentence_Translation: The light flickers; I’ll change the bulb tomorrow.

Sentence: L'ampoule est grillée,on reste dans le noir.
Sentence_IPA: /lɑ̃.pul ɛ ɡʁi.je ɔ̃ ʁɛst dɑ̃ lə nwaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lahn-pool eh gree-YAY ohn rest dahn luh nwar
Sentence_Translation: The bulb has blown; we stay in the dark.

Sentence: Dans le noir,je cherche mon téléphone doucement.
Sentence_IPA: /dɑ̃ lə nwaʁ ʒə ʃɛʁʃ mɔ̃ te.le.fɔn dus.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: dahn luh nwar zhuh shairsh mohn tay-leh-FON doos-MAHN
Sentence_Translation: In the dark,I look for my phone carefully.

Sentence: Mon téléphone vibre encore dans mon sac.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ te.le.fɔn vibʁ ɑ̃.kɔʁ dɑ̃ mɔ̃ sak/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn tay-leh-FON veebr ahn-KOR dahn mohn sak
Sentence_Translation: My phone vibrates again in my bag.

Sentence: La batterie est faible,je cherche un chargeur.
Sentence_IPA: /la ba.tʁi ɛ fɛbl ʒə ʃɛʁʃ œ̃ ʃaʁ.ʒœʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah bah-TREE eh febl zhuh shairsh uhn shar-ZHUR
Sentence_Translation: The battery is low; I’m looking for a charger.

Sentence: Mon chargeur est cassé,j'en achète un autre.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ ʃaʁ.ʒœʁ ɛ ka.se ʒɑ̃ a.ʃɛt œ̃ notʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn shar-ZHUR eh kah-SAY zhahn ah-SHET uhn nohtr
Sentence_Translation: My charger is broken; I buy another one.

Sentence: L'ordinateur démarre lentement,mais il fonctionne.
Sentence_IPA: /lɔʁ.di.na.tœʁ de.maʁ lɑ̃t.mɑ̃ mɛ il fɔ̃k.sjɔn/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lor-dee-nah-TUR day-mar lahn-tmahn meh eel fonk-SYON
Sentence_Translation: The computer starts slowly,but it works.

Sentence: L'écran est sale,je l'essuie avec un tissu.
Sentence_IPA: /le.kʁɑ̃ ɛ sal ʒə lɛ.sɥi a.vɛk œ̃ ti.sy/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lay-krahn eh sahl zhuh less-WEE ah-vek uhn tee-SEW
Sentence_Translation: The screen is dirty; I wipe it with a cloth.

Sentence: La souris ne marche plus,je change les piles.
Sentence_IPA: /la su.ʁi nə maʁʃ ply ʒə ʃɑ̃ʒ le pil/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah soo-REE nuh marsh plew zhuh shah(n)zh lay peel
Sentence_Translation: The mouse doesn’t work anymore; I change the batteries.

Sentence: Le clavier colle un peu après le café renversé.
Sentence_IPA: /lə kla.vje kɔl œ̃ pø a.pʁɛ lə ka.fe ʁɑ̃.vɛʁ.se/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh klah-VYAY koll uhn puh ah-PREH luh kah-FAY rahn-vair-SAY
Sentence_Translation: The keyboard sticks a bit after the spilled coffee.

Sentence: Cette touche ne répond plus,je tape plus fort.
Sentence_IPA: /sɛt tuʃ nə ʁe.pɔ̃ ply ʒə tap ply fɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: set toosh nuh ray-PON plew zhuh tap plew for
Sentence_Translation: This key doesn’t respond anymore; I press harder.

Sentence: J'oublie mon mot de passe presque chaque semaine.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒu.bli mɔ̃ mo də pas pʁɛsk ʃak sə.mɛn/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhoo-BLEE mohn moh duh pahss presk shak suh-men
Sentence_Translation: I forget my password almost every week.

Sentence: Le fichier est trop gros,je le compresse maintenant.
Sentence_IPA: /lə fi.ʃje ɛ tʁo ɡʁo ʒə lə kɔ̃.pʁɛs mɛ̃.tə.nɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh fee-SHYAY eh tro gro zhuh luh kon-PRESS mehn-tuh-nahn
Sentence_Translation: The file is too big; I compress it now.

Sentence: Je range ce dossier avec les autres documents importants.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁɑ̃ʒ sə dɔ.sje a.vɛk le zotʁ dɔ.ky.mɑ̃ ɛ̃.pɔʁ.tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh rahnzh suh doh-SYAY ah-vek lay zotr doh-kew-MAHN an-por-TAHN
Sentence_Translation: I file this folder with the other important documents.

Sentence: Ce document manque de détails,je demande des précisions.
Sentence_IPA: /sə dɔ.ky.mɑ̃ mɑ̃k də de.taj ʒə də.mɑ̃d de pʁe.si.zjɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: suh doh-kew-MAHN mahnk duh day-tye zhuh duh-MAHND day pray-see-ZYOHN
Sentence_Translation: This document lacks detail; I ask for clarifications.

Sentence: L'imprimante fait du bruit et bloque le papier.
Sentence_IPA: /lɛ̃.pʁi.mɑ̃t fɛ dy bʁɥi e blɔk lə pa.pje/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: leh(n)-pree-MAHNT feh dew brwee ay blok luh pah-PYAY
Sentence_Translation: The printer makes noise and jams the paper.

Sentence: La page se charge mal sur ce réseau lent.
Sentence_IPA: /la paʒ sə ʃaʁʒ mal syʁ sə ʁe.zo lɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah pazh suh sharzh mal sewr suh ray-ZOH lahn
Sentence_Translation: The page loads badly on this slow network.

Sentence: Le réseau tombe souvent le soir dans mon quartier.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ʁe.zo tɔ̃b su.vɑ̃ lə swaʁ dɑ̃ mɔ̃ kaʁ.tje/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh ray-ZOH tohmb soo-VAHN luh swar dahn mohn kar-TYAY
Sentence_Translation: The network often goes down in the evening in my area.

Sentence: La connexion est stable,donc je continue l'appel.
Sentence_IPA: /la kɔ.nɛk.sjɔ̃ ɛ stab(l) dɔ̃k ʒə kɔ̃.ti.ny la.pɛl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah koh-neck-SYOHN eh stabl donk zhuh kon-tee-NEW lah-PELL
Sentence_Translation: The connection is stable,so I continue the call.

Sentence: Le bouton reste bloqué,je redémarre l'appareil.
Sentence_IPA: /lə bu.tɔ̃ ʁɛst blɔ.ke ʒə ʁə.de.maʁ l‿a.pa.ʁɛj/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh boo-TON rest bloh-KAY zhuh ruh-day-MAR lah-pah-RAY
Sentence_Translation: The button stays stuck; I restart the device.

Sentence: L'appareil chauffe trop,alors je l'éteins vite.
Sentence_IPA: /la.pa.ʁɛj ʃof tʁo a.lɔʁ ʒə le.tɛ̃ vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah-pah-RAY shoff tro ah-LOR zhuh lay-TEHN veet
Sentence_Translation: The device gets too hot,so I turn it off quickly.

Sentence: La prise est loin,j'utilise une rallonge.
Sentence_IPA: /la pʁiz ɛ lwɛ̃ ʒy.ti.liz yn ʁa.lɔ̃ʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah preez eh lwehn zhew-tee-LEEZ een rah-LONZH
Sentence_Translation: The socket is far; I use an extension lead.

Sentence: La rallonge traîne par terre,fais attention en passant.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁa.lɔ̃ʒ tʁɛn paʁ tɛʁ fɛ a.tɑ̃.sjɔ̃ ɑ̃ pa.sɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah rah-LONZH tren par tair feh ah-tahn-SYOHN ahn pah-SAHN
Sentence_Translation: The extension lead trails on the floor; be careful stepping over.

Sentence: Mon bureau est en désordre,je trie les papiers.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ by.ʁo ɛ ɑ̃ de.zɔʁdʁ ʒə tʁi le pa.pje/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn bew-ROH eh ahn day-ZORDR zhuh tree lay pah-PYAY
Sentence_Translation: My desk is messy; I sort the papers.

Sentence: La chaise grince un peu quand je bouge.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʃɛz ɡʁɛ̃s œ̃ pø kɑ̃ ʒə buʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah shez grahns uhn puh kahn zhuh boozh
Sentence_Translation: The chair squeaks a bit when I move.

Sentence: Le tiroir est coincé,je force doucement.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ti.ʁwaʁ ɛ kwɛ̃.se ʒə fɔʁs dus.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh tee-RWAR eh kwehn-SAY zhuh fors doos-MAHN
Sentence_Translation: The drawer is stuck; I pull gently.

Sentence: Mon stylo ne marche plus,j'en prends un autre.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ sti.lo nə maʁʃ ply ʒɑ̃ pʁɑ̃ œ̃ notʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn stee-LOH nuh marsh plew zhahn prahn uhn nohtr
Sentence_Translation: My pen doesn’t work anymore; I take another.

Sentence: Je note tout dans mon cahier chaque soir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə nɔt tu dɑ̃ mɔ̃ ka.je ʃak swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh not too dahn mohn kah-YEH shak swar
Sentence_Translation: I write everything in my notebook every evening.

Sentence: Ta signature manque,donc le dossier reste bloqué.
Sentence_IPA: /ta si.ɲa.tyʁ mɑ̃k dɔ̃k lə dɔ.sje ʁɛst blɔ.ke/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: tah see-NYAH-tyur mahnk donk luh doh-SYAY rest bloh-KAY
Sentence_Translation: Your signature is missing,so the file stays blocked.

Sentence: J'ai une question simple,tu peux m'aider ?
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe yn kɛs.tjɔ̃ sɛ̃pl ty pø mɛ.de/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay een kess-TYOHN sehnpl tew puh meh-DAY
Sentence_Translation: I’ve a simple question; can you help me?

Sentence: Ta réponse est courte,mais elle suffit.
Sentence_IPA: /ta ʁe.pɔ̃s ɛ kuʁt mɛ ɛl sy.fi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: tah ray-PONSS eh koort meh ell sew-FEE
Sentence_Translation: Your answer is short,but it’s enough.

Sentence: Le problème revient souvent quand je suis fatigué.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pʁɔ.blɛm ʁə.vjɛ̃ su.vɑ̃ kɑ̃ ʒə sɥi fa.ti.ɡe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh proh-BLEM ruh-VYEHN soo-VAHN kahn zhuh swee fah-tee-GAY
Sentence_Translation: The problem often comes back when I’m tired.

Sentence: La solution existe,mais elle prend du temps.
Sentence_IPA: /la sɔ.ly.sjɔ̃ ɛɡ.zist mɛ ɛl pʁɑ̃ dy tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah soh-lew-SYOHN egg-ZEEST meh ell prahn dew tahn
Sentence_Translation: The solution exists,but it takes time.

Sentence: Donne-moi un conseil clair avant de décider.
Sentence_IPA: /dɔn mwa œ̃ kɔ̃.sɛj klɛʁ a.vɑ̃ də de.si.de/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: don mwah uhn kohn-SAY klair ah-VAHN duh day-see-DAY
Sentence_Translation: Give me clear advice before deciding.

Sentence: J'aimerais ton avis honnête sur ce plan.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒɛ.mə.ʁɛ tɔ̃ na.vi ɔ.nɛt syʁ sə plɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhem-ruh-ray tohn nah-VEE oh-NET sewr suh plahn
Sentence_Translation: I’d like your honest opinion on this plan.

Sentence: Donne un exemple simple pour expliquer la règle.
Sentence_IPA: /dɔn œ̃ n‿ɛɡ.zɑ̃pl sɛ̃pl puʁ ɛk.spli.ke la ʁɛɡl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: don uhn neg-ZAHMPL sehnpl poor ex-plee-KAY lah regl
Sentence_Translation: Give a simple example to explain the rule.

Sentence: Ton explication est utile,je comprends enfin mieux.
Sentence_IPA: /tɔ̃ n‿ɛk.spli.ka.sjɔ̃ ɛ y.til ʒə kɔ̃.pʁɑ̃ ɑ̃.fɛ̃ mjø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: tohn nex-plee-kah-SYOHN eh ew-TEEL zhuh kon-prahn ahn-fehn myuh
Sentence_Translation: Your explanation is useful; I finally understand better.

Sentence: L'erreur est fréquente,mais on peut l'éviter.
Sentence_IPA: /le.ʁœʁ ɛ fʁe.kɑ̃t mɛ ɔ̃ pø le.vi.te/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lay-RUHR eh fray-KAHNT meh ohn puh lay-vee-TAY
Sentence_Translation: The mistake is common,but we can avoid it.

Sentence: J'ai l'habitude de lire avant de dormir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe la.bi.tyd də liʁ a.vɑ̃ də dɔʁ.miʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay lah-bee-TEWD duh leer ah-VAHN duh dor-MEER
Sentence_Translation: I’m in the habit of reading before sleeping.

Sentence: Mon objectif est simple,avancer un peu chaque jour.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ n‿ɔb.ʒɛk.tif ɛ sɛ̃pl a.vɑ̃.se œ̃ pø ʃak ʒuʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn nob-zhek-TEEF eh sehnpl ah-vahn-SAY uhn puh shak zhoor
Sentence_Translation: My goal is simple: move forward a bit each day.

Sentence: Le plan change souvent,mais on s'adapte vite.
Sentence_IPA: /lə plɑ̃ ʃɑ̃ʒ su.vɑ̃ mɛ ɔ̃ sa.dapt vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh plahn shah(n)zh soo-VAHN meh ohn sah-dapt veet
Sentence_Translation: The plan changes often,but we adapt quickly.

Sentence: Chaque étape compte,même si elle est petite.
Sentence_IPA: /ʃak e.tap kɔ̃t mɛm si ɛl ɛ pə.tit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: shak ay-TAP kont mem see ell eh puh-TEET
Sentence_Translation: Each step matters,even if it’s small.

Sentence: Ma priorité aujourd'hui,c'est finir ce travail.
Sentence_IPA: /ma pʁi.jɔ.ʁi.te o.ʒuʁ.dɥi sɛ fi.niʁ sə tʁa.vaj/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah pree-yoh-ree-TAY oh-zhoor-dwee seh fee-NEER suh trah-VYE
Sentence_Translation: My priority today is to finish this work.

Sentence: Je veux ton retour avant de publier ça.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vø tɔ̃ ʁə.tuʁ a.vɑ̃ də py.bli.je sa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh vuh tohn ruh-TOOR ah-VAHN duh pew-blee-YAY sah
Sentence_Translation: I want your feedback before publishing that.

Sentence: La réunion commence tard,donc je prends un café.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁe.y.njɔ̃ kɔ.mɑ̃s taʁ dɔ̃k ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ ka.fe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah ray-ew-NYOHN koh-MAHNS tar donk zhuh prahn uhn kah-FAY
Sentence_Translation: The meeting starts late,so I have a coffee.

Sentence: Mon agenda est plein,je décale le rendez-vous.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ na.ʒɑ̃.da ɛ plɛ̃ ʒə de.kal lə ʁɑ̃.de.vu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn nah-zhahn-DAH eh plehn zhuh day-KAHL luh rahn-day-VOO
Sentence_Translation: My diary is full; I move the appointment.

Sentence: On a rendez-vous demain,n'oublie pas l'heure.
Sentence_IPA: /ɔ̃ na ʁɑ̃.de.vu də.mɛ̃ nu.bli pa lœʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ohn nah rahn-day-VOO duh-MEHN noo-BLEE pah lur
Sentence_Translation: We’ve got an appointment tomorrow; don’t forget the time.

Sentence: L'heure passe vite quand on discute ensemble.
Sentence_IPA: /lœʁ pas vit kɑ̃ ɔ̃ dis.kyt ɑ̃.sɑ̃bl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lur pahss veet kahn ohn diss-KUT ahn-SAHMBL
Sentence_Translation: Time passes quickly when we chat together.

Sentence: Attends une minute,je finis ce message.
Sentence_IPA: /a.tɑ̃ yn mi.nyt ʒə fi.ni sə me.saʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah-tahn een mee-NEWT zhuh fee-NEE suh may-sazh
Sentence_Translation: Wait a minute; I’m finishing this message.

Sentence: Une seconde suffit,je reviens tout de suite.
Sentence_IPA: /yn sə.ɡɔ̃d sy.fi ʒə ʁə.vjɛ̃ tu də sɥit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: een suh-GOND sew-FEE zhuh ruh-VYEHN too duh sweet
Sentence_Translation: A second is enough; I’ll be right back.
Sentence_Breakdown: Une(Art)|a|Art|/yn/|een;seconde(la)|second|Noun|/sə.ɡɔ̃d/|suh-gond;suffit|is enough|Verb|/sy.fi/|sew-fee;je(Pron)|I|Pron|/ʒə/|zhuh;reviens|come back|Verb|/ʁə.vjɛ̃/|ruh-vyehn;tout de suite|right away|Adv|/tu də sɥit/|too duh sweet

Sentence: Le matin je marche vite pour attraper le bus.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ma.tɛ̃ ʒə maʁʃ vit puʁ a.tʁa.pe lə bys/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh mah-TEHN zhuh marsh veet poor ah-trah-PAY luh bewss
Sentence_Translation: In the morning I walk fast to catch the bus.

Sentence: À midi on mange dehors quand il fait beau.
Sentence_IPA: /a mi.di ɔ̃ mɑ̃ʒ də.ɔʁ kɑ̃ il fɛ bo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah mee-DEE ohn mahnzh duh-OR kahn eel feh boh
Sentence_Translation: At noon we eat outside when the weather’s nice.

Sentence: L'après-midi je travaille mieux après une pause.
Sentence_IPA: /la.pʁɛ mi.di ʒə tʁa.vaj mjø a.pʁɛ yn poz/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah-preh mee-DEE zhuh trah-VYE myuh ah-PREH een pohz
Sentence_Translation: In the afternoon I work better after a break.

Sentence: La soirée est calme,on parle un peu.
Sentence_IPA: /la swa.ʁe ɛ kalm ɔ̃ paʁl œ̃ pø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah swah-RAY eh calm ohn parl uhn puh
Sentence_Translation: The evening is calm; we talk a bit.

Sentence: Le dimanche on reste à la maison sans stress.
Sentence_IPA: /lə di.mɑ̃ʃ ɔ̃ ʁɛst a la mɛ.zɔ̃ sɑ̃ stʁɛs/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh dee-MAHNSH ohn rest ah lah meh-ZOHN sahn stress
Sentence_Translation: On Sundays we stay at home without stress.

Sentence: Le lundi je commence tôt,puis je cours.
Sentence_IPA: /lə lœ̃.di ʒə kɔ.mɑ̃s to pɥi ʒə kuʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh luhn-DEE zhuh koh-MAHNS toh pwee zhuh koor
Sentence_Translation: On Mondays I start early,then I rush.

Sentence: Le mardi je fais les courses après le travail.
Sentence_IPA: /lə maʁ.di ʒə fɛ le kuʁs a.pʁɛ lə tʁa.vaj/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh mar-DEE zhuh feh lay koors ah-PREH luh trah-VYE
Sentence_Translation: On Tuesdays I do the shopping after work.

Sentence: Le mercredi on cuisine ensemble et on rit.
Sentence_IPA: /lə mɛʁ.kʁə.di ɔ̃ kɥi.zin ɑ̃.sɑ̃bl e ɔ̃ ʁi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh mair-kruh-DEE ohn kwee-ZEEN ahn-SAHMBL ay ohn ree
Sentence_Translation: On Wednesdays we cook together and laugh.

Sentence: Le jeudi je dors mal,je bois moins.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ʒø.di ʒə dɔʁ mal ʒə bwa mwɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh zhuh-DEE zhuh dor mal zhuh bwah mwehn
Sentence_Translation: On Thursdays I sleep badly; I drink less.

Sentence: Le vendredi on sort un peu après le dîner.
Sentence_IPA: /lə vɑ̃.dʁə.di ɔ̃ sɔʁ œ̃ pø a.pʁɛ lə di.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh vahn-druh-DEE ohn sor uhn puh ah-PREH luh dee-NAY
Sentence_Translation: On Fridays we go out a bit after dinner.

Sentence: Le samedi je me repose et je lis.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sam.di ʒə mə ʁə.poz e ʒə li/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh sam-DEE zhuh muh ruh-POHZ ay zhuh lee
Sentence_Translation: On Saturdays I rest and read.

Sentence: Le week-end on marche dehors,même s'il pleut.
Sentence_IPA: /lə wi.kɛnd ɔ̃ maʁʃ də.ɔʁ mɛm sil plø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh wee-KEND ohn marsh duh-OR mem seel pluh
Sentence_Translation: At the weekend we walk outside,even if it rains.

Sentence: La pluie tombe fort,donc je prends un parapluie.
Sentence_IPA: /la plɥi tɔ̃b fɔʁ dɔ̃k ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ pa.ʁa.plɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah plwee tohmb for donk zhuh prahn uhn pah-rah-plwee
Sentence_Translation: The rain is coming down hard,so I take an umbrella.

Sentence: Mon parapluie se retourne avec ce vent fort.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ pa.ʁa.plɥi sə ʁə.tuʁn a.vɛk sə vɑ̃ fɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn pah-rah-plwee suh ruh-toorn ah-vek suh vahn for
Sentence_Translation: My umbrella turns inside out with this strong wind.

Sentence: Le vent souffle froid,je ferme mon manteau.
Sentence_IPA: /lə vɑ̃ su.flə fʁwa ʒə fɛʁm mɔ̃ mɑ̃.to/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh vahn soo-fluh frwah zhuh fairm mohn mahn-toh
Sentence_Translation: The wind blows cold; I fasten my coat.

Sentence: La neige arrive tôt,les routes deviennent dangereuses.
Sentence_IPA: /la nɛʒ a.ʁiv to le ʁut də.vjɛn dɑ̃.ʒʁøz/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah nej ah-REEV toh lay root duh-VYEHN dahn-zhruhz
Sentence_Translation: Snow comes early; the roads become dangerous.

Sentence: Le soleil revient enfin,on ouvre les fenêtres.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɔ.lɛj ʁə.vjɛ̃ ɑ̃.fɛ̃ ɔ̃ u.vʁ le f(ə).nɛtʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh soh-LAY ruh-VYEHN ahn-fehn ohn OO-vr lay fuh-NETR
Sentence_Translation: The sun finally comes back; we open the windows.

Sentence: Un nuage gris cache le soleil toute la journée.
Sentence_IPA: /œ̃ nɥaʒ ɡʁi kaʃ lə sɔ.lɛj tut la ʒuʁ.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: uhn new-AZH gree kash luh soh-LAY toot lah zhoor-NAY
Sentence_Translation: A grey cloud hides the sun all day.

Sentence: La température baisse vite,je mets un pull.
Sentence_IPA: /la tɑ̃.pe.ʁa.tyʁ bɛs vit ʒə mɛ œ̃ pyl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah tahn-peh-rah-TYUR bess veet zhuh meh uhn pewl
Sentence_Translation: The temperature drops quickly; I put on a jumper.

Sentence: J'enfile un pull épais avant de sortir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒɑ̃.fil œ̃ pyl e.pɛ a.vɑ̃ də sɔʁ.tiʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhahn-FEEL uhn pewl ay-PAY ah-VAHN duh sor-TEER
Sentence_Translation: I put on a thick jumper before going out.

Sentence: Mon manteau est mouillé,je le laisse sécher.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ mɑ̃.to ɛ mu.je ʒə lə lɛs se.ʃe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn mahn-TOH eh moo-YAY zhuh luh less say-SHAY
Sentence_Translation: My coat is wet; I leave it to dry.

Sentence: J'oublie mon écharpe,alors j'ai froid.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒu.bli mɔ̃ e.ʃaʁp a.lɔʁ ʒe fʁwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhoo-BLEE mohn ay-SHARP ah-LOR zhay frwah
Sentence_Translation: I forget my scarf,so I’m cold.

Sentence: Je perds un gant,donc mes mains gèlent.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pɛʁ œ̃ ɡɑ̃ dɔ̃k me mɛ̃ ʒɛl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pair uhn gahn donk may meh(n) zhel
Sentence_Translation: I lose a glove,so my hands freeze.

Sentence: Ma chaussure fait mal,je marche plus lentement.
Sentence_IPA: /ma ʃo.syʁ fɛ mal ʒə maʁʃ ply lɑ̃t.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah shoh-SYUR feh mal zhuh marsh plew lahn-tmahn
Sentence_Translation: My shoe hurts; I walk more slowly.

Sentence: Je mets une chaussette sèche après la pluie.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɛ yn ʃo.sɛt sɛʃ a.pʁɛ la plɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh meh een shoh-SET sesh ah-PREH lah plwee
Sentence_Translation: I put on a dry sock after the rain.

Sentence: Ma chemise est froissée,je la repasse.
Sentence_IPA: /ma ʃə.miz ɛ fʁwa.se ʒə la ʁə.pas/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah shuh-MEEZ eh frwah-SAY zhuh lah ruh-PASS
Sentence_Translation: My shirt is creased; I iron it.

Sentence: Ce pantalon est trop long,je le raccourcis.
Sentence_IPA: /sə pɑ̃.ta.lɔ̃ ɛ tʁo lɔ̃ ʒə lə ʁa.kuʁ.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: suh pahn-tah-LON eh tro lohn zhuh luh rah-koor-SEE
Sentence_Translation: These trousers are too long; I shorten them.

Sentence: La jupe tourne quand je marche trop vite.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʒyp tuʁn kɑ̃ ʒə maʁʃ tʁo vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah zhup toorn kahn zhuh marsh tro veet
Sentence_Translation: The skirt spins when I walk too fast.

Sentence: Cette robe me va bien,je la garde.
Sentence_IPA: /sɛt ʁɔb mə va bjɛ̃ ʒə la ɡaʁd/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: set rob muh vah byehn zhuh lah gard
Sentence_Translation: This dress suits me; I’m keeping it.

Sentence: Je prends une veste légère pour la soirée.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ yn vɛst le.ʒɛʁ puʁ la swa.ʁe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn een vest lay-ZHAIR poor lah swah-RAY
Sentence_Translation: I take a light jacket for the evening.

Sentence: Un bouton manque,alors je recouds vite.
Sentence_IPA: /œ̃ bu.tɔ̃ mɑ̃k a.lɔʁ ʒə ʁə.ku vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: uhn boo-TON mahnk ah-LOR zhuh ruh-KOO veet
Sentence_Translation: A button is missing,so I sew it back quickly.

Sentence: Je mets mes clés dans la poche intérieure.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɛ me kle dɑ̃ la pɔʃ ɛ̃.te.ʁjœʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh meh may klay dahn lah posh an-tay-ree-UR
Sentence_Translation: I put my keys in the inner pocket.

Sentence: La ceinture est trop serrée,je la desserre.
Sentence_IPA: /la sɛ̃.tyʁ ɛ tʁo se.ʁe ʒə la de.sɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah sehn-TYUR eh tro say-RAY zhuh lah day-SAIR
Sentence_Translation: The belt is too tight; I loosen it.

Sentence: Le tailleur ajuste le pantalon pour demain matin.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ta.jœʁ a.ʒyst lə pɑ̃.ta.lɔ̃ puʁ də.mɛ̃ ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh tye-YUR ah-zhust luh pahn-tah-LON poor duh-MEHN mah-TEHN
Sentence_Translation: The tailor adjusts the trousers for tomorrow morning.

Sentence: Je plie le linge propre avant de sortir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pli lə lɛ̃ʒ pʁɔp a.vɑ̃ də sɔʁ.tiʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh plee luh lenzh prop ah-VAHN duh sor-TEER
Sentence_Translation: I fold the clean laundry before going out.

Sentence: La lessive tourne,mais j'ai oublié la couleur.
Sentence_IPA: /la lɛ.siv tuʁn mɛ ʒe u.bli la ku.lœʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah leh-SEEV toorn meh zhay oo-BLEE lah koo-LUR
Sentence_Translation: The wash is running,but I forgot the colour.

Sentence: Je prends du savon doux pour me laver.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ dy sa.vɔ̃ du puʁ mə la.ve/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn dew sah-VON doo poor muh lah-VAY
Sentence_Translation: I take mild soap to wash myself.

Sentence: Je cherche une serviette propre dans l'armoire.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ yn sɛʁ.vjɛt pʁɔp dɑ̃ laʁ.mwaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh een sair-VYET prop dahn lar-MWAR
Sentence_Translation: I look for a clean towel in the wardrobe.

Sentence: L'armoire est pleine,je donne des vêtements.
Sentence_IPA: /laʁ.mwaʁ ɛ plɛn ʒə dɔn de vɛt.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lar-MWAR eh plen zhuh don day vet-MAHN
Sentence_Translation: The wardrobe is full; I donate clothes.,le + armoire -> l'armoire

Sentence: Ce vêtement est usé,donc je le remplace.
Sentence_IPA: /sə vɛt.mɑ̃ ɛ y.ze dɔ̃k ʒə lə ʁɑ̃.plas/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: suh vet-MAHN eh ew-ZAY donk zhuh luh rahn-PLASS
Sentence_Translation: This piece of clothing is worn,so I replace it.

Sentence: Je lis l'étiquette avant de laver ce pull.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə li le.ti.kɛt a.vɑ̃ də la.ve sə pyl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh lee lay-tee-KET ah-VAHN duh lah-VAY suh pewl
Sentence_Translation: I read the label before washing this jumper.

Sentence: La tache part mal,je frotte plus fort.
Sentence_IPA: /la taʃ paʁ mal ʒə fʁɔt ply fɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah tash par mal zhuh frot plew for
Sentence_Translation: The stain comes out badly; I scrub harder.

Sentence: Je vais nettoyer la table après le dîner.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vɛ ne.twa.je la tabl a.pʁɛ lə di.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh veh net-wah-YAY lah tabl ah-PREH luh dee-NAY
Sentence_Translation: I’m going to clean the table after dinner.

Sentence: La table est collante,je passe une éponge.
Sentence_IPA: /la tabl ɛ kɔ.lɑ̃t ʒə pas yn e.pɔ̃ʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah tabl eh koh-LAHNT zhuh pahss een ay-PONZH
Sentence_Translation: The table is sticky; I wipe with a sponge.

Sentence: Je prends une éponge neuve pour la cuisine.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ yn e.pɔ̃ʒ nœv puʁ la kɥi.zin/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn een ay-PONZH nuv poor lah kwee-ZEEN
Sentence_Translation: I take a new sponge for the kitchen.

Sentence: J'utilise un produit doux pour le bois.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒy.ti.liz œ̃ pʁɔ.dɥi du puʁ lə bwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhew-tee-LEEZ uhn proh-DWEE doo poor luh bwah
Sentence_Translation: I use a mild product for the wood.,je + utilise -> j'utilise

Sentence: Le bois est humide,il faut le sécher.
Sentence_IPA: /lə bwa ɛ y.mid il fo lə se.ʃe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh bwah eh ew-MEED eel foe luh say-SHAY
Sentence_Translation: The wood is damp; it needs drying.

Sentence: Le vernis brille encore malgré les rayures.
Sentence_IPA: /lə vɛʁ.ni bʁi.j‿ɑ̃.kɔʁ mal.ɡʁe le ʁɛ.jyʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh vair-NEE bree-y ahn-KOR mal-gray lay ray-YUR
Sentence_Translation: The varnish still shines despite the scratches.

Sentence: Une rayure apparaît,donc je fais attention.
Sentence_IPA: /yn ʁɛ.jyʁ a.pa.ʁɛ dɔ̃k ʒə fɛ a.tɑ̃.sjɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: een ray-YUR ah-pah-RAY donk zhuh feh ah-tahn-SYOHN
Sentence_Translation: A scratch appears,so I’m careful.

Sentence: Je cherche un outil simple pour réparer ça.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ œ̃ u.ti sɛ̃pl puʁ ʁe.pa.ʁe sa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh uhn oo-TEE sehnpl poor ray-pah-RAY sah
Sentence_Translation: I’m looking for a simple tool to fix that.

Sentence: Le marteau est lourd,je tape doucement.
Sentence_IPA: /lə maʁ.to ɛ luʁ ʒə tap dus.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh mar-TOH eh loor zhuh tap doos-MAHN
Sentence_Translation: The hammer is heavy; I tap gently.

Sentence: Je plante un clou droit dans le mur.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə plɑ̃t œ̃ klu dʁwa dɑ̃ lə myʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh plahnt uhn klooh drwah dahn luh mewr
Sentence_Translation: I hammer a nail straight into the wall.

Sentence: La vis tourne dans le vide,je recommence.
Sentence_IPA: /la vis tuʁn dɑ̃ lə vid ʒə ʁə.kɔ.mɑ̃s/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah veess toorn dahn luh veed zhuh ruh-koh-MAHNS
Sentence_Translation: The screw spins freely; I start again.

Sentence: Je prends le tournevis,puis je serre la vis.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ lə tuʁ.nə.vis pɥi ʒə sɛʁ la vis/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn luh toorn-uh-veess pwee zhuh sair lah veess
Sentence_Translation: I take the screwdriver,then I tighten the screw.

Sentence: La colle sèche vite,donc je travaille rapidement.
Sentence_IPA: /la kɔl sɛʃ vit dɔ̃k ʒə tʁa.vaj ʁa.pi.də.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah kol sesh veet donk zhuh trah-VYE rah-pee-duh-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The glue dries fast,so I work quickly.

Sentence: Je colle un ruban solide sur le carton.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə kɔl œ̃ ʁy.bɑ̃ sɔ.lid syʁ lə kaʁ.tɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh kol uhn rew-BAHN soh-LEED sewr luh kar-TON
Sentence_Translation: I stick strong tape on the cardboard.

Sentence: Le carton est mouillé,il se déchire.
Sentence_IPA: /lə kaʁ.tɔ̃ ɛ mu.je il sə de.ʃiʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh kar-TON eh moo-YAY eel suh day-SHEER
Sentence_Translation: The cardboard is wet; it tears.

Sentence: Je ferme la boîte et je range tout.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛʁm la bwat e ʒə ʁɑ̃ʒ tu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh fairm lah bwaht ay zhuh rahnzh too
Sentence_Translation: I close the box and put everything away.

Sentence: Le paquet arrive demain,je reste à la maison.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pa.kɛ a.ʁiv də.mɛ̃ ʒə ʁɛst a la mɛ.zɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh pah-KAY ah-REEV duh-MEHN zhuh rest ah lah meh-ZOHN
Sentence_Translation: The parcel arrives tomorrow; I stay at home.

Sentence: La livraison est en retard,je vérifie le suivi.
Sentence_IPA: /la li.vʁɛ.zɔ̃ ɛ ɑ̃ ʁə.taʁ ʒə ve.ʁi.fi lə sɥi.vi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah lee-vray-ZOHN eh ahn ruh-TAR zhuh vay-ree-FEE luh swee-VEE
Sentence_Translation: The delivery is late; I check the tracking.

Sentence: Le suivi indique un problème près du dépôt.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɥi.vi ɛ̃.dik œ̃ pʁɔ.blɛm pʁɛ dy de.po/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh swee-VEE an-DEEK uhn proh-BLEM preh dew day-POH
Sentence_Translation: The tracking shows a problem near the depot.

Sentence: Je passe au dépôt après le travail ce soir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pas o de.po a.pʁɛ lə tʁa.vaj sə swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pahss oh day-POH ah-PREH luh trah-VYE suh swar
Sentence_Translation: I go to the depot after work tonight.

Sentence: Ma commande est validée,j'attends la confirmation.
Sentence_IPA: /ma kɔ.mɑ̃d ɛ va.li.de ʒa.tɑ̃ la kɔ̃.fiʁ.ma.sjɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah koh-MAHND eh vah-lee-DAY zhah-TAHN lah kon-feer-ma-SYOHN
Sentence_Translation: My order is confirmed; I’m waiting for confirmation.

Sentence: La confirmation arrive enfin dans ma boîte mail.
Sentence_IPA: /la kɔ̃.fiʁ.ma.sjɔ̃ a.ʁiv ɑ̃.fɛ̃ dɑ̃ ma bwat maj/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah kon-feer-ma-SYOHN ah-REEV ahn-fehn dahn mah bwaht my
Sentence_Translation: The confirmation finally arrives in my inbox.

Sentence: L'adresse est fausse,je la corrige tout de suite.
Sentence_IPA: /la.dʁɛs ɛ fos ʒə la kɔ.ʁiʒ tu də sɥit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah-dress eh foss zhuh lah koh-REEZH too duh sweet
Sentence_Translation: The address is wrong; I correct it straight away.

Sentence: Je note le numéro et j'appelle le service.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə nɔt lə ny.me.ʁo e ʒa.pɛl lə sɛʁ.vis/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh not luh new-may-ROH ay zhah-PELL luh sair-VEESS
Sentence_Translation: I note the number and call the service.

Sentence: Le service répond vite,mais il manque une info.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɛʁ.vis ʁe.pɔ̃ vit mɛ il mɑ̃k yn ɛ̃.fo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh sair-VEESS ray-PON veet meh eel mahnk een an-FOH
Sentence_Translation: The department replies quickly,but one bit of info is missing.

Sentence: Cette information est utile,je la garde pour plus tard.
Sentence_IPA: /sɛt ɛ̃.fɔʁ.ma.sjɔ̃ ɛ y.til ʒə la ɡaʁd puʁ ply taʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: set an-for-ma-SYOHN eh ew-TEEL zhuh lah gard poor plew tar
Sentence_Translation: This information is useful; I keep it for later.

Sentence: J'ai un choix difficile,mais je décide quand même.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe œ̃ ʃwa di.fi.sil mɛ ʒə de.sid kɑ̃ mɛm/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay uhn shwah dee-fee-SEEL meh zhuh day-SEED kahn mem
Sentence_Translation: I’ve a difficult choice,but I decide anyway.

Sentence: Cette option coûte moins cher,donc je la choisis.
Sentence_IPA: /sɛt ɔp.sjɔ̃ kut mwɛ̃ ʃɛʁ dɔ̃k ʒə la ʃwa.zi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: set op-SYOHN koot mwehn shair donk zhuh lah shwah-ZEE
Sentence_Translation: This option is cheaper,so I choose it.

Sentence: Le prix augmente encore,alors je compare partout.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pʁi oɡ.mɑ̃t ɑ̃.kɔʁ a.lɔʁ ʒə kɔ̃.paʁ paʁ.tu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh pree ohg-MAHNT ahn-KOR ah-LOR zhuh kon-PAR par-TOO
Sentence_Translation: The price goes up again,so I compare everywhere.

Sentence: Avec une réduction,le prix devient raisonnable aujourd'hui.
Sentence_IPA: /a.vɛk yn ʁe.dyk.sjɔ̃ lə pʁi də.vjɛ̃ ʁɛ.zɔ.nabl o.ʒuʁ.dɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah-vek een ray-dewk-SYOHN luh pree duh-VYEHN ray-zoh-NAHBL oh-zhoor-dwee
Sentence_Translation: With a discount,the price becomes reasonable today.

Sentence: Le paiement échoue,donc je réessaie plus tard.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pɛ.mɑ̃ e.ʃu dɔ̃k ʒə ʁe.ɛ.sɛ ply taʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh peh-MAHN ay-SHOO donk zhuh ray-eh-ESS-EH plew tar
Sentence_Translation: The payment fails,so I try again later.

Sentence: Ma carte est bloquée,j'appelle la banque.
Sentence_IPA: /ma kaʁt ɛ blɔ.ke ʒa.pɛl la bɑ̃k/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah kart eh bloh-KAY zhah-PELL lah bahnk
Sentence_Translation: My card is blocked; I call the bank.

Sentence: La banque répond,mais je dois patienter longtemps.
Sentence_IPA: /la bɑ̃k ʁe.pɔ̃ mɛ ʒə dwa pa.sjɑ̃.te lɔ̃.tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah bahnk ray-PON meh zhuh dwah pah-syah(n)-TAY lohn-TAHN
Sentence_Translation: The bank replies,but I have to wait a long time.

Sentence: Je vérifie mon compte chaque mois sans faute.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ve.ʁi.fi mɔ̃ kɔ̃t ʃak mwa sɑ̃ fot/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh vay-ree-FEE mohn kont shak mwah sahn fot
Sentence_Translation: I check my account every month without fail.

Sentence: Mon salaire arrive tard,mais je gère.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ sa.lɛʁ a.ʁiv taʁ mɛ ʒə ʒɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn sah-LAIR ah-REEV tar meh zhuh zhair
Sentence_Translation: My salary arrives late,but I manage.

Sentence: Je paie la facture en ligne avant lundi.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pɛ la fak.tyʁ ɑ̃ liɲ a.vɑ̃ lœ̃.di/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh peh lah fak-TYUR ahn leen ah-VAHN luhn-DEE
Sentence_Translation: I pay the bill online before Monday.

Sentence: Mon abonnement se termine,donc je le renouvelle.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ na.bɔ.nə.mɑ̃ sə tɛʁ.min dɔ̃k ʒə lə ʁə.nu.vɛl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn nah-bohn-uh-MAHN suh tair-MEEN donk zhuh luh ruh-noo-VELL
Sentence_Translation: My subscription ends,so I renew it.

Sentence: Le contrat est clair,mais je relis tout.
Sentence_IPA: /lə kɔ̃.tʁa ɛ klɛʁ mɛ ʒə ʁə.li tu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh kohn-TRAH eh klair meh zhuh ruh-LEE too
Sentence_Translation: The contract is clear,but I reread everything.

Sentence: Il manque une signature,donc le dossier attend.
Sentence_IPA: /il mɑ̃k yn si.ɲa.tyʁ dɔ̃k lə dɔ.sje a.tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: eel mahnk een see-NYAH-tyur donk luh doh-SYAY ah-tahn
Sentence_Translation: One signature is missing,so the file waits.

Sentence: La loi change parfois,donc je vérifie les règles.
Sentence_IPA: /la lwa ʃɑ̃ʒ paʁ.fwa dɔ̃k ʒə ve.ʁi.fi le ʁɛɡl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah lwah shah(n)zh par-FWA donk zhuh vay-ree-FEE lay regl
Sentence_Translation: The law changes sometimes,so I check the rules.

Sentence: La règle est simple,mais je l'oublie souvent.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁɛɡl ɛ sɛ̃pl mɛ ʒə lu.bli su.vɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah regl eh sehnpl meh zhuh loo-BLEE soo-VAHN
Sentence_Translation: The rule is simple,but I often forget it.

Sentence: J'apprends le droit petit à petit pour comprendre.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒa.pʁɑ̃ lə dʁwa pə.ti a pə.ti puʁ kɔ̃.pʁɑ̃dʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhah-prahn luh drwah puh-TEE ah puh-TEE poor kon-PRAHND(R)
Sentence_Translation: I learn law bit by bit to understand.,je + apprends -> j'apprends

Sentence: La justice prend du temps,mais elle avance.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʒys.tis pʁɑ̃ dy tɑ̃ mɛ ɛl a.vɑ̃s/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah zhus-TEESS prahn dew tahn meh ell ah-VAHNS
Sentence_Translation: Justice takes time,but it moves forward.

Sentence: La police arrive vite quand on appelle au secours.
Sentence_IPA: /la pɔ.lis a.ʁiv vit kɑ̃ ɔ̃ na.pɛl o sə.kuʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah poh-LEESS ah-REEV veet kahn ohn nah-PELL oh suh-KOOR
Sentence_Translation: The police arrive quickly when someone calls for help.

Sentence: Je demande du secours,car je suis perdu.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə də.mɑ̃d dy sə.kuʁ kaʁ ʒə sɥi pɛʁ.dy/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh duh-MAHND dew suh-KOOR kar zhuh swee pair-DEW
Sentence_Translation: I ask for help because I’m lost.

Sentence: Le danger est réel,donc on reste ensemble.
Sentence_IPA: /lə dɑ̃.ʒe ɛ ʁe.ɛl dɔ̃k ɔ̃ ʁɛst ɑ̃.sɑ̃bl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh dahn-ZHAY eh ray-EL donk ohn rest ahn-sahmbl
Sentence_Translation: The danger is real,so we stay together.

Sentence: La sécurité est importante,je ferme bien la porte.
Sentence_IPA: /la se.ky.ʁi.te ɛ ɛ̃.pɔʁ.tɑ̃t ʒə fɛʁm bjɛ̃ la pɔʁt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah say-kew-ree-TAY eh an-por-TAHNT zhuh fairm byehn lah port
Sentence_Translation: Safety is important; I shut the door properly.

Sentence: Mon voisin fait du bruit tard le soir.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ vwa.zɛ̃ fɛ dy bʁɥi taʁ lə swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn vwah-ZEHN feh dew brwee tar luh swar
Sentence_Translation: My neighbour makes noise late in the evening.

Sentence: Ma voisine me prête un livre intéressant souvent.
Sentence_IPA: /ma vwa.zin mə pʁɛt œ̃ livʁ ɛ̃.te.ʁe.sɑ̃ su.vɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah vwah-ZEEN muh pret uhn leevr an-tay-ray-SAHN soo-VAHN
Sentence_Translation: My neighbour lends me an interesting book often.

Sentence: Mon quartier est calme,sauf près de la gare.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ kaʁ.tje ɛ kalm sof pʁɛ də la ɡaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn kar-TYAY eh calm soff preh duh lah gar
Sentence_Translation: My neighbourhood is quiet,except near the station.

Sentence: La rue est étroite,donc je roule lentement.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁy ɛ e.tʁwat dɔ̃k ʒə ʁul lɑ̃t.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah rew eh ay-TWAHT donk zhuh rool lahn-tmahn
Sentence_Translation: The street is narrow,so I drive slowly.

Sentence: Le trottoir est glissant après la pluie.
Sentence_IPA: /lə tʁɔ.twaʁ ɛ ɡli.sɑ̃ a.pʁɛ la plɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh trot-TWAR eh glee-SAHN ah-PREH lah plwee
Sentence_Translation: The pavement is slippery after the rain.

Sentence: Je traverse au passage piéton,même si je suis pressé.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tʁa.vɛʁs o pa.saʒ pje.tɔ̃ mɛm si ʒə sɥi pʁe.se/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh trah-VAIRS oh pah-sazh pyeh-TON mem see zhuh swee pray-SAY
Sentence_Translation: I cross at the pedestrian crossing,even if I’m in a rush.

Sentence: Le feu passe au vert,donc je démarre.
Sentence_IPA: /lə fø pas o vɛʁ dɔ̃k ʒə de.maʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh fuh pahss oh vair donk zhuh day-MAR
Sentence_Translation: The light turns green,so I set off.

Sentence: Au vert,je respire mieux dans le parc.
Sentence_IPA: /o vɛʁ ʒə ʁəs.piʁ mjø dɑ̃ lə paʁk/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: oh vair zhuh ruh-SPEER myuh dahn luh park
Sentence_Translation: In the greenery,I breathe better in the park.

Sentence: Au rouge,tout le monde s'arrête sans discuter.
Sentence_IPA: /o ʁuʒ tu lə mɔ̃d sa.ʁɛt sɑ̃ dis.ky.te/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: oh roozh too luh mohnd sah-RET sahn diss-kew-TAY
Sentence_Translation: On red,everyone stops without arguing.
Sentence_Breakdown: Au(Prep)|at the|Prep|/o/|oh;rouge(le)|red|Noun|/ʁuʒ/|roozh;tout le monde|everyone|Pron|/tu lə mɔ̃d/|too luh mohnd;s'|oneself|Pron|/s/|s;arrête|stops|Verb|/a.ʁɛt/|ah-ret;sans|without|Prep|/sɑ̃/|sahn;discuter|argue|Verb|/dis.ky.te/|diss-kew-tay

Sentence: Je retrouve mon ami à la gare principale.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁə.tʁuv mɔ̃ na.mi a la ɡaʁ pʁɛ̃.si.pal/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ruh-TROOV mohn nah-MEE ah lah gar prehn-see-PAL
Sentence_Translation: I meet my friend at the main station.

Sentence: Le quai est bondé,je garde mon sac devant.
Sentence_IPA: /lə kɛ ɛ bɔ̃.de ʒə ɡaʁd mɔ̃ sak də.vɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh keh eh bon-DAY zhuh gard mohn sack duh-VAHN
Sentence_Translation: The platform is crowded; I keep my bag in front.

Sentence: Mon sac est lourd,mais je marche quand même.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ sak ɛ luʁ mɛ ʒə maʁʃ kɑ̃ mɛm/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn sak eh loor meh zhuh marsh kahn mem
Sentence_Translation: My bag is heavy,but I walk anyway.

Sentence: La valise roule mal sur les pavés mouillés.
Sentence_IPA: /la va.liz ʁul mal syʁ le pa.ve mu.je/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah vah-LEEZ rool mal sewr lay pah-VAY moo-YAY
Sentence_Translation: The suitcase rolls badly on the wet cobbles.

Sentence: Je surveille mon bagage pendant que tu paies.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə syʁ.vɛj mɔ̃ ba.ɡaʒ pɑ̃.dɑ̃ kə ty pɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh sewr-VAY mohn bah-GAZH pahn-dahn kuh tew peh
Sentence_Translation: I watch my luggage while you pay.

Sentence: Je trouve mon billet,puis je monte rapidement.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tʁuv mɔ̃ bi.jɛ pɥi ʒə mɔ̃t ʁa.pi.də.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh troov mohn bee-YAY pwee zhuh mont rah-pee-duh-mahn
Sentence_Translation: I find my ticket,then I get on quickly.

Sentence: Le contrôle commence,alors je montre ma carte.
Sentence_IPA: /lə kɔ̃.tʁol kɔ.mɑ̃s a.lɔʁ ʒə mɔ̃tʁ ma kaʁt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh kohn-TROL koh-MAHNS ah-LOR zhuh montr mah kart
Sentence_Translation: The inspection starts,so I show my card.

Sentence: Le retard s'annonce,donc j'envoie un message.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ʁə.taʁ sa.nɔ̃s dɔ̃k ʒɑ̃.vwa.j œ̃ me.saʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh ruh-TAR sah-NONSS donk zhahn-VWAH-y uhn may-SAZH
Sentence_Translation: The delay is announced,so I send a message.

Sentence: L'annulation tombe,mais on garde son calme.
Sentence_IPA: /la.ny.la.sjɔ̃ tɔ̃b mɛ ɔ̃ ɡaʁd sɔ̃ kalm/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah-new-lah-SYOHN tohmb meh ohn gard sohn calm
Sentence_Translation: The cancellation comes through,but we keep calm.

Sentence: Je change d'itinéraire,car la route est fermée.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɑ̃ʒ di.ti.ne.ʁɛʁ kaʁ la ʁut ɛ fɛʁ.me/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shahnj dee-tee-nay-RAIR kar lah root eh fair-MAY
Sentence_Translation: I change route because the road is closed.

Sentence: La route est sombre,j'allume les phares.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁut ɛ sɔ̃bʁ ʒa.lym le faʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah root eh somb(r) zhah-LUHM lay far
Sentence_Translation: The road is dark; I turn on the headlights.

Sentence: Un phare clignote,donc je m'arrête un instant.
Sentence_IPA: /œ̃ faʁ kli.ɲɔt dɔ̃k ʒə ma.ʁɛt œ̃ n‿ɛ̃.stɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: uhn far klee-NYOT donk zhuh mah-RET uhn nahn-STAHN
Sentence_Translation: A headlight is flashing,so I stop for a moment.

Sentence: Je mets de l'essence,puis je repars calmement.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɛ də le.sɑ̃s pɥi ʒə ʁə.paʁ kal.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh meh duh lay-SAHNS pwee zhuh ruh-PAR kal-MAHN
Sentence_Translation: I put petrol in,then I set off calmly.

Sentence: Le parking est plein,donc je fais le tour.
Sentence_IPA: /lə paʁ.kiŋ ɛ plɛ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə fɛ lə tuʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh par-KING eh plehn donk zhuh feh luh toor
Sentence_Translation: The car park is full,so I go round.

Sentence: Je trouve une place libre près de l'entrée.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tʁuv yn plas libʁ pʁɛ də lɑ̃.tʁe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh troov een plahss leebr preh duh lahn-TRAY
Sentence_Translation: I find a free space near the entrance.

Sentence: L'entrée est fermée,alors on attend dehors.
Sentence_IPA: /lɑ̃.tʁe ɛ fɛʁ.me a.lɔʁ ɔ̃ na.tɑ̃ də.ɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lahn-TRAY eh fair-MAY ah-LOR ohn nah-TAHN duh-OR
Sentence_Translation: The entrance is closed,so we wait outside.,le + entrée -> l'entrée

Sentence: Je prends la sortie suivante et je ralentis.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ la sɔʁ.ti sɥi.vɑ̃t e ʒə ʁa.lɑ̃.ti/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn lah sor-TEE swee-VAHNT ay zhuh rah-lahn-TEE
Sentence_Translation: I take the next exit and slow down.

Sentence: Le centre est loin,donc je prends le métro.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɑ̃tʁ ɛ lwɛ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə pʁɑ̃ lə me.tʁo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh sahn-tr eh lwehn donk zhuh prahn luh may-TROH
Sentence_Translation: The centre is far,so I take the метро.

Sentence: Le métro est plein,mais il avance quand même.
Sentence_IPA: /lə me.tʁo ɛ plɛ̃ mɛ il a.vɑ̃s kɑ̃ mɛm/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh may-TROH eh plehn meh eel ah-VAHNS kahn mem
Sentence_Translation: The underground is packed,but it moves anyway.

Sentence: La station est proche,je descends ici.
Sentence_IPA: /la sta.sjɔ̃ ɛ pʁɔʃ ʒə de.sɑ̃d i.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah stah-SYOHN eh prosh zhuh day-SAHND ee-SEE
Sentence_Translation: The station is near; I get off here.

Sentence: J'ouvre le plan et je cherche la rue.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒuvʁ lə plɑ̃ e ʒə ʃɛʁʃ la ʁy/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhoovr luh plahn ay zhuh shairsh lah rew
Sentence_Translation: I open the map and look for the street.,je + ouvre -> j'ouvre

Sentence: Je regarde une carte en ligne pour m'orienter.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁə.ɡaʁd yn kaʁt ɑ̃ liɲ puʁ mɔ.ʁjɑ̃.te/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ruh-GARD een kart ahn leen poor moh-ree-ahn-TAY
Sentence_Translation: I look at an online map to get my bearings.

Sentence: Je prends la bonne direction sans hésiter cette fois.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ la bɔn di.ʁɛk.sjɔ̃ sɑ̃ e.zi.te sɛt fwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn lah bon dee-rek-SYOHN sahn ay-zee-TAY set fwah
Sentence_Translation: I take the right direction without hesitating this time.

Sentence: Je fais une erreur bête,puis je corrige.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ yn e.ʁœʁ bɛt pɥi ʒə kɔ.ʁiʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh een ay-RUHR bet pwee zhuh koh-REEZH
Sentence_Translation: I make a silly mistake,then I correct it.

Sentence: Le doute revient,donc je pose une question.
Sentence_IPA: /lə dut ʁə.vjɛ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə poz yn kɛs.tjɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh doot ruh-VYEHN donk zhuh pohz een kess-TYOHN
Sentence_Translation: Doubt returns,so I ask a question.

Sentence: La réalité est différente,mais je m'adapte encore.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁe.a.li.te ɛ di.fe.ʁɑ̃t mɛ ʒə ma.dapt ɑ̃.kɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah ray-ah-lee-TAY eh dee-fay-RAHNT meh zhuh mah-dapt ahn-KOR
Sentence_Translation: Reality is different,but I still adapt.

Sentence: J'ai raison peut-être,mais j'écoute quand même.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe ʁɛ.zɔ̃ pø.tɛtʁ mɛ ʒe.kut kɑ̃ mɛm/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay ray-ZOHN puh-tet(r) meh zhay-KOOT kahn mem
Sentence_Translation: I might be right,but I listen anyway.

Sentence: J'ai tort parfois,et je le reconnais vite.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe tɔʁ paʁ.fwa e ʒə lə ʁə.kɔ.nɛ vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay tor par-FWA ay zhuh luh ruh-koh-NEH veet
Sentence_Translation: I’m wrong sometimes,and I admit it quickly.

Sentence: Je cherche une preuve claire avant de conclure.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ yn pʁœv klɛʁ a.vɑ̃ də kɔ̃.klyʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh een pruv klair ah-VAHN duh kon-KLU(R)
Sentence_Translation: I look for clear proof before concluding.

Sentence: Ton argument est fort,mais je veux des faits.
Sentence_IPA: /tɔ̃ naʁ.ɡy.mɑ̃ ɛ fɔʁ mɛ ʒə vø de fɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: tohn nar-gew-MAHN eh for meh zhuh vuh day feh
Sentence_Translation: Your argument is strong,but I want facts.

Sentence: Un fait suffit,si on le vérifie bien.
Sentence_IPA: /œ̃ fɛ sy.fi si ɔ̃ lə ve.ʁi.fi bjɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: uhn feh sew-FEE see ohn luh vay-ree-FEE byehn
Sentence_Translation: One fact is enough if you verify it properly.

Sentence: J'ai une idée simple pour gagner du temps.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe yn i.de sɛ̃pl puʁ ɡa.ɲe dy tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay een ee-DAY sehnpl poor gah-NYAY dew tahn
Sentence_Translation: I have a simple idea to save time.

Sentence: Le projet avance bien,mais il reste du travail.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pʁɔ.ʒɛ a.vɑ̃s bjɛ̃ mɛ il ʁɛst dy tʁa.vaj/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh proh-ZHAY ah-VAHNS byehn meh eel rest dew trah-VYE
Sentence_Translation: The project is going well,but work remains.

Sentence: Je termine une tâche,puis j'en commence une autre.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tɛʁ.min yn taʃ pɥi ʒɑ̃ kɔ.mɑ̃s yn otʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh tair-MEEN een tash pwee zhahn koh-MAHNS een otr
Sentence_Translation: I finish one task,then I start another.

Sentence: Sans objectif clair,je me disperse facilement.
Sentence_IPA: /sɑ̃ n‿ɔb.ʒɛk.tif klɛʁ ʒə mə dis.pɛʁs fa.si.lə.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: sahn nob-zhek-TEEF klair zhuh muh diss-PAIRSS fah-see-luh-mahn
Sentence_Translation: Without a clear goal,I get distracted easily.

Sentence: Je vois des progrès réels après deux semaines.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vwa de pʁɔ.ɡʁɛ ʁe.ɛl a.pʁɛ dø sə.mɛn/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh vwah day proh-GRAY ray-EL ah-PREH duh suh-men
Sentence_Translation: I see real progress after two weeks.

Sentence: Une bonne habitude change la vie petit à petit.
Sentence_IPA: /yn bɔn a.bi.tyd ʃɑ̃ʒ la vi pə.ti a pə.ti/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: een bon ah-bee-TEWD shah(n)zh lah vee puh-TEE ah puh-TEE
Sentence_Translation: A good habit changes life little by little.

Sentence: Un effort quotidien vaut mieux qu'une grande promesse.
Sentence_IPA: /œ̃ n‿e.fɔʁ kɔ.ti.djɛ̃ vo mjø kyn ɡʁɑ̃d pʁɔ.mɛs/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: uhn nay-FOR koh-tee-dyehn voh myuh kun grahnd proh-MESS
Sentence_Translation: A daily effort is better than a big promise.

Sentence: Je fais une promesse,mais je la tiens.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ yn pʁɔ.mɛs mɛ ʒə la tjɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh een proh-MESS meh zhuh lah tyehn
Sentence_Translation: I make a promise,but I keep it.

Sentence: La confiance revient quand on parle franchement ensemble.
Sentence_IPA: /la kɔ̃.fjɑ̃s ʁə.vjɛ̃ kɑ̃ ɔ̃ paʁl fʁɑ̃ʃ.mɑ̃ ɑ̃.sɑ̃bl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah kon-fyahnss ruh-VYEHN kahn ohn parl frahnsh-MAHN ahn-sahmbl
Sentence_Translation: Trust returns when we speak honestly together.

Sentence: Je demande un conseil,puis je choisis seul.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə də.mɑ̃d œ̃ kɔ̃.sɛj pɥi ʒə ʃwa.zi sœl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh duh-MAHND uhn kon-SAY pwee zhuh shwah-ZEE suhl
Sentence_Translation: I ask for advice,then I choose alone.

Sentence: Je n'ai pas la réponse,mais je cherche.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ne pa la ʁe.pɔ̃s mɛ ʒə ʃɛʁʃ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh nay pah lah ray-PONSS meh zhuh shairsh
Sentence_Translation: I don’t have the answer,but I’m looking.

Sentence: Ta question est bonne,je réfléchis un moment.
Sentence_IPA: /ta kɛs.tjɔ̃ ɛ bɔn ʒə ʁe.fle.ʃi œ̃ mɔ.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: tah kess-TYOHN eh bon zhuh ray-flay-SHEE uhn moh-MAHN
Sentence_Translation: Your question is good; I think for a moment.

Sentence: La discussion continue,mais on reste poli.
Sentence_IPA: /la dis.ky.sjɔ̃ kɔ̃.ti.ny mɛ ɔ̃ ʁɛst pɔ.li/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah diss-kew-SYOHN kon-tee-NEW meh ohn rest poh-LEE
Sentence_Translation: The discussion continues,but we stay polite.

Sentence: On trouve un accord simple après quelques minutes.
Sentence_IPA: /ɔ̃ tʁuv œ̃ na.kɔʁ sɛ̃pl a.pʁɛ kɛlk mi.nyt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ohn troov uhn nah-KOR sehnpl ah-PREH kelk mee-newt
Sentence_Translation: We reach a simple agreement after a few minutes.

Sentence: Un conflit inutile fatigue tout le monde rapidement.
Sentence_IPA: /œ̃ kɔ̃.fli i.ny.til fa.tig tu lə mɔ̃d ʁa.pi.də.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: uhn kon-FLEE ee-new-TEEL fah-teeg too luh mohnd rah-pee-duh-mahn
Sentence_Translation: An unnecessary conflict tires everyone quickly.

Sentence: Le calme revient quand on respire plus lentement.
Sentence_IPA: /lə kalm ʁə.vjɛ̃ kɑ̃ ɔ̃ ʁɛs.piʁ ply lɑ̃t.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh calm ruh-VYEHN kahn ohn ress-PEER plew lahn-tmahn
Sentence_Translation: Calm returns when we breathe more slowly.

Sentence: Le stress monte vite quand je suis en retard.
Sentence_IPA: /lə stʁɛs mɔ̃t vit kɑ̃ ʒə sɥi ɑ̃ ʁə.taʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh stress mont veet kahn zhuh swee ahn ruh-TAR
Sentence_Translation: Stress rises quickly when I’m late.

Sentence: Ma respiration s'améliore quand je marche dehors.
Sentence_IPA: /ma ʁɛs.pi.ʁa.sjɔ̃ sa.me.ljɔʁ kɑ̃ ʒə maʁʃ də.ɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah ress-pee-rah-SYOHN sah-may-LYOR kahn zhuh marsh duh-OR
Sentence_Translation: My breathing improves when I walk outside.

Sentence: Le repos aide beaucoup après une longue journée.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ʁə.po ɛd bo.ku a.pʁɛ yn lɔ̃ɡ ʒuʁ.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh ruh-POH aid boh-KOO ah-PREH een long zhoor-NAY
Sentence_Translation: Rest helps a lot after a long day.

Sentence: Le sommeil manque,donc je bois moins de café.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɔ.mɛj mɑ̃k dɔ̃k ʒə bwa mwɛ̃ də ka.fe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh soh-MAY mahnk donk zhuh bwah mwehn duh kah-FAY
Sentence_Translation: I’m short on sleep,so I drink less coffee.

Sentence: Le réveil sonne tôt,mais je me lève.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ʁe.vɛj sɔn to mɛ ʒə mə lɛv/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh ray-VAY son toh meh zhuh muh lev
Sentence_Translation: The alarm rings early,but I get up.

Sentence: Je fais une sieste courte après le déjeuner.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ yn sjɛst kuʁt a.pʁɛ lə de.ʒø.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh een syest koort ah-PREH luh day-zhuh-NAY
Sentence_Translation: I take a short nap after lunch.

Sentence: Mon énergie revient quand je mange correctement.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ ne.nɛʁ.ʒi ʁə.vjɛ̃ kɑ̃ ʒə mɑ̃ʒ kɔ.ʁɛk.tə.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn nay-nair-ZHEE ruh-VYEHN kahn zhuh mahnzh koh-rek-tuh-mahn
Sentence_Translation: My energy returns when I eat properly.

Sentence: L'appétit revient,donc je prépare un repas simple.
Sentence_IPA: /la.pe.ti ʁə.vjɛ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə pʁe.paʁ œ̃ ʁə.pa sɛ̃pl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah-pay-TEE ruh-VYEHN donk zhuh pray-PAR uhn ruh-PAH sehnpl
Sentence_Translation: My appetite comes back,so I make a simple meal.,le + appétit -> l'appétit

Sentence: Ce repas est léger,mais il me plaît.
Sentence_IPA: /sə ʁə.pa ɛ le.ʒɛʁ mɛ il mə plɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: suh ruh-PAH eh lay-ZHAIR meh eel muh pleh
Sentence_Translation: This meal is light,but I like it.

Sentence: Je suis une recette facile pour le dîner.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə sɥi yn ʁə.sɛt fa.sil puʁ lə di.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh swee een ruh-SET fah-SEEL poor luh dee-NAY
Sentence_Translation: I follow an easy recipe for dinner.

Sentence: Il manque un ingrédient,alors j'improvise un peu.
Sentence_IPA: /il mɑ̃k œ̃ n‿ɛ̃.ɡʁe.di.jɑ̃ a.lɔʁ ʒɛ̃.pʁɔ.viz œ̃ pø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: eel mahnk uhn n-an-gray-dee-yahn ah-LOR zhaym-proh-VEEZ uhn puh
Sentence_Translation: One ingredient is missing,so I improvise a bit.

Sentence: Le goût est différent,mais c'est réussi.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ɡu ɛ di.fe.ʁɑ̃ mɛ sɛ ʁe.y.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh goo eh dee-fay-RAHN meh say ray-ew-SEE
Sentence_Translation: The taste is different,but it’s a success.

Sentence: L'odeur du pain chaud remplit la cuisine.
Sentence_IPA: /lɔ.dœʁ dy pɛ̃ ʃo ʁɑ̃.pli la kɥi.zin/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: loh-DER dew pehn shoh rahn-PLEE lah kwee-ZEEN
Sentence_Translation: The smell of warm bread fills the kitchen.

Sentence: Je coupe le pain frais pour tout le monde.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə kup lə pɛ̃ fʁɛ puʁ tu lə mɔ̃d/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh koop luh pehn fray poor too luh mohnd
Sentence_Translation: I cut the fresh bread for everyone.
Sentence_Breakdown: Je(Pron)|I|Pron|/ʒə/|zhuh;coupe|cut|Verb|/kup/|koop;le(Art)|the|Art|/lə/|luh;pain(le)|bread|Noun|/pɛ̃/|pehn;frais|fresh|Adj|/fʁɛ/|fray;pour|for|Prep|/puʁ/|poor;tout le monde|everyone|Pron|/tu lə mɔ̃d/|too luh mohnd

Sentence: Je choisis un fromage doux pour le déjeuner.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃwa.zi œ̃ fʁɔ.maʒ du puʁ lə de.ʒø.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shwah-ZEE uhn froh-MAZH doo poor luh day-zhuh-NAY
Sentence_Translation: I choose a mild cheese for lunch.

Sentence: Je mets du beurre sur le pain grillé.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɛ dy bœʁ syʁ lə pɛ̃ ɡʁi.je/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh meh dew bur sewr luh pehn gree-YAY
Sentence_Translation: I put butter on the toasted bread.

Sentence: J'ajoute de l'huile,puis je mélange doucement.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒa.ʒut də lɥil pɥi ʒə me.lɑ̃ʒ dus.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhah-zhoot duh lweel pwee zhuh may-LAHNZH doos-MAHN
Sentence_Translation: I add oil,then I mix gently.
Elision_Note: je + ajoute -> j'ajoute;de + l' -> de l'

Sentence: Je mets un peu de sel dans la soupe.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɛ œ̃ pø də sɛl dɑ̃ la sup/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh meh uhn puh duh sel dahn lah soop
Sentence_Translation: I put a bit of salt in the soup.

Sentence: Je réduis le sucre,mais je garde le goût.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁe.dɥi lə sykʁ mɛ ʒə ɡaʁd lə ɡu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ray-dwee luh sewkr meh zhuh gard luh goo
Sentence_Translation: I reduce the sugar,but I keep the taste.

Sentence: J'ajoute une épice douce pour varier un peu.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒa.ʒut yn e.pis du puʁ va.ʁje œ̃ pø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhah-zhoot een ay-PEESS doo poor vah-ryay uhn puh
Sentence_Translation: I add a mild spice to vary things a bit.

Sentence: La soupe est chaude,alors j'attends avant de manger.
Sentence_IPA: /la sup ɛ ʃod a.lɔʁ ʒa.tɑ̃ a.vɑ̃ də mɑ̃.ʒe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah soop eh shohd ah-LOR zhah-TAHN ah-VAHN duh mahn-ZHAY
Sentence_Translation: The soup is hot,so I wait before eating.

Sentence: Je prépare une salade simple avec des tomates.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁe.paʁ yn sa.lad sɛ̃pl a.vɛk de tɔ.mat/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pray-PAR een sah-LAD sehnpl ah-vek day toh-MAT
Sentence_Translation: I make a simple salad with tomatoes.

Sentence: Les tomates sont mûres,donc je les coupe.
Sentence_IPA: /le tɔ.mat sɔ̃ myʁ dɔ̃k ʒə le kup/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lay toh-MAT sohn mewr donk zhuh lay koop
Sentence_Translation: The tomatoes are ripe,so I cut them.

Sentence: Je fais cuire des pommes de terre pour ce soir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ kɥiʁ de pɔm də tɛʁ puʁ sə swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh kweer day pom duh tair poor suh swar
Sentence_Translation: I cook potatoes for tonight.

Sentence: Je prends un légume vert pour accompagner le plat.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ le.ɡym vɛʁ puʁ a.kɔ̃.pa.ɲe lə pla/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn uhn lay-GEWM vair poor ah-kon-pah-NYAY luh plah
Sentence_Translation: I take a green vegetable to go with the dish.

Sentence: Je râpe une carotte et j'ajoute du citron.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁap yn ka.ʁɔt e ʒa.ʒut dy si.tʁɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh rahp een kah-ROT ay zhah-zhoot dew see-TRON
Sentence_Translation: I grate a carrot and add some lemon.

Sentence: Le citron est acide,mais ça réveille le goût.
Sentence_IPA: /lə si.tʁɔ̃ ɛ a.sid mɛ sa ʁe.vɛj lə ɡu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh see-TRON eh ah-SEED meh sah ray-VAY luh goo
Sentence_Translation: The lemon is sharp,but it wakes up the taste.

Sentence: Je cuisine du poisson,puis je lave la poêle.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə kɥi.zin dy pwa.sɔ̃ pɥi ʒə lav la pwal/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh kwee-ZEEN dew pwah-SOHN pwee zhuh lav lah pwahl
Sentence_Translation: I cook fish,then I wash the frying pan.

Sentence: La viande est chère,donc j'en achète moins.
Sentence_IPA: /la vjɑ̃d ɛ ʃɛʁ dɔ̃k ʒɑ̃ a.ʃɛt mwɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah vyehnd eh shair donk zhahn ah-SHET mwehn
Sentence_Translation: Meat is expensive,so I buy less of it.

Sentence: Je casse un œuf et je bats doucement.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə kas œ̃ n‿œf e ʒə ba dus.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh kass uhn n-uf ay zhuh bah doos-MAHN
Sentence_Translation: I crack an egg and whisk gently.

Sentence: La poêle accroche,donc je baisse le feu.
Sentence_IPA: /la pwal a.kʁɔʃ dɔ̃k ʒə bɛs lə fø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah pwahl ah-KROSH donk zhuh bess luh fuh
Sentence_Translation: The pan sticks,so I turn the heat down.

Sentence: Je prends la cuillère propre dans le tiroir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ la kɥi.jɛʁ pʁɔp dɑ̃ lə ti.ʁwaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn lah kwee-YAIR prop dahn luh tee-RWAR
Sentence_Translation: I take the clean spoon from the drawer.

Sentence: Le tiroir est coincé,alors je tire fort.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ti.ʁwaʁ ɛ kwɛ̃.se a.lɔʁ ʒə tiʁ fɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh tee-RWAR eh kwehn-SAY ah-LOR zhuh teer for
Sentence_Translation: The drawer is stuck,so I pull hard.

Sentence: Je range le couteau après avoir coupé les légumes.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁɑ̃ʒ lə ku.to a.pʁɛ a.vwaʁ ku.pe le le.ɡym/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh rahnzh luh koo-TOH ah-PREH ah-vwar koo-PAY lay lay-GEWM
Sentence_Translation: I put the knife away after cutting the vegetables.

Sentence: L'assiette est propre,je la pose sur la table.
Sentence_IPA: /la.sjɛt ɛ pʁɔp ʒə la poz syʁ la tabl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah-syet eh prop zhuh lah pohz sewr lah tabl
Sentence_Translation: The plate is clean; I put it on the table.

Sentence: Je remplis un verre d'eau et je bois lentement.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁɑ̃.pli œ̃ vɛʁ do e ʒə bwa lɑ̃t.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh rahn-PLEE uhn vair doh ay zhuh bwah lahn-tmahn
Sentence_Translation: I fill a glass of water and drink slowly.

Sentence: Je plie la serviette et je range la cuisine.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pli la sɛʁ.vjɛt e ʒə ʁɑ̃ʒ la kɥi.zin/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh plee lah sair-VYET ay zhuh rahnzh lah kwee-ZEEN
Sentence_Translation: I fold the towel and tidy the kitchen.

Sentence: La table est prête,on peut enfin manger.
Sentence_IPA: /la tabl ɛ pʁɛt ɔ̃ pø ɑ̃.fɛ̃ mɑ̃.ʒe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah tabl eh pret ohn puh ahn-fehn mahn-ZHAY
Sentence_Translation: The table is ready; we can finally eat.

Sentence: Je tire la chaise et je m'assois doucement.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tiʁ la ʃɛz e ʒə ma.swa dus.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh teer lah shez ay zhuh mah-SWAH doos-MAHN
Sentence_Translation: I pull the chair and sit down gently.

Sentence: Je ferme la fenêtre,car il fait froid.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛʁm la fə.nɛtʁ kaʁ il fɛ fʁwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh fairm lah fuh-NETR kar eel feh frwah
Sentence_Translation: I close the window because it’s cold.

Sentence: Je tire le rideau pour avoir moins de lumière.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tiʁ lə ʁi.do puʁ a.vwaʁ mwɛ̃ də ly.mjɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh teer luh ree-DOH poor ah-vwar mwehn duh lew-MYEHR
Sentence_Translation: I pull the curtain to have less light.

Sentence: La lumière est trop forte,je baisse un peu.
Sentence_IPA: /la ly.mjɛʁ ɛ tʁo fɔʁt ʒə bɛs œ̃ pø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah lew-MYEHR eh troh fort zhuh bess uhn puh
Sentence_Translation: The light is too bright; I turn it down a bit.

Sentence: Je perds ma clé souvent,alors je la range.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pɛʁ ma kle su.vɑ̃ a.lɔʁ ʒə la ʁɑ̃ʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pair mah klay soo-VAHN ah-LOR zhuh lah rahnzh
Sentence_Translation: I often lose my key,so I put it away.

Sentence: La serrure bloque,donc j'appelle un serrurier.
Sentence_IPA: /la sɛ.ʁyʁ blɔk dɔ̃k ʒa.pɛl œ̃ sɛ.ʁy.ʁje/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah sehr-RUR blok donk zhah-PELL uhn sehr-ruhr-YAY
Sentence_Translation: The lock jams,so I call a locksmith.

Sentence: Je cherche un outil simple pour réparer la chaise.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ œ̃ nu.ti sɛ̃pl puʁ ʁe.pa.ʁe la ʃɛz/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh uhn noo-TEE sehnpl poor ray-pah-RAY lah shez
Sentence_Translation: I look for a simple tool to fix the chair.

Sentence: Je prends le marteau et je plante le clou.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ lə maʁ.to e ʒə plɑ̃t lə klu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn luh mar-TOH ay zhuh plahnt luh klooh
Sentence_Translation: I take the hammer and drive in the nail.

Sentence: Le clou tient bien,donc la planche ne bouge pas.
Sentence_IPA: /lə klu tjɛ̃ bjɛ̃ dɔ̃k la plɑ̃ʃ nə buʒ pa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh kloo tyehn byehn donk lah plahnsh nuh boozh pah
Sentence_Translation: The nail holds well,so the plank doesn’t move.

Sentence: Je ponce la planche,puis je nettoie la poussière.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pɔ̃s la plɑ̃ʃ pɥi ʒə nɛ.twa.j la pu.sjɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pons lah plahnsh pwee zhuh net-TWAH-y lah poo-SYEHR
Sentence_Translation: I sand the board,then clean the dust.

Sentence: La poussière revient vite,même après le ménage.
Sentence_IPA: /la pu.sjɛʁ ʁə.vjɛ̃ vit mɛm a.pʁɛ lə me.naʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah poo-SYEHR ruh-VYEHN veet mem ah-PREH luh may-NAZH
Sentence_Translation: Dust comes back quickly,even after cleaning.

Sentence: Je fais le ménage le matin quand j'ai le temps.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ lə me.naʒ lə ma.tɛ̃ kɑ̃ ʒe lə tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh luh may-NAZH luh mah-tehn kahn zhay luh tahn
Sentence_Translation: I do the housework in the morning when I have time.

Sentence: Ce produit nettoie bien,mais il sent fort.
Sentence_IPA: /sə pʁɔ.dɥi nɛ.twa.j bjɛ̃ mɛ il sɑ̃ fɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: suh proh-DWEE net-TWAH-y byehn meh eel sahn for
Sentence_Translation: This product cleans well,but it smells strong.

Sentence: Une odeur étrange reste dans le couloir la nuit.
Sentence_IPA: /yn ɔ.dœʁ etʁɑ̃ʒ ʁɛst dɑ̃ lə ku.lwaʁ la nɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: een oh-DER ay-TRAHNZH rest dahn luh koo-LWAR lah nwee
Sentence_Translation: A strange smell lingers in the hallway at night.

Sentence: Le couloir est sombre,je marche doucement ici.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ku.lwaʁ ɛ sɔ̃bʁ ʒə maʁʃ dus.mɑ̃ i.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh koo-LWAR eh somb(r) zhuh marsh doos-MAHN ee-SEE
Sentence_Translation: The corridor is dark; I walk gently here.

Sentence: L'escalier craque,mais je monte sans bruit.
Sentence_IPA: /lɛs.ka.lje kʁak mɛ ʒə mɔ̃t sɑ̃ bʁɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: less-kah-LYAY krak meh zhuh mont sahn brwee
Sentence_Translation: The stairs creak,but I go up quietly.

Sentence: À l'étage,je trouve enfin une chambre libre.
Sentence_IPA: /a le.taʒ ʒə tʁuv ɑ̃.fɛ̃ yn ʃɑ̃bʁ libʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah lay-TAZH zhuh troov ahn-fehn een shahmbr leebr
Sentence_Translation: Upstairs,I finally find a free room.

Sentence: Le plafond est haut,mais la pièce est froide.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pla.fɔ̃ ɛ o mɛ la pjɛs ɛ fʁwad/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh plah-FON eh oh meh lah pyess eh frwad
Sentence_Translation: The ceiling is high,but the room is cold.

Sentence: Le mur est humide,donc j'aère la pièce.
Sentence_IPA: /lə myʁ ɛ y.mid dɔ̃k ʒa.ɛʁ la pjɛs/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh mewr eh ew-MEED donk zhah-AIR lah pyess
Sentence_Translation: The wall is damp,so I air the room.

Sentence: Le sol est sale,alors je passe la serpillière.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɔl ɛ sal a.lɔʁ ʒə pas la sɛʁ.pi.jɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh sol eh sahl ah-LOR zhuh pahss lah sair-pee-YAIR
Sentence_Translation: The floor is dirty,so I mop.

Sentence: La serpillière sèche dehors après le nettoyage.
Sentence_IPA: /la sɛʁ.pi.jɛʁ sɛʃ də.ɔʁ a.pʁɛ lə nɛ.twa.jaʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah sair-pee-YAIR sesh duh-OR ah-PREH luh net-twah-YAZH
Sentence_Translation: The mop dries outside after the cleaning.

Sentence: La chaleur monte,donc j'ouvre la fenêtre.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʃa.lœʁ mɔ̃t dɔ̃k ʒuvʁ la fə.nɛtʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah shah-LUR mont donk zhoovr lah fuh-netr
Sentence_Translation: The heat rises,so I open the window.

Sentence: Le froid pique,alors je mets un pull.
Sentence_IPA: /lə fʁwa pik a.lɔʁ ʒə mɛ œ̃ pyl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh frwah peek ah-LOR zhuh meh uhn pewl
Sentence_Translation: The cold bites,so I put on a jumper.

Sentence: J'ai un pull chaud,mais il gratte un peu.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe œ̃ pyl ʃo mɛ il ɡʁat œ̃ pø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay uhn pewl shoh meh eel grat uhn puh
Sentence_Translation: I have a warm jumper,but it itches a bit.

Sentence: Je prends mon manteau,car le vent se lève.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ mɔ̃ mɑ̃.to kaʁ lə vɑ̃ sə lɛv/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn mohn mahn-TOH kar luh vahn suh lev
Sentence_Translation: I take my coat because the wind is getting up.

Sentence: Le vent souffle fort,donc je ferme la porte.
Sentence_IPA: /lə vɑ̃ sufl fɔʁ dɔ̃k ʒə fɛʁm la pɔʁt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh vahn soofl for donk zhuh fairm lah port
Sentence_Translation: The wind blows hard,so I shut the door.

Sentence: La pluie tombe,alors je prends un parapluie.
Sentence_IPA: /la plɥi tɔ̃b a.lɔʁ ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ pa.ʁa.plɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah plwee tohmb ah-LOR zhuh prahn uhn pah-rah-plwee
Sentence_Translation: The rain falls,so I take an umbrella.

Sentence: La neige reste au sol,mais la route tient.
Sentence_IPA: /la nɛʒ ʁɛst o sɔl mɛ la ʁut tjɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah nezh rest oh sol meh lah root tyehn
Sentence_Translation: The snow stays on the ground,but the road holds.

Sentence: L'orage approche,donc on rentre rapidement à l'intérieur.
Sentence_IPA: /lɔ.ʁaʒ a.pʁɔʃ dɔ̃k ɔ̃ ʁɑ̃tʁ ʁa.pi.də.mɑ̃ a lɛ̃.te.ʁjœʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: loh-RAZH ah-PROSH donk ohn rahntr rah-pee-duh-mahn ah lan-tay-RYUR
Sentence_Translation: The storm is coming,so we go inside quickly.

Sentence: Le soleil sort enfin,et tout devient plus clair.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɔ.lɛj sɔʁ ɑ̃.fɛ̃ e tu də.vjɛ̃ ply klɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh soh-LAY sor ahn-fehn ay too duh-VYEHN plew klair
Sentence_Translation: The sun comes out at last,and everything gets brighter.

Sentence: Un nuage passe,mais il ne pleut pas.
Sentence_IPA: /œ̃ nɥaʒ pas mɛ il nə plø pa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: uhn new-AZH pahss meh eel nuh pluh pah
Sentence_Translation: A cloud passes,but it doesn’t rain.

Sentence: Le ciel devient gris,donc je reste près d'ici.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sjɛl də.vjɛ̃ ɡʁi dɔ̃k ʒə ʁɛst pʁɛ di.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh syel duh-VYEHN gree donk zhuh rest preh dee-SEE
Sentence_Translation: The sky turns grey,so I stay nearby.

Sentence: Le gris du ciel rend la ville plus calme.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ɡʁi dy sjɛl ʁɑ̃ la vil ply kalm/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh gree dew syel rahn lah veel plew calm
