Sentence_Translation: The grey sky makes the city calmer.

Sentence: Le bruit baisse un peu quand la nuit tombe.
Sentence_IPA: /lə bʁɥi bɛs œ̃ pø kɑ̃ la nɥi tɔ̃b/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh brwee bess uhn puh kahn lah nwee tohmb
Sentence_Translation: The noise drops a bit when night falls.

Sentence: Le silence fait du bien après une journée chargée.
Sentence_IPA: /lə si.lɑ̃s fɛ dy bjɛ̃ a.pʁɛ yn ʒuʁ.ne ʃaʁ.ʒe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh see-LAHNSS feh dew byehn ah-PREH een zhoor-NAY shar-ZHAY
Sentence_Translation: Silence does you good after a busy day.

Sentence: Sa voix tremble,mais il continue à parler.
Sentence_IPA: /sa vwa tʁɑ̃bl mɛ il kɔ̃.ti.ny a paʁ.le/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: sah vwah trahnbl meh eel kon-tee-NEW ah parl-AY
Sentence_Translation: His voice trembles,but he keeps talking.

Sentence: Le son est faible,donc je monte le volume.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɔ̃ n‿ɛ fɛbl dɔ̃k ʒə mɔ̃t lə vɔ.lym/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh sohn nef fehbl donk zhuh mont luh voh-LUHM
Sentence_Translation: The sound is quiet,so I turn the volume up.

Sentence: Le volume est trop haut,alors je baisse.
Sentence_IPA: /lə vɔ.lym ɛ tʁo o a.lɔʁ ʒə bɛs/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh voh-LUHM eh troh oh ah-LOR zhuh bess
Sentence_Translation: The volume is too loud,so I turn it down.

Sentence: La musique me détend quand je rentre le soir.
Sentence_IPA: /la my.zik mə de.tɑ̃ kɑ̃ ʒə ʁɑ̃tʁ lə swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah mew-ZEEK muh day-TAHN kahn zhuh rahntr luh swar
Sentence_Translation: Music relaxes me when I come home in the evening.

Sentence: Cette chanson me rappelle des vacances en France.
Sentence_IPA: /sɛt ʃɑ̃.sɔ̃ mə ʁa.pɛl de va.kɑ̃s ɑ̃ fʁɑ̃s/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: set shahn-SOHN muh rah-PELL day vah-KAHNS ahn frahns
Sentence_Translation: This song reminds me of holidays in France.

Sentence: Je regarde un film simple après le dîner.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁə.ɡaʁd œ̃ film sɛ̃pl a.pʁɛ lə di.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ruh-GARD uhn feelm sehnpl ah-PREH luh dee-NAY
Sentence_Translation: I watch a simple film after dinner.

Sentence: Cette série est courte,donc je continue encore.
Sentence_IPA: /sɛt se.ʁi ɛ kuʁt dɔ̃k ʒə kɔ̃.ti.ny ɑ̃.kɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: set say-REE eh koort donk zhuh kon-tee-NEW ahn-kor
Sentence_Translation: This series is short,so I keep going.

Sentence: Je lis un livre calme avant de dormir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə li œ̃ livʁ kalm a.vɑ̃ də dɔʁ.miʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh lee uhn leevr calm ah-VAHN duh dor-MEER
Sentence_Translation: I read a quiet book before sleeping.

Sentence: Je tourne la page,puis je relis la phrase.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tuʁn la paʒ pɥi ʒə ʁə.li la fʁaz/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh toorn lah pazh pwee zhuh ruh-LEE lah frahz
Sentence_Translation: I turn the page,then reread the sentence.

Sentence: Cette phrase est claire,mais elle est longue.
Sentence_IPA: /sɛt fʁaz ɛ klɛʁ mɛ ɛl ɛ lɔ̃ɡ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: set frahz eh klair meh ell eh long
Sentence_Translation: This sentence is clear,but it is long.

Sentence: Je note un mot nouveau dans mon carnet.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə nɔt œ̃ mo nu.vo dɑ̃ mɔ̃ kaʁ.nɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh not uhn moh noo-VOH dahn mohn kar-NAY
Sentence_Translation: I write down a new word in my notebook.

Sentence: Mon carnet reste ouvert sur la table.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ kaʁ.nɛ ʁɛst u.vɛʁ syʁ la tabl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn kar-NAY rest oo-VAIR sewr lah tabl
Sentence_Translation: My notebook stays open on the table.

Sentence: Je cherche mon stylo noir dans le sac.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ mɔ̃ sti.lo nwaʁ dɑ̃ lə sak/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh mohn stee-LOH nwar dahn luh sak
Sentence_Translation: I look for my black pen in the bag.

Sentence: Le crayon casse alors j'en prends un autre.
Sentence_IPA: /lə kʁɛ.jɔ̃ kas a.lɔʁ ʒɑ̃ pʁɑ̃ œ̃ notʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh kray-YON kass ah-LOR zhahn prahn uhn otr
Sentence_Translation: The pencil breaks so I take another one.

Sentence: J'utilise une gomme blanche pour corriger vite.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒy.ti.liz yn ɡɔm blɑ̃ʃ puʁ kɔ.ʁi.ʒe vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhew-tee-LEEZ een gom blahnsh poor koh-ree-ZHAY veet
Sentence_Translation: I use a white eraser to correct quickly.

Sentence: Je ferme l'enveloppe et j'écris l'adresse clairement.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛʁm lɑ̃.və.lɔp e ʒe.kʁi la.dʁɛs klɛʁ.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh fairm lahn-vuh-lop ay zhay-KREE lah-DRESS klair-mahn
Sentence_Translation: I seal the envelope and write the address clearly.

Sentence: L'adresse est illisible donc je demande confirmation.
Sentence_IPA: /la.dʁɛs ɛ i.li.zibl dɔ̃k ʒə də.mɑ̃d kɔ̃.fiʁ.ma.sjɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah-dress eh ee-lee-ZEEBL donk zhuh duh-mahnd kon-feer-ma-SYOHN
Sentence_Translation: The address is illegible so I ask for confirmation.

Sentence: Mon téléphone vibre mais je ne réponds pas.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ te.le.fɔn vibʁ mɛ ʒə nə ʁe.pɔ̃ pa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn tay-lay-FON veebr meh zhuh nuh ray-PON pah
Sentence_Translation: My phone vibrates but I do not answer.

Sentence: Je reçois un appel tard puis je rappelle demain.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁə.swa œ̃ na.pɛl taʁ pɥi ʒə ʁa.pɛl də.mɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ruh-SWA uhn nah-PELL tar pwee zhuh rah-PELL duh-mehn
Sentence_Translation: I get a late call then I call back tomorrow.

Sentence: La batterie est faible je cherche un chargeur.
Sentence_IPA: /la ba.tʁi ɛ fɛbl ʒə ʃɛʁʃ œ̃ ʃaʁ.ʒœʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah bah-TREE eh fehbl zhuh shairsh uhn shar-ZHUR
Sentence_Translation: The battery is low so I look for a charger.

Sentence: Le chargeur marche enfin et l'écran s'allume.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ʃaʁ.ʒœʁ maʁʃ ɑ̃.fɛ̃ e le.kʁɑ̃ sa.lym/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh shar-ZHUR marsh ahn-fehn ay lay-krahn sah-LUHM
Sentence_Translation: The charger works at last and the screen lights up.

Sentence: L'écran est fissuré mais il fonctionne encore.
Sentence_IPA: /le.kʁɑ̃ ɛ fi.sy.ʁe mɛ il fɔ̃k.sjɔn ɑ̃.kɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lay-krahn eh fee-sew-RAY meh eel fonk-SYON ahn-kor
Sentence_Translation: The screen is cracked but it still works.

Sentence: Je prends une photo nette avec mon téléphone.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ yn fo.to nɛt a.vɛk mɔ̃ te.le.fɔn/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn een foh-TOH net ah-vek mohn tay-lay-fon
Sentence_Translation: I take a sharp photo with my phone.

Sentence: Cette image paraît floue sur mon écran.
Sentence_IPA: /sɛt i.maʒ pa.ʁɛ flu syʁ mɔ̃ ne.kʁɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: set ee-MAZH pah-RAY floo sewr mohn nay-krahn
Sentence_Translation: This image looks blurry on my screen.

Sentence: Je sauvegarde le fichier avant de fermer l'ordinateur.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə so.və.ɡaʁd lə fi.ʃje a.vɑ̃ də fɛʁ.me lɔʁ.di.na.tœʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh soh-vuh-GARD luh fee-SHYAY ah-VAHN duh fair-MAY lor-dee-nah-TUR
Sentence_Translation: I save the file before shutting the computer.

Sentence: Mon ordinateur est lent donc je redémarre tout.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ n‿ɔʁ.di.na.tœʁ ɛ lɑ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə ʁe.de.maʁ tu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn nor-dee-nah-TUR eh lahn donk zhuh ray-day-MAR too
Sentence_Translation: My computer is slow so I restart everything.

Sentence: Le clavier est sale et je le nettoie doucement.
Sentence_IPA: /lə kla.vje ɛ sal e ʒə lə nɛ.twa.j dus.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh klah-VYAY eh sahl ay zhuh luh net-TWAH-y doos-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The keyboard is dirty and I clean it gently.

Sentence: La souris ne répond plus alors je change de pile.
Sentence_IPA: /la su.ʁi nə ʁe.pɔ̃ ply a.lɔʁ ʒə ʃɑ̃ʒ də pil/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah soo-REE nuh ray-PON plew ah-LOR zhuh shahnzh duh peel
Sentence_Translation: The mouse no longer responds so I change the battery.

Sentence: Je n'ai plus de pile alors je vais au magasin.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ne ply də pil a.lɔʁ ʒə vɛ o ma.ɡa.zɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh nay plew duh peel ah-LOR zhuh veh oh mah-gah-zehn
Sentence_Translation: I have no battery left so I go to the shop.

Sentence: Le magasin ferme tôt donc j'arrive avant huit.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ma.ɡa.zɛ̃ fɛʁm to dɔ̃k ʒa.ʁiv a.vɑ̃ ɥit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh mah-gah-ZEHN fairm toh donk zhah-REEV ah-VAHN weet
Sentence_Translation: The shop closes early so I arrive before eight.

Sentence: Le prix semble juste mais je compare encore.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pʁi sɑ̃bl ʒyst mɛ ʒə kɔ̃.paʁ ɑ̃.kɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh pree sahmbl zheust meh zhuh kon-PAR ahn-kor
Sentence_Translation: The price seems fair but I compare again.

Sentence: Je n'ai pas assez d'argent pour ce billet aujourd'hui.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ne pa a.se daʁ.ʒɑ̃ puʁ sə bi.jɛ o.ʒuʁ.dɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh nay pah ah-say dar-ZHAHN poor suh bee-YEH oh-zhoor-DWEE
Sentence_Translation: I don’t have enough money for that ticket today.

Sentence: Je paie en monnaie,car ma carte ne marche pas.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pɛ ɑ̃ mɔ.nɛ kaʁ ma kaʁt nə maʁʃ pa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh peh ahn mo-NAY kar mah kart nuh marsh pah
Sentence_Translation: I pay in coins because my card doesn’t work.

Sentence: Je garde le ticket au cas où je me trompe.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ɡaʁd lə ti.kɛ o ka u ʒə mə tʁɔ̃p/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh gard luh tee-KAY oh kah oo zhuh muh tromp
Sentence_Translation: I keep the ticket in case I’m mistaken.

Sentence: Le reçu est important,donc je le mets à part.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ʁə.sy ɛ ɛ̃.pɔʁ.tɑ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə lə mɛ a paʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh ruh-SEW eh an-por-TAHN donk zhuh luh meh ah par
Sentence_Translation: The receipt is important,so I set it aside.

Sentence: Je pose le panier lourd près de la caisse.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə poz lə pa.nje lu pʁɛ də la kɛs/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pohz luh pah-NYAY loo preh duh lah kess
Sentence_Translation: I put the heavy basket near the till.

Sentence: La caisse est fermée,alors je change de file.
Sentence_IPA: /la kɛs ɛ fɛʁ.me a.lɔʁ ʒə ʃɑ̃ʒ də fil/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah kess eh fair-MAY ah-LOR zhuh shahnzh duh feel
Sentence_Translation: The till is closed,so I switch queues.

Sentence: Le vendeur me conseille un modèle moins cher.
Sentence_IPA: /lə vɑ̃.dœʁ mə kɔ̃.sɛj œ̃ mɔ.dɛl mwɛ̃ ʃɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh vahn-DER muh kon-SAY uhn moh-DEL mwehn shair
Sentence_Translation: The salesperson suggests a cheaper model to me.

Sentence: Le client devant moi cherche sa carte bancaire.
Sentence_IPA: /lə kli.jɑ̃ də.vɑ̃ mwa ʃɛʁʃ sa kaʁt bɑ̃.kɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh klee-YAHN duh-vahn mwah shairsh sah kart bahn-kair
Sentence_Translation: The customer in front of me looks for his bank card.

Sentence: Je demande une réduction,mais ce n'est pas possible.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə də.mɑ̃d yn ʁe.dyk.sjɔ̃ mɛ sə nɛ pa pɔ.sibl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh duh-mahnd een ray-dewk-SYOHN meh suh neh pah poh-SEEBL
Sentence_Translation: I ask for a discount,but it isn’t possible.

Sentence: Je vais payer maintenant,puis je rentre chez moi.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vɛ pe.je mɛ̃.tə.nɑ̃ pɥi ʒə ʁɑ̃tʁ ʃe mwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh veh pay-YAY mehn-tuh-nahn pwee zhuh rahntr shay mwah
Sentence_Translation: I’m going to pay now,then I go home.

Sentence: Je préfère attendre ici plutôt que courir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁe.fɛʁ a.tɑ̃dʁ i.si ply.to kə ku.ʁiʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pray-FAIR ah-TAHN-druh ee-SEE plew-TOH kuh koo-REER
Sentence_Translation: I prefer to wait here rather than run.

Sentence: Je dois courir un peu pour attraper le bus.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə dwa ku.ʁiʁ œ̃ pø puʁ a.tʁa.pe lə bys/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh dwah koo-REER uhn puh poor ah-trah-PAY luh bewss
Sentence_Translation: I have to run a bit to catch the bus.

Sentence: J'arrive à attraper le bus juste à temps.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒa.ʁiv a a.tʁa.pe lə bys ʒyst a tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhah-REEV ah ah-trah-PAY luh bewss zheust ah tahn
Sentence_Translation: I manage to catch the bus just in time.

Sentence: Le retour est long,mais la route est calme.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ʁə.tuʁ ɛ lɔ̃ mɛ la ʁut ɛ kalm/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh ruh-TOOR eh long meh lah root eh calm
Sentence_Translation: The return trip is long,but the road is quiet.

Sentence: Je prends un chemin différent pour éviter la foule.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ ʃə.mɛ̃ di.fe.ʁɑ̃ puʁ e.vi.te la ful/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn uhn shuh-MEHN dee-fay-RAHN poor ay-vee-TAY lah fool
Sentence_Translation: I take a different route to avoid the crowd.

Sentence: La foule est dense,donc je marche plus vite.
Sentence_IPA: /la ful ɛ dɑ̃s dɔ̃k ʒə maʁʃ ply vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah fool eh dahnss donk zhuh marsh plew veet
Sentence_Translation: The crowd is dense,so I walk faster.

Sentence: Le trottoir est étroit,je fais attention aux vélos.
Sentence_IPA: /lə tʁɔ.twaʁ ɛ e.tʁwa ʒə fɛ a.tɑ̃.sjɔ̃ o ve.lo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh troh-TWAR eh ay-TWAH zhuh feh ah-tahn-SYON oh vay-LOH
Sentence_Translation: The pavement is narrow; I watch out for bikes.

Sentence: Je prends mon vélo quand il ne pleut pas.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ mɔ̃ ve.lo kɑ̃ il nə plø pa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn mohn vay-LOH kahn eel nuh pluh pah
Sentence_Translation: I take my bike when it isn’t raining.

Sentence: Le feu passe au vert,donc je traverse maintenant.
Sentence_IPA: /lə fø pas o vɛʁ dɔ̃k ʒə tʁa.vɛʁs mɛ̃.tə.nɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh fuh pahss oh vair donk zhuh trah-VAIRSS mehn-tuh-nahn
Sentence_Translation: The light turns green,so I cross now.

Sentence: Je veux traverser la rue sans courir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vø tʁa.vɛʁ.se la ʁy sɑ̃ ku.ʁiʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh vuh trah-vair-SAY lah rew sahn koo-REER
Sentence_Translation: I want to cross the street without running.

Sentence: La rue est mouillée,donc je marche prudemment.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁy ɛ mu.je dɔ̃k ʒə maʁʃ pʁy.dɑ̃.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah rew eh moo-YAY donk zhuh marsh prew-dahn-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The street is wet,so I walk carefully.

Sentence: Au coin de la rue,je vois la boulangerie.
Sentence_IPA: /o kwɛ̃ də la ʁy ʒə vwa la bu.lɑ̃.ʒə.ʁi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: oh kwehn duh lah rew zhuh vwah lah boo-lahn-zhuh-REE
Sentence_Translation: On the corner of the street,I see the bakery.

Sentence: La boulangerie ouvre tôt et l'odeur est forte.
Sentence_IPA: /la bu.lɑ̃.ʒə.ʁi uvʁ to e lɔ.dœʁ ɛ fɔʁt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah boo-lahn-zhuh-REE oovr toh ay loh-der eh fort
Sentence_Translation: The bakery opens early and the smell is strong.

Sentence: La boucherie est fermée,mais le marché est ouvert.
Sentence_IPA: /la buʃ.ʁi ɛ fɛʁ.me mɛ lə maʁ.ʃe ɛ u.vɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah boosh-REE eh fair-MAY meh luh mar-SHAY eh oo-VAIR
Sentence_Translation: The butcher’s is closed,but the market is open.,le + marché -> l' (no

Sentence: Au marché,je choisis des fruits bien mûrs.
Sentence_IPA: /o maʁ.ʃe ʒə ʃwa.zi de fʁɥi bjɛ̃ myʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: oh mar-SHAY zhuh shwah-ZEE day frwee byehn mewr
Sentence_Translation: At the market,I choose very ripe fruit.

Sentence: Ce fruit est sucré,donc j'en prends deux.
Sentence_IPA: /sə fʁɥi ɛ sy.kʁe dɔ̃k ʒɑ̃ pʁɑ̃ dø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: suh frwee eh sew-KRAY donk zhahn prahn duh
Sentence_Translation: This fruit is sweet,so I take two.

Sentence: Je mange des lentilles,c'est bon et pas cher.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɑ̃ʒ de lɑ̃.tij sɛ bɔ̃ e pa ʃɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh mahnzh day lahn-TEE yay say bohn ay pah shair
Sentence_Translation: I eat lentils; it’s good and not expensive.

Sentence: Les lentilles cuisent vite et ça sent bon.
Sentence_IPA: /le lɑ̃.tij kɥiz vit e sa sɑ̃ bɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lay lahn-TEE(y) kweez veet ay sah sahn bohn
Sentence_Translation: Lentils cook quickly and they smell nice.

Sentence: Avec du pain,le repas devient plus complet.
Sentence_IPA: /a.vɛk dy pɛ̃ lə ʁə.pa də.vjɛ̃ ply kɔ̃.plɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah-vek dew pehn luh ruh-PAH duh-VYEHN plew kon-PLEH
Sentence_Translation: With bread,the meal becomes more complete.

Sentence: C'est un repas complet,donc je suis content.
Sentence_IPA: /sɛ œ̃ ʁə.pa kɔ̃.plɛ dɔ̃k ʒə sɥi kɔ̃.tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: say uhn ruh-PAH kon-PLEH donk zhuh swee kon-TAHN
Sentence_Translation: It’s a complete meal,so I’m pleased.,ce + est -> c'est

Sentence: Je prends le métro chaque jour pour travailler.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ lə me.tʁo ʃak ʒuʁ puʁ tʁa.va.je/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn luh may-TROH shak zhoor poor trah-vah-YAY
Sentence_Translation: I take the metro every day to work.

Sentence: La station est près du parc central.
Sentence_IPA: /la sta.sjɔ̃ ɛ pʁɛ dy paʁk sɑ̃.tʁal/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah stah-SYON eh preh dew park sahn-trahl
Sentence_Translation: The station is near the central park.

Sentence: Au parc les enfants jouent après l'école.
Sentence_IPA: /o paʁk le zɑ̃.fɑ̃ ʒu a.pʁɛ le.kɔl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: oh park lay zahn-fahn zhoo ah-preh lay-kol
Sentence_Translation: In the park the children play after school.

Sentence: Je m'assois sur un banc pour lire.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ma.swa syʁ œ̃ bɑ̃ puʁ liʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh mah-SWAH sewr uhn bahn poor leer
Sentence_Translation: I sit on a bench to read.

Sentence: Je lis le journal pendant le petit déjeuner.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə li lə ʒuʁ.nal pɑ̃.dɑ̃ lə pə.ti de.ʒø.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh lee luh zhoor-NAL pahn-dahn luh puh-TEE day-zhuh-NAY
Sentence_Translation: I read the newspaper during breakfast.

Sentence: Mon voisin parle doucement dans l'escalier.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ vwa.zɛ̃ paʁl dus.mɑ̃ dɑ̃ lɛs.ka.lje/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn vwah-ZEHN parl doos-mahn dahn less-kah-LYAY
Sentence_Translation: My neighbour speaks softly in the stairwell.

Sentence: Je laisse un message clair sur la boîte vocale.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə lɛs œ̃ me.saʒ klɛʁ syʁ la bwat vɔ.kal/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh less uhn meh-SAZH klair sewr lah bwat voh-KAL
Sentence_Translation: I leave a clear message on the voicemail.

Sentence: Sa réponse arrive vite mais elle est brève.
Sentence_IPA: /sa ʁe.pɔ̃s a.ʁiv vit mɛ ɛl ɛ bʁɛv/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: sah ray-PONS ah-REEV veet meh ell eh brev
Sentence_Translation: His reply arrives quickly but it is brief.

Sentence: La réunion commence à neuf heures précises.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁe.y.njɔ̃ kɔ.mɑ̃s a nœv œʁ pʁe.siz/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah ray-ew-NYON koh-mahnss ah nuhv ur pray-SEE(z)
Sentence_Translation: The meeting starts at nine o’clock sharp.

Sentence: Je range le dossier dans mon sac noir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁɑ̃ʒ lə dɔ.sje dɑ̃ mɔ̃ sak nwaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh rahnzh luh doh-SYAY dahn mohn sak nwar
Sentence_Translation: I put the folder away in my black bag.

Sentence: Je paie la facture en ligne ce matin.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pɛ la fak.tyʁ ɑ̃ liɲ sə ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh peh lah fak-TEWR ahn leen suh mah-tehn
Sentence_Translation: I pay the bill online this morning.

Sentence: Le courrier arrive tard donc je vérifie demain.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ku.ʁje a.ʁiv taʁ dɔ̃k ʒə ve.ʁi.fi də.mɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh koo-RYAY ah-REEV tar donk zhuh vay-ree-FEE duh-mehn
Sentence_Translation: The post arrives late so I check tomorrow.

Sentence: J'attends un colis important depuis trois jours.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒa.tɑ̃ œ̃ kɔ.li ɛ̃.pɔʁ.tɑ̃ də.pɥi tʁwa ʒuʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhah-tahn uhn koh-LEE an-por-TAHN duh-pwee trwah zhoor
Sentence_Translation: I have been waiting for an important parcel for three days.,je + attends -> j'attends

Sentence: J'oublie mon mot de passe trop souvent.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒu.bli mɔ̃ mo də pas tʁo su.vɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhoo-BLEE mohn moh duh pahs troh soo-vahn
Sentence_Translation: I forget my password too often.

Sentence: Je mets mon casque avant l'appel vidéo.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɛ mɔ̃ kask a.vɑ̃ la.pɛl ve.de.o/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh meh mohn kask ah-vahn lah-PELL vay-day-oh
Sentence_Translation: I put on my headset before the video call.

Sentence: J'achète un cadeau simple pour mon père.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒa.ʃɛt œ̃ ka.do sɛ̃pl puʁ mɔ̃ pɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhah-SHET uhn kah-DOH sehnpl poor mohn pair
Sentence_Translation: I buy a simple gift for my father.

Sentence: Son anniversaire approche alors je prépare une carte.
Sentence_IPA: /sɔ̃ na.ni.vɛʁ.sɛʁ a.pʁɔʃ a.lɔʁ ʒə pʁe.paʁ yn kaʁt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: sohn nah-nee-vair-SAIR ah-PROSH ah-LOR zhuh pray-PAR een kart
Sentence_Translation: His birthday is coming so I prepare a card.

Sentence: Je poste la carte demain si j'ai le temps.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pɔst la kaʁt də.mɛ̃ si ʒe lə tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh post lah kart duh-mehn see zhay luh tahn
Sentence_Translation: I post the card tomorrow if I have time.

Sentence: Le trajet paraît long mais la vue aide.
Sentence_IPA: /lə tʁa.ʒɛ pa.ʁɛ lɔ̃ mɛ la vy ɛd/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh trah-ZHAY pah-RAY long meh lah vew ed
Sentence_Translation: The journey seems long but the view helps.

Sentence: La vue sur la rivière me calme beaucoup.
Sentence_IPA: /la vy syʁ la ʁi.vjɛʁ mə kalm bo.ku/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah vew sewr lah ree-VYEHR muh calm boh-koo
Sentence_Translation: The view of the river calms me a lot.

Sentence: Je traverse le pont pour aller au quai.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tʁa.vɛʁs lə pɔ̃ puʁ a.le o kɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh trah-vairss luh pohn poor ah-lay oh keh
Sentence_Translation: I cross the bridge to go to the quay.

Sentence: Le quai est glissant,alors je marche lentement.
Sentence_IPA: /lə kɛ ɛ ɡli.sɑ̃ a.lɔʁ ʒə maʁʃ lɑ̃t.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh keh eh glee-SAHN ah-lor zhuh marsh lahnt-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The quay is slippery,so I walk slowly.

Sentence: Le bateau va partir,donc je monte vite.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ba.to va paʁ.tiʁ dɔ̃k ʒə mɔ̃t vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh bah-TOH vah par-TEER donk zhuh mont veet
Sentence_Translation: The boat is going to leave,so I get on quickly.

Sentence: Je porte mon bagage lourd jusqu'à la gare.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pɔʁt mɔ̃ ba.ɡaʒ luʁ ʒys.ka la ɡaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh port mohn bah-GAZH loor zheuss-kah lah gar
Sentence_Translation: I carry my heavy luggage as far as the station.

Sentence: À la gare,j'attends le prochain train.
Sentence_IPA: /a la ɡaʁ ʒa.tɑ̃ lə pʁɔ.ʃɛ̃ tʁɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah lah gar zhah-tahn luh proh-shehn trehn
Sentence_Translation: At the station,I wait for the next train.

Sentence: Ma valise roule mal sur les pavés mouillés.
Sentence_IPA: /ma va.liz ʁul mal syʁ le pa.ve mu.je/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah vah-LEEZ rool mahl sewr lay pah-VAY moo-YAY
Sentence_Translation: My suitcase rolls badly over the wet cobbles.

Sentence: J'ai une réservation pour deux nuits à l'hôtel.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe yn ʁe.zɛʁ.va.sjɔ̃ puʁ dø nɥi a lo.tɛl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay een ray-zair-vah-SYON poor duh nwee ah loh-TEL
Sentence_Translation: I have a booking for two nights at the hotel.

Sentence: L'hôtel est calme,mais la chambre est petite.
Sentence_IPA: /lo.tɛl ɛ kalm mɛ la ʃɑ̃bʁ ɛ pə.tit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: loh-TEL eh calm meh lah shahmbr eh puh-TEET
Sentence_Translation: The hotel is quiet,but the room is small.

Sentence: Je regarde le plan pour trouver la sortie.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁə.ɡaʁd lə plɑ̃ puʁ tʁu.ve la sɔʁ.ti/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ruh-gard luh plahn poor troo-VAY lah sor-TEE
Sentence_Translation: I look at the map to find the exit.

Sentence: La sortie est à gauche,près du panneau.
Sentence_IPA: /la sɔʁ.ti ɛ a ɡoʃ pʁɛ dy pa.no/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah sor-TEE eh ah gosh preh dew pah-NOH
Sentence_Translation: The exit is on the left,near the sign.

Sentence: Le panneau indique la sortie du métro.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pa.no ɛ̃.dik la sɔʁ.ti dy me.tʁo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh pah-NOH an-DEEK lah sor-TEE dew may-TROH
Sentence_Translation: The sign shows the metro exit.

Sentence: Tourne à droite après la pharmacie.
Sentence_IPA: /tuʁn a dʁwat a.pʁɛ la faʁ.ma.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: toorn ah drwat ah-PREH lah far-ma-SEE
Sentence_Translation: Turn right after the pharmacy.

Sentence: La gauche est plus rapide aujourd'hui.
Sentence_IPA: /la ɡoʃ ɛ ply ʁa.pid o.ʒuʁ.dɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah gosh eh plew rah-PEED oh-zhoor-DWEE
Sentence_Translation: Left is quicker today.

Sentence: L'entrée est fermée prends la porte derrière.
Sentence_IPA: /lɑ̃.tʁe ɛ fɛʁ.me pʁɑ̃ la pɔʁt dɛ.ʁjɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lahn-TRAY eh fair-MAY prahn lah port deh-RYEHR
Sentence_Translation: The entrance is closed take the door behind.

Sentence: La pharmacie ouvre tard le dimanche ici.
Sentence_IPA: /la faʁ.ma.si uvʁ taʁ lə di.mɑ̃ʃ i.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah far-ma-SEE oovr tar luh dee-MAHNSH ee-SEE
Sentence_Translation: The pharmacy opens late on Sundays here.

Sentence: Le médecin écoute et pose deux questions.
Sentence_IPA: /lə med.sɛ̃ e.kut e poz dø kɛs.tjɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh med-SEHN ay-KOOT ay pohz duh kes-TYON
Sentence_Translation: The doctor listens and asks two questions.

Sentence: Je pose une question puis j'attends dehors.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə poz yn kɛs.tjɔ̃ pɥi ʒa.tɑ̃ də.ɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pohz een kes-TYON pwee zhah-tahn duh-OR
Sentence_Translation: I ask a question then I wait outside.

Sentence: J'ai besoin d'un avis simple aujourd'hui.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe bə.zwɛ̃ dœ̃ na.vi sɛ̃pl o.ʒuʁ.dɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay buh-ZWEHN dun nah-VEE sehnpl oh-zhoor-DWEE
Sentence_Translation: I need a simple opinion today.

Sentence: Ton conseil m'aide beaucoup dans ce choix.
Sentence_IPA: /tɔ̃ kɔ̃.sɛj mɛd bo.ku dɑ̃ sə ʃwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: tohn kon-SAY med boh-koo dahn suh shwah
Sentence_Translation: Your advice helps me a lot in this choice.

Sentence: Le choix est difficile mais je décide vite.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ʃwa ɛ di.fi.sil mɛ ʒə de.sid vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh shwah eh dee-fee-SEEL meh zhuh day-SEED veet
Sentence_Translation: The choice is difficult but I decide quickly.

Sentence: Je vais décider après avoir réfléchi longtemps.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vɛ de.si.de a.pʁɛ a.vwaʁ ʁe.fle.ʃi lɔ̃.tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh veh day-see-DAY ah-preh ah-vwar ray-flay-SHEE lohn-tahn
Sentence_Translation: I am going to decide after thinking for a long time.

Sentence: Ce rêve étrange revient chaque nuit chez moi.
Sentence_IPA: /sə ʁɛv etʁɑ̃ʒ ʁə.vjɛ̃ ʃak nɥi ʃe mwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: suh rev ay-TRAHNZH ruh-VYEHN shak nwee shay mwah
Sentence_Translation: This strange dream comes back every night at my place.

Sentence: Un souvenir heureux reste dans ma tête.
Sentence_IPA: /œ̃ su.və.niʁ ø.ʁø ʁɛst dɑ̃ ma tɛt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: uhn soo-vuh-NEER uh-ruh rest dahn mah tet
Sentence_Translation: A happy memory stays in my head.

Sentence: Ma tête est pleine de petites idées.
Sentence_IPA: /ma tɛt ɛ plɛn də pə.tit i.de/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah tet eh plen duh puh-TEET ee-DAY
Sentence_Translation: My head is full of small ideas.

Sentence: J'ai une idée claire pour demain matin.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe yn i.de klɛʁ puʁ də.mɛ̃ ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay een ee-DAY klair poor duh-mehn mah-tehn
Sentence_Translation: I have a clear idea for tomorrow morning.

Sentence: Mon projet avance vite,mais il manque du temps.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ pʁɔ.ʒɛ a.vɑ̃s vit mɛ il mɑ̃k dy tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn proh-ZHAY ah-vahnss veet meh eel mahngk dew tahn
Sentence_Translation: My project is moving fast,but it lacks time.

Sentence: Je dois planifier ma semaine avant lundi.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə dwa pla.ni.fje ma sə.mɛn a.vɑ̃ lœ̃.di/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh dwah plah-nee-FYAY mah suh-men ah-vahn luhn-dee
Sentence_Translation: I must plan my week before Monday.

Sentence: Mon agenda est plein,donc je refuse un rendez-vous.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ na.ʒɑ̃.da ɛ plɛ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə ʁə.fyz œ̃ ʁɑ̃.de.vu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn nah-zhahn-DAH eh plehn donk zhuh ruh-FUHZ uhn rahn-day-VOO
Sentence_Translation: My diary is full,so I refuse an appointment.

Sentence: J'ai un rendez-vous à midi chez le dentiste.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe œ̃ ʁɑ̃.de.vu a mi.di ʃe lə dɑ̃.tist/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay uhn rahn-day-VOO ah mee-DEE shay luh dahn-TEEST
Sentence_Translation: I have an appointment at noon at the dentist’s.

Sentence: Je suis en retard,donc j'envoie un message.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə sɥi ɑ̃ ʁə.taʁ dɔ̃k ʒɑ̃.vwa œ̃ me.saʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh swee ahn ruh-tar donk zhahn-vwah uhn meh-sazh
Sentence_Translation: I’m late,so I send a message.

Sentence: Le dentiste travaille vite,mais il est gentil.
Sentence_IPA: /lə dɑ̃.tist tʁa.vaj vit mɛ il ɛ ʒɑ̃.ti/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh dahn-TEEST trah-VYE veet meh eel eh zhahn-TEE
Sentence_Translation: The dentist works quickly,but he is kind.

Sentence: Je n'aime pas la piqûre,mais ça passe vite.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə nɛm pa la pi.kyʁ mɛ sa pas vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh nem pah lah pee-KEWR meh sah pahss veet
Sentence_Translation: I don’t like the injection,but it passes quickly.

Sentence: Le traitement dure une semaine et je reste prudent.
Sentence_IPA: /lə tʁɛt.mɑ̃ dyʁ yn sə.mɛn e ʒə ʁɛst pʁy.dɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh tret-MAHN dewr een suh-men ay zhuh rest prew-dahn
Sentence_Translation: The treatment lasts a week and I stay cautious.

Sentence: La douleur diminue,donc je reprends le sport.
Sentence_IPA: /la du.lœʁ di.mi.ny dɔ̃k ʒə ʁə.pʁɑ̃ lə spɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah doo-LUR dee-mee-NEW donk zhuh ruh-prahn luh spor
Sentence_Translation: The pain decreases,so I take up sport again.

Sentence: Le sport me fait du bien après le travail.
Sentence_IPA: /lə spɔʁ mə fɛ dy bjɛ̃ a.pʁɛ lə tʁa.vaj/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh spor muh feh dew byehn ah-preh luh trah-vye
Sentence_Translation: Sport does me good after work.

Sentence: Je fais une petite course avant de rentrer.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ yn pə.tit kuʁs a.vɑ̃ də ʁɑ̃.tʁe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh een puh-TEET koors ah-vahn duh rahn-TRAY
Sentence_Translation: I run a small errand before going home.

Sentence: Je vais au supermarché pour acheter du lait.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vɛ o sy.pɛʁ.maʁ.ʃe puʁ aʃ.te dy lɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh veh oh sew-pair-mar-SHAY poor ash-TAY dew leh
Sentence_Translation: I go to the supermarket to buy some milk.

Sentence: Le lait est froid,donc je le mets au frigo.
Sentence_IPA: /lə lɛ ɛ fʁwa dɔ̃k ʒə lə mɛ o fʁi.ɡo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh leh eh frwah donk zhuh luh meh oh free-GOH
Sentence_Translation: The milk is cold,so I put it in the fridge.

Sentence: Le frigo est vide,alors je fais les courses.
Sentence_IPA: /lə fʁi.ɡo ɛ vid a.lɔʁ ʒə fɛ le kuʁs/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh free-GOH eh veed ah-LOR zhuh feh lay koors
Sentence_Translation: The fridge is empty,so I do the shopping.

Sentence: Je coupe un peu de beurre pour le pain.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə kup œ̃ pø də bœʁ puʁ lə pɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh koop uhn puh duh bur poor luh pehn
Sentence_Translation: I cut a bit of butter for the bread.

Sentence: Le fromage sent fort,mais j'aime ça.
Sentence_IPA: /lə fʁɔ.maʒ sɑ̃ fɔʁ mɛ ʒɛm sa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh froh-MAZH sahn for meh zhem sah
Sentence_Translation: The cheese smells strong,but I like that.

Sentence: Je cuisine un œuf dur pour le déjeuner.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə kɥi.zin œ̃ n‿œf dyʁ puʁ lə de.ʒø.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh kwee-ZEEN uhn uf dewr poor luh day-zhuh-NAY
Sentence_Translation: I cook a hard-boiled egg for lunch.

Sentence: Je mets du sel,puis je goûte encore.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɛ dy sɛl pɥi ʒə ɡut ɑ̃.kɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh meh dew sel pwee zhuh goot ahn-kor
Sentence_Translation: I add salt,then I taste again.

Sentence: Je prends moins de sucre dans mon café.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ mwɛ̃ də sy.kʁ dɑ̃ mɔ̃ ka.fe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn mwehn duh sew-kr dahn mohn kah-FAY
Sentence_Translation: I take less sugar in my coffee.

Sentence: Le café est trop chaud,donc j'attends un peu.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ka.fe ɛ tʁo ʃo dɔ̃k ʒa.tɑ̃ œ̃ pø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh kah-FAY eh troh shoh donk zhah-tahn uhn puh
Sentence_Translation: The coffee is too hot,so I wait a bit.

Sentence: Je bois du thé léger après le repas.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə bwa dy te le.ʒe a.pʁɛ lə ʁə.pa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh bwah dew tay lay-zhay ah-preh luh ruh-pah
Sentence_Translation: I drink light tea after the meal.

Sentence: Le jus d'orange est frais ce matin.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ʒy dɔ.ʁɑ̃ʒ ɛ fʁɛ sə ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh zhew dor-ahnzh eh freh suh mah-tehn
Sentence_Translation: The orange juice is fresh this morning.

Sentence: J'ouvre une bouteille d'eau avant de partir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒuvʁ yn bu.tɛj do a.vɑ̃ də paʁ.tiʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhoovr een boo-tay(y) doh ah-vahn duh par-teer
Sentence_Translation: I open a bottle of water before leaving.

Sentence: Peux-tu remplir un verre pour moi,s'il te plaît ?
Sentence_IPA: /pø ty ʁɑ̃.pliʁ œ̃ vɛʁ puʁ mwa sil tə plɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: puh tew rahn-PLEER uhn vair poor mwah seel tuh pleh
Sentence_Translation: Can you fill a glass for me,please?
Sentence_Breakdown: Peux-tu|can you|Verb|/pø ty/|puh tew;remplir|fill|Verb|/ʁɑ̃.pliʁ/|rahn-pleer;un(Art)|a|Art|/œ̃/|uhn;verre(un)|glass|Noun|/vɛʁ/|vair;pour|for|Prep|/puʁ/|poor;moi(Pron)|me|Pron|/mwa/|mwah;s'il te plaît|please|Expr|/sil tə plɛ/|seel-tuh-pleh

Sentence: L'assiette est chaude,fais attention en servant.
Sentence_IPA: /la.sjɛt ɛ ʃod fɛ a.tɑ̃.sjɔ̃ ɑ̃ sɛʁ.vɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah-syet eh shohd feh ah-tahn-syon ahn sair-vahn
Sentence_Translation: The plate is hot,be careful when serving.

Sentence: Le couteau coupe bien,mais je vais lentement.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ku.to kup bjɛ̃ mɛ ʒə vɛ lɑ̃t.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh koo-toh koop byehn meh zhuh veh lahnt-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The knife cuts well,but I go slowly.

Sentence: La fourchette tombe,alors je la lave.
Sentence_IPA: /la fuʁ.ʃɛt tɔ̃b a.lɔʁ ʒə la lav/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah foor-shet tohmb ah-lor zhuh lah lahv
Sentence_Translation: The fork falls,so I wash it.

Sentence: Je prends la cuillère pour mélanger la soupe.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ la kɥi.jɛʁ puʁ me.lɑ̃.ʒe la sup/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn lah kwee-yehr poor may-lahn-zhay lah soop
Sentence_Translation: I take the spoon to stir the soup.

Sentence: La soupe est prête,et la cuisine sent bon.
Sentence_IPA: /la sup ɛ pʁɛt e la kɥi.zin sɑ̃ bɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah soop eh pret ay lah kwee-zeen sahn bohn
Sentence_Translation: The soup is ready,and the kitchen smells good.

Sentence: Je suis la recette,puis j'ajoute les épices.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə sɥi la ʁə.sɛt pɥi ʒa.ʒut le ze.pis/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh swee lah ruh-set pwee zhah-zhoot lay zay-peess
Sentence_Translation: I follow the recipe,then I add the spices.

Sentence: Je coupe l'oignon et je pleure un peu.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə kup lɔ.ɲɔ̃ e ʒə plœʁ œ̃ pø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh koop loh-NYON ay zhuh plur uhn puh
Sentence_Translation: I cut the onion and I cry a bit.

Sentence: La tomate est mûre et je la mange crue.
Sentence_IPA: /la tɔ.mat ɛ myʁ e ʒə la mɑ̃ʒ kʁy/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah toh-mat eh mewr ay zhuh lah mahnzh crew
Sentence_Translation: The tomato is ripe and I eat it raw.

Sentence: Le riz cuit doucement pendant que je prépare la sauce.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ʁi kɥi dus.mɑ̃ pɑ̃.dɑ̃ kə ʒə pʁe.paʁ la sos/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh ree kwee doos-mahn pahn-dahn kuh zhuh pray-par lah sos
Sentence_Translation: The rice cooks slowly while I prepare the sauce.

Sentence: Cette sauce simple va bien avec le poulet.
Sentence_IPA: /sɛt sos sɛ̃pl va bjɛ̃ a.vɛk lə pu.lɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: set sos sehnpl vah byehn ah-vek luh poo-LEH
Sentence_Translation: This simple sauce goes well with chicken.

Sentence: Le poulet rôti reste chaud dans le four.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pu.lɛ ʁo.ti ʁɛst ʃo dɑ̃ lə fuʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh poo-LEH roh-TEE rest shoh dahn luh foor
Sentence_Translation: The roast chicken stays hot in the oven.

Sentence: Le poisson frais sent la mer ce matin.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pwa.sɔ̃ fʁɛ sɑ̃ la mɛʁ sə ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh pwah-SOHN freh sahn lah mair suh mah-tehn
Sentence_Translation: The fresh fish smells of the sea this morning.

Sentence: J'ajoute de l'huile puis je mélange lentement.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒa.ʒut də lɥil pɥi ʒə me.lɑ̃ʒ lɑ̃t.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhah-zhoot duh lweel pwee zhuh may-lahnzh lahnt-mahn
Sentence_Translation: I add oil then I stir slowly.

Sentence: Je mets du poivre noir sur la soupe chaude.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɛ dy pwavʁ nwaʁ syʁ la sup ʃod/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh meh dew pwavr nwar sewr lah soop shohd
Sentence_Translation: I put black pepper on the hot soup.

Sentence: Ma tasse est grande et elle garde la chaleur.
Sentence_IPA: /ma tas ɛ ɡʁɑ̃d e ɛl ɡaʁd la ʃa.lœʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah tass eh grahnd ay ell gard lah shah-lur
Sentence_Translation: My cup is big and it keeps the heat.

Sentence: Je prends un bol et je verse le lait.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ bɔl e ʒə vɛʁs lə lɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn uhn bol ay zhuh vairss luh leh
Sentence_Translation: I take a bowl and I pour the milk.

Sentence: Je plie la serviette propre après le repas.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pli la sɛʁ.vjɛt pʁɔp a.pʁɛ lə ʁə.pa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh plee lah sair-vyet prop ah-preh luh ruh-pah
Sentence_Translation: I fold the clean napkin after the meal.

Sentence: La nappe blanche protège la table pendant le dîner.
Sentence_IPA: /la nap blɑ̃ʃ pʁɔ.tɛʒ la tabl pɑ̃.dɑ̃ lə di.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah nap blahnsh proh-tezh lah tabl pahn-dahn luh dee-nay
Sentence_Translation: The white tablecloth protects the table during dinner.

Sentence: Le four chauffe vite mais je surveille toujours.
Sentence_IPA: /lə fuʁ ʃof vit mɛ ʒə syʁ.vɛj tu.ʒuʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh foor shof veet meh zhuh sewr-VAY(y) too-zhoor
Sentence_Translation: The oven heats quickly but I always keep an eye on it.

Sentence: J'ouvre la fenêtre parce qu'il fait trop chaud.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒuvʁ la fə.nɛtʁ paʁs kil fɛ tʁo ʃo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhoovr lah fuh-netr pars keel feh troh shoh
Sentence_Translation: I open the window because it is too hot.

Sentence: Le rideau bouge quand le vent entre ici.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ʁi.do buʒ kɑ̃ lə vɑ̃ ɑ̃tʁ i.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh ree-DOH boozh kahn luh vahn ahntr ee-see
Sentence_Translation: The curtain moves when the wind comes in here.

Sentence: La lampe éclaire bien la pièce le soir.
Sentence_IPA: /la lɑ̃p e.klɛʁ bjɛ̃ la pjɛs lə swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lahmp ay-klair byehn lah pyess luh swar
Sentence_Translation: The lamp lights the room well in the evening.

Sentence: L'ampoule grille alors je la remplace vite.
Sentence_IPA: /lɑ̃.pul ɡʁij a.lɔʁ ʒə la ʁɑ̃.plas vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lahn-pool gree(y) ah-lor zhuh lah rahn-plass veet
Sentence_Translation: The bulb blows so I replace it quickly.

Sentence: Le mur est blanc et il réfléchit la lumière.
Sentence_IPA: /lə myʁ ɛ blɑ̃ e il ʁe.fle.ʃi la ly.mjɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh mewr eh blahn ay eel ray-flay-SHEE lah lew-MYEHR
Sentence_Translation: The wall is white and it reflects the light.

Sentence: Le sol est glissant donc je marche doucement.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɔl ɛ ɡli.sɑ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə maʁʃ dus.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh sol eh glee-sahn donk zhuh marsh doos-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The floor is slippery so I walk gently.

Sentence: Le plafond est haut et la pièce paraît plus grande.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pla.fɔ̃ ɛ o e la pjɛs pa.ʁɛ ply ɡʁɑ̃d/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh plah-FOHN eh oh ay lah pyess pah-RAY plew grahnd
Sentence_Translation: The ceiling is high and the room seems bigger.

Sentence: J'entends un bruit léger derrière la porte.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒɑ̃.tɑ̃ œ̃ bʁɥi le.ʒe dɛ.ʁjɛʁ la pɔʁt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhahn-tahn uhn bree lay-zhay deh-RYEHR lah port
Sentence_Translation: I hear a faint noise behind the door.

Sentence: Le silence revient quand tout le monde dort.
Sentence_IPA: /lə si.lɑ̃s ʁə.vjɛ̃ kɑ̃ tu lə mɔ̃d dɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh see-LAHNSS ruh-VYEHN kahn too luh mohnd dor
Sentence_Translation: Silence returns when everyone is asleep.

Sentence: Sa voix est calme,donc je l'écoute mieux.
Sentence_IPA: /sa vwa ɛ kalm dɔ̃k ʒə le.kut mjø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: sah vwah eh calm donk zhuh lay-KOOT myuh
Sentence_Translation: His voice is calm,so I listen better.
Elision_Note: je + écoute -> j'écoute;je + le -> je l'

Sentence: Je fais attention à chaque parole importante.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ a.tɑ̃.sjɔ̃ a ʃak pa.ʁɔl ɛ̃.pɔʁ.tɑ̃t/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh ah-tahn-syon ah shak pah-ROL an-por-TAHNT
Sentence_Translation: I pay attention to every important word.

Sentence: Cette histoire drôle me fait rire longtemps.
Sentence_IPA: /sɛt is.twaʁ dʁol mə fɛ ʁiʁ lɔ̃.tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: set ees-TWAR drol muh feh reer lohn-tahn
Sentence_Translation: This funny story makes me laugh for a long time.

Sentence: Je lis un livre court avant de dormir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə li œ̃ livʁ kuʁ a.vɑ̃ də dɔʁ.miʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh lee uhn leevr koor ah-vahn duh dor-MEER
Sentence_Translation: I read a short book before sleeping.

Sentence: Je tourne la page,puis je relis la phrase.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tuʁn la paʒ pɥi ʒə ʁə.li la fʁaz/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh toorn lah pazh pwee zhuh ruh-LEE lah frahz
Sentence_Translation: I turn the page,then I reread the sentence.

Sentence: La phrase est longue,mais elle est claire.
Sentence_IPA: /la fʁaz ɛ lɔ̃ɡ mɛ ɛl ɛ klɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah frahz eh longg meh ell eh klair
Sentence_Translation: The sentence is long,but it is clear.

Sentence: Je cherche mon stylo bleu sur le bureau.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ mɔ̃ sti.lo blø syʁ lə by.ʁo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh mohn stee-LOH bluh sewr luh bew-ROH
Sentence_Translation: I look for my blue pen on the desk.

Sentence: Mon bureau est rangé,donc je travaille mieux.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ by.ʁo ɛ ʁɑ̃.ʒe dɔ̃k ʒə tʁa.va.j mjø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn bew-ROH eh rahn-ZHAY donk zhuh trah-vyeh myuh
Sentence_Translation: My desk is tidy,so I work better.

Sentence: Mon ordinateur redémarre,donc je sauvegarde tout.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ n‿ɔʁ.di.na.tœʁ ʁe.de.maʁ dɔ̃k ʒə so.və.ɡaʁd tu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn or-dee-nah-TER ray-day-MAR donk zhuh soh-vuh-gard too
Sentence_Translation: My computer restarts,so I save everything.

Sentence: L'écran est trop sombre,je monte la luminosité.
Sentence_IPA: /le.kʁɑ̃ ɛ tʁo sɔ̃bʁ ʒə mɔ̃t la ly.mi.no.zi.te/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lay-krahn eh troh sohmbr zhuh mont lah lew-mee-noh-zee-TAY
Sentence_Translation: The screen is too dark; I turn up the brightness.

Sentence: Le clavier colle un peu,donc je le nettoie.
Sentence_IPA: /lə kla.vje kɔl œ̃ pø dɔ̃k ʒə lə ne.twa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh klah-VYAY koll uhn puh donk zhuh luh net-TWAH
Sentence_Translation: The keyboard is a bit sticky,so I clean it.

Sentence: La souris ne répond pas,alors je change les piles.
Sentence_IPA: /la su.ʁi nə ʁe.pɔ̃ pa a.lɔʁ ʒə ʃɑ̃ʒ le pil/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah soo-REE nuh ray-pon pah ah-lor zhuh shahnzh lay peel
Sentence_Translation: The mouse doesn’t respond,so I change the batteries.

Sentence: La connexion coupe parfois,donc j'utilise mes données.
Sentence_IPA: /la kɔ.nɛk.sjɔ̃ kup paʁ.fwa dɔ̃k ʒy.ti.liz me dɔ.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah koh-neks-SYON koop par-fwah donk zhew-tee-leez may doh-NAY
Sentence_Translation: The connection drops sometimes,so I use my data.

Sentence: Ce mot revient souvent dans le texte.
Sentence_IPA: /sə mo ʁə.vjɛ̃ su.vɑ̃ dɑ̃ lə tɛkst/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: suh moh ruh-VYEHN soo-vahn dahn luh tekst
Sentence_Translation: This word comes up often in the text.

Sentence: Le texte est court,mais il est utile.
Sentence_IPA: /lə tɛkst ɛ kuʁ mɛ il ɛ y.til/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh tekst eh koor meh eel eh ew-TEEL
Sentence_Translation: The text is short,but it is useful.

Sentence: Je réponds à ton email dès que possible.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁe.pɔ̃ a tɔ̃n i.mɛl dɛ kə pɔ.sibl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ray-pon ah tohn ee-mel deh kuh poh-SEEBL
Sentence_Translation: I reply to your email as soon as possible.

Sentence: Je fais un appel rapide avant de sortir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ œ̃ na.pɛl ʁa.pid a.vɑ̃ də sɔʁ.tiʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh uhn ah-pell rah-PEED ah-vahn duh sor-TEER
Sentence_Translation: I make a quick call before going out.

Sentence: Je note le numéro sur un coin de papier.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə nɔt lə ny.me.ʁo syʁ œ̃ kwɛ̃ də pa.pje/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh not luh new-may-ROH sewr uhn kwehn duh pah-PYAY
Sentence_Translation: I write the number down on a corner of paper.

Sentence: Mon téléphone sonne,mais je ne réponds pas.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ te.le.fɔn sɔ̃n mɛ ʒə nə ʁe.pɔ̃ pa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn tay-lay-FON son meh zhuh nuh ray-pon pah
Sentence_Translation: My phone rings,but I do not answer.

Sentence: La batterie est faible,donc je recharge tout de suite.
Sentence_IPA: /la ba.tʁi ɛ fɛbl dɔ̃k ʒə ʁə.ʃaʁʒ tu də sɥit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah bah-TREE eh febl donk zhuh ruh-SHARZH too duh sweet
Sentence_Translation: The battery is low,so I recharge straight away.

Sentence: Je cherche le chargeur dans mon sac à dos.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ lə ʃaʁ.ʒœʁ dɑ̃ mɔ̃ sak a do/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh luh shar-ZHUR dahn mohn sak ah doh
Sentence_Translation: I look for the charger in my backpack.

Sentence: Je prends une photo nette près de la rivière.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ yn fɔ.to nɛt pʁɛ də la ʁi.vjɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn een foh-toh net preh duh lah ree-VYEHR
Sentence_Translation: I take a sharp photo near the river.

Sentence: L'image est floue,alors je recommence calmement.
Sentence_IPA: /li.maʒ ɛ flu a.lɔʁ ʒə ʁə.kɔ.mɑ̃s kal.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lee-mazh eh floo ah-lor zhuh ruh-koh-mahnss calm-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The image is blurry,so I try again calmly.

Sentence: Je pose mon manteau sur la chaise du salon.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə poz mɔ̃ mɑ̃.to syʁ la ʃɛz dy sa.lɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pohz mohn mahn-TOH sewr lah shehz dew sah-LON
Sentence_Translation: I put my coat on the living-room chair.

Sentence: Le canapé est confortable,donc je reste ici.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ka.na.pe ɛ kɔ̃.fɔʁ.tabl dɔ̃k ʒə ʁɛst i.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh kah-nah-PAY eh kon-for-TABL donk zhuh rest ee-SEE
Sentence_Translation: The sofa is comfortable,so I stay here.

Sentence: Je regarde le miroir avant de sortir ce soir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁə.ɡaʁd lə mi.ʁwaʁ a.vɑ̃ də sɔʁ.tiʁ sə swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ruh-gard luh mee-RWAR ah-vahn duh sor-TEER suh swar
Sentence_Translation: I look in the mirror before going out tonight.

Sentence: Je prends une douche rapide après le sport.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ yn duʃ ʁa.pid a.pʁɛ lə spɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn een doosh rah-PEED ah-preh luh spor
Sentence_Translation: I take a quick shower after sport.

Sentence: Le savon glisse,donc je le tiens mieux.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sa.vɔ̃ ɡlis dɔ̃k ʒə lə tjɛ̃ mjø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh sah-VOHN gleess donk zhuh luh tyehn myuh
Sentence_Translation: The soap slips,so I hold it better.

Sentence: Je mets du shampooing puis je rince bien.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɛ dy ʃɑ̃.pwɛ̃ pɥi ʒə ʁɛ̃s bjɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh meh dew shahn-pwehn pwee zhuh ranss byehn
Sentence_Translation: I put shampoo on then I rinse well.

Sentence: Mon pantalon est trop long,donc je le replie.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ pɑ̃.ta.lɔ̃ ɛ tʁo lɔ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə lə ʁə.pli/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn pahn-tah-LON eh troh lon donk zhuh luh ruh-PLEE
Sentence_Translation: My trousers are too long,so I fold them up.

Sentence: Ma chemise est froissée,alors je la repasse.
Sentence_IPA: /ma ʃə.miz ɛ fʁwa.se a.lɔʁ ʒə la ʁə.pas/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah shuh-MEEZ eh frwah-SAY ah-lor zhuh lah ruh-PASS
Sentence_Translation: Iron my shirt because it is creased.

Sentence: Je nettoie mes chaussures avant d'entrer dans la maison.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ne.twa me ʃo.syʁ a.vɑ̃ dɑ̃.tʁe dɑ̃ la mɛ.zɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh net-TWAH may shoh-SEWR ah-vahn dahn-TRAY dahn lah meh-ZON
Sentence_Translation: I clean my shoes before entering the house.

Sentence: Le magasin est fermé,donc je reviens demain matin.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ma.ɡa.zɛ̃ ɛ fɛʁ.me dɔ̃k ʒə ʁə.vjɛ̃ də.mɛ̃ ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh mah-gah-ZEHN eh fair-MAY donk zhuh ruh-VYEHN duh-mehn mah-tehn
Sentence_Translation: The shop is closed,so I come back tomorrow morning.

Sentence: Le prix est trop élevé,donc je compare ailleurs.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pʁi ɛ tʁo e.le.ve dɔ̃k ʒə kɔ̃.paʁ a.jœʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh pree eh troh ay-lay-VAY donk zhuh kon-PAR ah-yehr
Sentence_Translation: The price is too high,so I compare elsewhere.

Sentence: Je n'ai plus d'argent,donc je fais attention.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə n‿e ply daʁ.ʒɑ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə fɛ a.tɑ̃.sjɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh nay plew dar-ZHAHN donk zhuh feh ah-tahn-syon
Sentence_Translation: I have no money left,so I’m careful.

Sentence: Je vais à la banque pour retirer de l'argent.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vɛ a la bɑ̃k puʁ ʁə.ti.ʁe də laʁ.ʒɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh veh ah lah bahnk poor ruh-tee-RAY duh lar-ZHAHN
Sentence_Translation: I go to the bank to withdraw money.

Sentence: Ma carte bancaire ne marche pas au paiement.
Sentence_IPA: /ma kaʁt bɑ̃.kɛʁ nə maʁʃ pa o pɛ.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah kart bahn-KAIR nuh marsh pah oh pay-mahn
Sentence_Translation: My bank card doesn’t work at the checkout.

Sentence: Le paiement sans contact est plus rapide ici.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pɛ.mɑ̃ sɑ̃ kɔ̃.takt ɛ ply ʁa.pid i.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh pay-mahn sahn kon-takt eh plew rah-PEED ee-SEE
Sentence_Translation: Contactless payment is quicker here.

Sentence: Ma commande arrive demain,donc je reste chez moi.
Sentence_IPA: /ma kɔ.mɑ̃d a.ʁiv də.mɛ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə ʁɛst ʃe mwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah koh-mahnd ah-REEV duh-mehn donk zhuh rest shay mwah
Sentence_Translation: My order arrives tomorrow,so I stay at home.

Sentence: La livraison est en retard,mais je comprends.
Sentence_IPA: /la li.vʁɛ.zɔ̃ ɛ ɑ̃ ʁə.taʁ mɛ ʒə kɔ̃.pʁɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah lee-vreh-ZON eh ahn ruh-tar meh zhuh kon-prahn
Sentence_Translation: The delivery is late,but I understand.

Sentence: Le client pose une question puis il attend.
Sentence_IPA: /lə kli.jɑ̃ poz yn kɛs.tjɔ̃ pɥi il a.tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh klee-YAHN pohz een kes-TYON pwee eel ah-tahn
Sentence_Translation: The customer asks a question then he waits.

Sentence: Le service est rapide,donc je laisse un pourboire.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɛʁ.vis ɛ ʁa.pid dɔ̃k ʒə lɛs œ̃ puʁ.bwaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh sair-VEESS eh rah-PEED donk zhuh less uhn poor-bwar
Sentence_Translation: The service is quick,so I leave a tip.

Sentence: Je donne un pourboire quand le serveur sourit.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə dɔn œ̃ puʁ.bwaʁ kɑ̃ lə sɛʁ.vœʁ su.ʁi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh don uhn poor-bwar kahn luh sair-VEUR soo-REE
Sentence_Translation: I give a tip when the waiter smiles.

Sentence: Le serveur apporte l'eau et le menu rapidement.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɛʁ.vœʁ a.pɔʁt lo e lə mə.ny ʁa.pid.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh sair-VEUR ah-port loh ay luh muh-NEW rah-peed-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The waiter brings the water and the menu quickly.

Sentence: Je lis le menu,puis je choisis un plat.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə li lə mə.ny pɥi ʒə ʃwa.zi œ̃ pla/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh lee luh muh-NEW pwee zhuh shwah-ZEE uhn plah
Sentence_Translation: I read the menu,then I choose a dish.

Sentence: Le plat du jour est simple et bon.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pla dy ʒuʁ ɛ sɛ̃pl e bɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh plah dew zhoor eh sehnpl ay bohn
Sentence_Translation: The dish of the day is simple and good.

Sentence: Je prends une entrée légère avant le plat.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ yn ɑ̃.tʁe le.ʒɛʁ a.vɑ̃ lə pla/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn een ahn-TRAY lay-zhehr ah-vahn luh plah
Sentence_Translation: I have a light starter before the main dish.

Sentence: Le dessert arrive tard,mais il vaut l'attente.
Sentence_IPA: /lə de.sɛʁ a.ʁiv taʁ mɛ il vo la.tɑ̃t/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh day-SAIR ah-REEV tar meh eel voh lah-tahnt
Sentence_Translation: The dessert arrives late,but it’s worth the wait.

Sentence: Je demande l'addition puis je paie calmement.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə də.mɑ̃d la.di.sjɔ̃ pɥi ʒə pɛ kal.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh duh-mahnd lah-dee-SYON pwee zhuh peh calm-mahn
Sentence_Translation: I ask for the bill then I pay calmly.

Sentence: La route est longue,donc je fais une pause.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁut ɛ lɔ̃ɡ dɔ̃k ʒə fɛ yn poz/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah root eh longg donk zhuh feh een pohz
Sentence_Translation: The road is long,so I take a break.

Sentence: Le virage est serré,alors je ralentis beaucoup.
Sentence_IPA: /lə vi.ʁaʒ ɛ sɛ.ʁe a.lɔʁ ʒə ʁa.lɑ̃.ti bo.ku/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh vee-RAZH eh seh-RAY ah-lor zhuh rah-lahn-TEE boh-koo
Sentence_Translation: The bend is tight,so I slow down a lot.

Sentence: Le feu passe au vert,donc j'avance doucement.
Sentence_IPA: /lə fø pas o vɛʁ dɔ̃k ʒa.vɑ̃s dus.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh fuh pahss oh vair donk zhah-vahnss doos-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The light turns green,so I move forward slowly.

Sentence: Le stationnement est cher près du centre-ville.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sta.sjɔ.nə.mɑ̃ ɛ ʃɛʁ pʁɛ dy sɑ̃tʁə.vil/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh stah-syo-nuh-mahn eh shair preh dew sahntr-vil
Sentence_Translation: Parking is expensive near the city centre.

Sentence: Je trouve un parking gratuit derrière le musée.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tʁuv œ̃ paʁ.kiŋ ɡʁa.tɥi dɛ.ʁjɛʁ lə my.ze/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh troov uhn par-king grah-twee deh-RYEHR luh mew-ZAY
Sentence_Translation: I find free parking behind the museum.

Sentence: Le musée ouvre à dix heures ce matin.
Sentence_IPA: /lə my.ze uvʁ a dis œʁ sə ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh mew-ZAY oovr ah deess ur suh mah-tehn
Sentence_Translation: The museum opens at ten o’clock this morning.

Sentence: Je garde mon billet dans ma poche intérieure.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ɡaʁd mɔ̃ bi.jɛ dɑ̃ ma pɔʃ ɛ̃.te.ʁjœʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh gard mohn bee-YAY dahn mah posh an-tay-ryur
Sentence_Translation: I keep my ticket in my inside pocket.

Sentence: La visite dure deux heures et je prends des notes.
Sentence_IPA: /la vi.zit dyʁ dø zœʁ e ʒə pʁɑ̃ de nɔt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah vee-ZEET dewr duh zur ay zhuh prahn day not
Sentence_Translation: The visit lasts two hours and I take notes.

Sentence: Le guide parle clairement et tout le monde écoute.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ɡid paʁl klɛʁ.mɑ̃ e tu lə mɔ̃d e.kut/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh geed parl klair-mahn ay too luh mohnd ay-KOOT
Sentence_Translation: The guide speaks clearly and everyone listens.

Sentence: Je regarde la carte et je cherche le centre.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁə.ɡaʁd la kaʁt e ʒə ʃɛʁʃ lə sɑ̃tʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ruh-gard lah kart ay zhuh shairsh luh sahntr
Sentence_Translation: I look at the map and I look for the centre.

Sentence: Le centre est animé,mais je reste prudent.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɑ̃tʁ ɛ a.ni.me mɛ ʒə ʁɛst pʁy.dɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh sahntr eh ah-nee-MAY meh zhuh rest prew-dahn
Sentence_Translation: The centre is lively,but I stay cautious.

Sentence: Ce quartier est tranquille et les rues sont propres.
Sentence_IPA: /sə kaʁ.tje ɛ tʁɑ̃.kil e le ʁy sɔ̃ pʁɔpʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: suh kar-TYAY eh trahn-keel ay lay rue sohn prohpr
Sentence_Translation: This neighbourhood is quiet and the streets are clean.

Sentence: Mon voisin dit bonjour quand je sors tôt.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ vwa.zɛ̃ di bɔ̃.ʒuʁ kɑ̃ ʒə sɔʁ to/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn vwah-ZEHN dee bohn-ZHOOR kahn zhuh sor toh
Sentence_Translation: My neighbour says hello when I go out early.

Sentence: Ma voisine arrose les plantes chaque matin d'été.
Sentence_IPA: /ma vwa.zin a.ʁoz le plɑ̃t ʃak ma.tɛ̃ de.te/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah vwah-ZEEN ah-rohz lay plant shak mah-tehn day-TAY
Sentence_Translation: My neighbour waters the plants each summer morning.

Sentence: La rue est calme quand il pleut le soir.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁy ɛ kalm kɑ̃ il plø lə swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah rue eh calm kahn eel pleu luh swar
Sentence_Translation: The street is quiet when it rains in the evening.

Sentence: Le trottoir est étroit,donc je marche derrière.
Sentence_IPA: /lə tʁɔ.twaʁ ɛ e.tʁwa dɔ̃k ʒə maʁʃ dɛ.ʁjɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh trot-TWAR eh ay-twah donk zhuh marsh deh-RYEHR
Sentence_Translation: The pavement is narrow,so I walk behind.

Sentence: Je traverse au passage piéton quand c'est possible.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tʁa.vɛʁs o pa.saʒ pje.tɔ̃ kɑ̃ sɛ pɔ.sibl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh trah-vairss oh pah-sazh pyay-TON kahn seh poh-SEEBL
Sentence_Translation: I cross at the crossing when possible.

Sentence: Le carrefour est dangereux,donc je regarde partout.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ka.ʁə.fuʁ ɛ dɑ̃.ʒə.ʁø dɔ̃k ʒə ʁə.ɡaʁd paʁ.tu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh kah-ruh-FOOR eh dahn-zhuh-ruh donk zhuh ruh-gard par-TOO
Sentence_Translation: The junction is dangerous,so I look everywhere.

Sentence: Au coin de la rue,il y a une boulangerie.
Sentence_IPA: /o kwɛ̃ də la ʁy il j‿a yn bu.lɑ̃.ʒə.ʁi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: oh kwehn duh lah rue eel yah een boo-lahn-zhuh-REE
Sentence_Translation: At the street corner,there is a bakery.
Sentence_Breakdown: Au(Prep)|at the|Prep|/o/|oh;coin(le)|corner|Noun|/kwɛ̃/|kweh;n;de|of|Prep|/də/|duh;la(Art)|the|Art|/la/|lah;rue(la)|street|Noun|/ʁy/|rue;il y a|there is|Expr|/il j a/|eel y ah;une(Art)|a|Art|/yn/|een;boulangerie(la)|bakery|Noun|/bu.lɑ̃.ʒə.ʁi/|boo-lahn-zhuh-ree

Sentence: La boulangerie vend du pain chaud le matin.
Sentence_IPA: /la bu.lɑ̃.ʒə.ʁi vɑ̃ dy pɛ̃ ʃo lə ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah boo-lahn-zhuh-REE vahn dew pehn shoh luh mah-tehn
Sentence_Translation: The bakery sells warm bread in the morning.

Sentence: Je prends un pain frais et je rentre vite.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ pɛ̃ fʁɛ e ʒə ʁɑ̃tʁ vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn uhn pehn freh ay zhuh rahntr veet
Sentence_Translation: I take fresh bread and go home quickly.

Sentence: La pâtisserie est chère,mais c'est pour une fête.
Sentence_IPA: /la pɑ.tis.ʁi ɛ ʃɛʁ mɛ sɛ puʁ yn fɛt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah pah-teess-REE eh shair meh seh poor een fet
Sentence_Translation: The pastry shop is expensive,but it’s for a celebration.

Sentence: La fête commence tôt,donc j'arrive à l'heure.
Sentence_IPA: /la fɛt kɔ.mɑ̃s to dɔ̃k ʒa.ʁiv a lœʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah fet koh-mahnss toh donk zhah-reev ah lur
Sentence_Translation: The party starts early,so I arrive on time.
Elision_Note: je + arrive -> j'arrive;à + l' -> à l'

Sentence: Je choisis un cadeau simple pour mon ami.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃwa.zi œ̃ ka.do sɛ̃pl puʁ mɔ̃ na.mi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shwah-ZEE uhn kah-DOH sehnpl poor mohn nah-MEE
Sentence_Translation: I choose a simple gift for my friend.

Sentence: Mon ami arrive tard,mais il appelle avant.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ na.mi a.ʁiv taʁ mɛ il a.pɛl a.vɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn nah-MEE ah-reev tar meh eel ah-pell ah-vahn
Sentence_Translation: My friend arrives late,but he calls first.

Sentence: Mon amie rit souvent quand je raconte ça.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ na.mi ʁi su.vɑ̃ kɑ̃ ʒə ʁa.kɔ̃t sa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn nah-MEE ree soo-vahn kahn zhuh rah-kont sah
Sentence_Translation: My (female) friend often laughs when I tell that.

Sentence: Les invités arrivent,donc je prépare des verres.
Sentence_IPA: /le zɛ̃.vi.te a.ʁiv dɔ̃k ʒə pʁe.paʁ de vɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lay zan-vee-TAY ah-reev donk zhuh pray-par day vair
Sentence_Translation: The guests arrive,so I prepare some glasses.

Sentence: Ma voiture démarre mal,donc je vérifie l'huile.
Sentence_IPA: /ma vwa.tyʁ de.maʁ mal dɔ̃k ʒə ve.ʁi.fi lɥil/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah vwah-TEWR day-mar mahl donk zhuh vay-ree-FEE lweel
Sentence_Translation: My car starts badly,so I check the oil.

Sentence: Je mets de l'essence avant de prendre l'autoroute.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɛ də le.sɑ̃s a.vɑ̃ də pʁɑ̃dʁ lo.to.ʁut/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh meh duh lay-sahnss ah-vahn duh prahn-dr loh-toh-root
Sentence_Translation: I put petrol in before taking the motorway.

Sentence: L'autoroute est chargée,alors je prends une sortie.
Sentence_IPA: /lo.to.ʁut ɛ ʃaʁ.ʒe a.lɔʁ ʒə pʁɑ̃ yn sɔʁ.ti/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: loh-toh-root eh shar-ZHAY ah-lor zhuh prahn een sor-TEE
Sentence_Translation: The motorway is busy,so I take an exit.

Sentence: Je prends la sortie suivante et je suis les panneaux.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ la sɔʁ.ti sɥi.vɑ̃t e ʒə sɥi le pa.no/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn lah sor-TEE swee-vahnt ay zhuh swee lay pah-NOH
Sentence_Translation: I take the next exit and follow the signs.

Sentence: Le panneau indique la gare,donc je tourne à droite.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pa.no ɛ̃.dik la ɡaʁ dɔ̃k ʒə tuʁn a dʁwat/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh pah-NOH an-deek lah gar donk zhuh toorn ah drwat
Sentence_Translation: The sign points to the station,so I turn right.

Sentence: La gare est loin,donc je pars un peu tôt.
Sentence_IPA: /la ɡaʁ ɛ lwɛ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə paʁ œ̃ pø to/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah gar eh lwehn donk zhuh par uhn puh toh
Sentence_Translation: The station is far,so I leave a bit early.

Sentence: J'attends sur le quai et je regarde l'heure.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒa.tɑ̃ syʁ lə kɛ e ʒə ʁə.ɡaʁd lœʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhah-tahn sewr luh keh ay zhuh ruh-gard lur
Sentence_Translation: I wait on the platform and check the time.

Sentence: Le train arrive enfin,donc je monte rapidement.
Sentence_IPA: /lə tʁɛ̃ a.ʁiv ɑ̃.fɛ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə mɔ̃t ʁa.pi.də.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh trehn ah-REEV ahn-fehn donk zhuh mont rah-pee-duh-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The train finally arrives,so I get on quickly.

Sentence: Je trouve une place libre près de la fenêtre.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tʁuv yn plas libʁ pʁɛ də la fə.nɛtʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh troov een plass leebr preh duh lah fuh-netr
Sentence_Translation: I find a free seat near the window.

Sentence: Je porte la valise lourde jusqu'au taxi.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pɔʁt la va.liz luʁd ʒys.ko tak.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh port lah vah-LEEZ loord zhews-koh tak-SEE
Sentence_Translation: I carry the heavy suitcase to the taxi.

Sentence: Mon sac est trop lourd,donc je fais une pause.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ sak ɛ tʁo luʁ dɔ̃k ʒə fɛ yn poz/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn sak eh troh loor donk zhuh feh een pohz
Sentence_Translation: My bag is too heavy,so I take a break.

Sentence: Le voyage est long,mais la vue est belle.
Sentence_IPA: /lə vwa.jaʒ ɛ lɔ̃ mɛ la vy ɛ bɛl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh vwah-YAZH eh lon meh lah vue eh bell
Sentence_Translation: The journey is long,but the view is beautiful.

Sentence: L'hôtel est propre et le personnel est poli.
Sentence_IPA: /lo.tɛl ɛ pʁɔp e lə pɛʁ.sɔ.nɛl ɛ pɔ.li/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: loh-tel eh prop ay luh pair-soh-NEL eh poh-LEE
Sentence_Translation: The hotel is clean and the staff are polite.

Sentence: La chambre est petite,mais elle est silencieuse.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʃɑ̃bʁ ɛ pə.tit mɛ ɛl ɛ si.lɑ̃.sjøz/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah shahn-bruh eh puh-teet meh ell eh see-lahn-syuhz
Sentence_Translation: The room is small,but it is quiet.

Sentence: Le lit est confortable,donc je dors vite.
Sentence_IPA: /lə li ɛ kɔ̃.fɔʁ.tabl dɔ̃k ʒə dɔʁ vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh lee eh kon-for-tabl donk zhuh dor veet
Sentence_Translation: The bed is comfortable,so I fall asleep quickly.

Sentence: Mon oreiller est mou,mais il tient bien.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ n‿ɔ.ʁɛ.je ɛ mu mɛ il tjɛ̃ bjɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn oh-reh-YAY eh moo meh eel tyehn byehn
Sentence_Translation: My pillow is soft,but it supports well.

Sentence: Je prends une couverture parce qu'il fait froid ici.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ yn ku.vɛʁ.tyʁ paʁs kil fɛ fʁwa i.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn een koo-vair-tewr pars keel feh frwah ee-see
Sentence_Translation: I take a blanket because it is cold here.

Sentence: J'ai un rendez-vous à midi,donc je pars tôt.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe œ̃ ʁɑ̃.de.vu a mi.di dɔ̃k ʒə paʁ to/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay uhn rahn-day-voo ah mee-DEE donk zhuh par toh
Sentence_Translation: I have an appointment at noon,so I leave early.

Sentence: Le médecin écoute,puis il pose deux questions.
Sentence_IPA: /lə med.sɛ̃ e.kut pɥi il poz dø kɛs.tjɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh med-sehn ay-KOOT pwee eel pohz duh kes-TYON
Sentence_Translation: The doctor listens,then he asks two questions.

Sentence: Je vais à la pharmacie pour acheter des pansements.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vɛ a la faʁ.ma.si puʁ aʃ.te de pɑ̃s.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh veh ah lah far-mah-SEE poor ash-TAY day pahnss-mahn
Sentence_Translation: I go to the pharmacy to buy plasters.

Sentence: Le médicament aide,mais je lis la notice.
Sentence_IPA: /lə me.di.ka.mɑ̃ ɛd mɛ ʒə li la nɔ.tis/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh may-dee-kah-mahn ed meh zhuh lee lah noh-teess
Sentence_Translation: The medicine helps,but I read the leaflet.

Sentence: J'ai de la fièvre,donc je reste au lit.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe də la fjɛvʁ dɔ̃k ʒə ʁɛst o li/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay duh lah fyevr donk zhuh rest oh lee
Sentence_Translation: I have a fever,so I stay in bed.

Sentence: Cette douleur revient souvent,alors je me repose.
Sentence_IPA: /sɛt du.lœʁ ʁə.vjɛ̃ su.vɑ̃ a.lɔʁ ʒə mə ʁə.poz/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: set doo-LUR ruh-vyehn soo-vahn ah-lor zhuh muh ruh-pohz
Sentence_Translation: This pain comes back often,so I rest.

Sentence: J'ai un rhume,donc je bois chaud et je dors.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe œ̃ ʁym dɔ̃k ʒə bwa ʃo e ʒə dɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay uhn room donk zhuh bwah shoh ay zhuh dor
Sentence_Translation: I have a cold,so I drink something hot and sleep.

Sentence: La toux me réveille,donc je prends du miel.
Sentence_IPA: /la tu mə ʁe.vɛj dɔ̃k ʒə pʁɑ̃ dy mjɛl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah too muh ray-VAY(y) donk zhuh prahn dew myel
Sentence_Translation: The cough wakes me,so I take some honey.

Sentence: Le miel est doux,mais je n'en prends pas trop.
Sentence_IPA: /lə mjɛl ɛ du mɛ ʒə nɑ̃ pʁɑ̃ pa tʁo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh myel eh doo meh zhuh nahn prahn pah troh
Sentence_Translation: Honey is sweet,but I don’t take too much.

Sentence: Le temps change vite,donc je prends un parapluie.
Sentence_IPA: /lə tɑ̃ ʃɑ̃ʒ vit dɔ̃k ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ pa.ʁa.plɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh tahn shahnzh veet donk zhuh prahn uhn pah-rah-plwee
Sentence_Translation: The weather changes quickly,so I take an umbrella.

Sentence: La pluie tombe fort,donc je rentre rapidement.
Sentence_IPA: /la plɥi tɔ̃b fɔʁ dɔ̃k ʒə ʁɑ̃tʁ ʁa.pi.də.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah plwee tomm for donk zhuh rahntr rah-pee-duh-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The rain falls hard,so I go home quickly.

Sentence: La neige couvre la route et je roule lentement.
Sentence_IPA: /la nɛʒ kuvʁ la ʁut e ʒə ʁul lɑ̃t.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah nezh koovr lah root ay zhuh rool lahnt-mahn
Sentence_Translation: Snow covers the road and I drive slowly.

Sentence: Le vent souffle fort,donc je ferme la fenêtre.
Sentence_IPA: /lə vɑ̃ sufl fɔʁ dɔ̃k ʒə fɛʁm la fə.nɛtʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh vahn soofl for donk zhuh fairm lah fuh-netr
Sentence_Translation: The wind blows hard,so I close the window.

Sentence: Un nuage cache le soleil puis il s'éloigne.
Sentence_IPA: /œ̃ nɥaʒ kaʃ lə sɔ.lɛj pɥi il se.lwaɲ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: uhn new-azh cash luh soh-LAY(y) pwee eel say-LWAIN
Sentence_Translation: One cloud hides the sun then it moves away.,le + soleil -> l'

Sentence: Le soleil chauffe déjà,donc je mets une casquette.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɔ.lɛj ʃof de.ʒa dɔ̃k ʒə mɛ yn kas.kɛt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh soh-LAY(y) shof day-zhah donk zhuh meh een kass-ket
Sentence_Translation: The sun is already warm,so I put on a cap.

Sentence: Je reste à l'ombre parce qu'il fait très chaud.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁɛst a lɔ̃bʁ paʁs kil fɛ tʁɛ ʃo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh rest ah lohmbr pars keel feh treh shoh
Sentence_Translation: I stay in the shade because it’s very hot.
Elision_Note: à + l' -> à l';que + il -> qu'il

Sentence: Je marche dans le parc et j'écoute les oiseaux.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə maʁʃ dɑ̃ lə paʁk e ʒe.kut le zwa.zo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh marsh dahn luh park ay zhay-koot lay zwah-zoh
Sentence_Translation: I walk in the park and I listen to the birds.

Sentence: Le jardin sent bon après la pluie d'été.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ʒaʁ.dɛ̃ sɑ̃ bɔ̃ a.pʁɛ la plɥi de.te/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh zhar-dehn sahn bohn ah-preh lah plwee day-TAY
Sentence_Translation: The garden smells nice after the summer rain.

Sentence: L'arbre perd ses feuilles quand l'automne arrive.
Sentence_IPA: /laʁbʁ pɛʁ se fœj kɑ̃ lo.tɔn a.ʁiv/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: larbr pair say fuhy kahn loh-TON ah-REEV
Sentence_Translation: The tree loses its leaves when autumn arrives.

Sentence: Une feuille tombe lentement devant mes yeux.
Sentence_IPA: /yn fœj tɔ̃b lɑ̃t.mɑ̃ də.vɑ̃ me zjø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: een fuhy tomb lahnt-mahn duh-vahn may zyuh
Sentence_Translation: A leaf falls slowly in front of my eyes.

Sentence: Je coupe une fleur pour la mettre dans l'eau.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə kup yn flœʁ puʁ la mɛtʁ dɑ̃ lo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh koop een flur poor lah metr dahn loh
Sentence_Translation: I cut a flower to put it in water.

Sentence: La plante a soif,donc je l'arrose doucement.
Sentence_IPA: /la plɑ̃t a swaf dɔ̃k ʒə la.ʁoz dus.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah plant ah swaf donk zhuh lah-rohz doos-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The plant is thirsty,so I water it gently.

Sentence: Le gazon est mouillé,donc je marche sur le côté.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ɡa.zɔ̃ ɛ mu.je dɔ̃k ʒə maʁʃ syʁ lə ko.te/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh gah-ZON eh moo-YAY donk zhuh marsh sewr luh koh-TAY
Sentence_Translation: The grass is wet,so I walk along the side.

Sentence: La forêt est sombre,mais le chemin est clair.
Sentence_IPA: /la fɔ.ʁɛ ɛ sɔ̃bʁ mɛ lə ʃə.mɛ̃ ɛ klɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah foh-REH eh sohmbr meh luh shuh-mehn eh klair
Sentence_Translation: The forest is dark,but the path is clear.

Sentence: Je prends ce chemin court pour rentrer chez moi.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ sə ʃə.mɛ̃ kuʁ puʁ ʁɑ̃tʁe ʃe mwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn suh shuh-MEHN koor poor rahn-TRAY shay mwah
Sentence_Translation: I take this short path to get home.

Sentence: La colline est raide,donc je souffle un peu.
Sentence_IPA: /la kɔ.lin ɛ ʁɛd dɔ̃k ʒə sufl œ̃ pø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah koh-LEEN eh red donk zhuh soofl uhn puh
Sentence_Translation: The hill is steep,so I breathe a bit.

Sentence: La montagne est loin,mais on la voit bien.
Sentence_IPA: /la mɔ̃.taɲ ɛ lwɛ̃ mɛ ɔ̃ la vwa bjɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah mohn-TAN-yuh eh lwehn meh on lah vwah byehn
Sentence_Translation: The mountain is far,but you can see it clearly.

Sentence: Le lac est froid,donc je ne nage pas.
Sentence_IPA: /lə lak ɛ fʁwa dɔ̃k ʒə nə naʒ pa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh lak eh frwah donk zhuh nuh nahzh pah
Sentence_Translation: The lake is cold,so I don’t swim.

Sentence: La mer est agitée,donc les bateaux restent au port.
Sentence_IPA: /la mɛʁ ɛ a.ʒi.te dɔ̃k le ba.to ʁɛst o pɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah mair eh ah-zhee-TAY donk lay bah-toh rest oh por
Sentence_Translation: The sea is rough,so the boats stay in port.

Sentence: Je marche sur la plage et j'évite les vagues.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə maʁʃ syʁ la plaʒ e ʒe.vit le vaɡ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh marsh sewr lah plazh ay zhay-veet lay vag
Sentence_Translation: I walk on the beach and avoid the waves.

Sentence: J'ouvre la fenêtre pour aérer la chambre.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒuvʁ la fə.nɛtʁ puʁ a.e.ʁe la ʃɑ̃bʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhoovr lah fuh-netr poor ah-ay-ray lah shahn-bruh
Sentence_Translation: I open the window to air the room.

Sentence: La cuisine est petite mais elle est pratique.
Sentence_IPA: /la kɥi.zin ɛ pə.tit mɛ ɛl ɛ pʁa.tik/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah kwee-ZEEN eh puh-teet meh ell eh prah-TEEK
Sentence_Translation: The kitchen is small but it is practical.

Sentence: Je prends un déjeuner simple avant le travail.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ de.ʒø.ne sɛ̃pl a.vɑ̃ lə tʁa.vaj/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn uhn day-zhuh-NAY sehnpl ah-vahn luh trah-vyeh
Sentence_Translation: I have a simple lunch before work.

Sentence: Je prends une bouteille d'eau dans mon sac.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ yn bu.tɛj do dɑ̃ mɔ̃ sak/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn een boo-TAY do(h) dahn mohn sak
Sentence_Translation: I take a bottle of water in my bag.

Sentence: Le fromage sent fort mais il est délicieux.
Sentence_IPA: /lə fʁɔ.maʒ sɑ̃ fɔʁ mɛ il ɛ de.li.sjø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh fro-MAZH sahn for meh eel eh day-lee-SYUH
Sentence_Translation: The cheese smells strong but it is delicious.

Sentence: J'ai faim donc je prépare un repas chaud.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe fɛ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə pʁe.paʁ œ̃ ʁə.pa ʃo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay fehn donk zhuh pray-PAR uhn ruh-PAH shoh
Sentence_Translation: I am hungry so I prepare a hot meal.

Sentence: Je fais les courses après le travail ce soir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ le kuʁs a.pʁɛ lə tʁa.vaj sə swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh lay koors ah-preh luh trah-vyeh suh swar
Sentence_Translation: I do the shopping after work tonight.

Sentence: Je paie la facture en ligne avant dimanche.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pɛ la fak.tyʁ ɑ̃ liɲ a.vɑ̃ di.mɑ̃ʃ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh peh lah fak-TEWR ahn leen(y) ah-vahn dee-mahnsh
Sentence_Translation: I pay the bill online before Sunday.

Sentence: La serrure coince donc j'appelle un serrurier.
Sentence_IPA: /la se.ʁyʁ kwɛ̃s dɔ̃k ʒa.pɛl œ̃ se.ʁy.ʁje/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah seh-RUR kwehnss donk zhah-pell uhn seh-ru-ryay
Sentence_Translation: The lock sticks so I call a locksmith.

Sentence: Ce problème revient souvent mais on trouve une solution.
Sentence_IPA: /sə pʁɔ.blɛm ʁə.vjɛ̃ su.vɑ̃ mɛ ɔ̃ tʁuv yn sɔ.ly.sjɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: suh proh-blem ruh-VYEHN soo-vahn meh on troov een soh-lew-SYON
Sentence_Translation: This problem comes back often but we find a solution.

Sentence: La solution est simple,donc on la teste d'abord.
Sentence_IPA: /la sɔ.ly.sjɔ̃ ɛ sɛ̃pl dɔ̃k ɔ̃ la tɛst da.bɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah soh-lew-SYON eh sehnpl donk on lah test dah-bor
Sentence_Translation: The solution is simple,so we test it first.

Sentence: Ta question est claire,donc je réponds tout de suite.
Sentence_IPA: /ta kɛs.tjɔ̃ ɛ klɛʁ dɔ̃k ʒə ʁe.pɔ̃ tu də sɥit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: tah kes-TYON eh klair donk zhuh ray-pon too duh sweet
Sentence_Translation: Your question is clear,so I answer straight away.

Sentence: La règle est simple,mais tout le monde l'oublie.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁɛɡl ɛ sɛ̃pl mɛ tu lə mɔ̃d lu.bli/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah regl eh sehnpl meh too luh mohnd loo-BLEE
Sentence_Translation: The rule is simple,but everyone forgets it.

Sentence: Je fais une erreur puis je corrige immédiatement.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ yn e.ʁœʁ pɥi ʒə kɔ.ʁiʒ i.me.dja.tə.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh een ay-RUHR pwee zhuh koh-reezh ee-may-dyah-tuh-mahn
Sentence_Translation: I make a mistake then I correct it immediately.

Sentence: Je donne un conseil utile à mon collègue.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə dɔn œ̃ kɔ̃.sɛj y.til a mɔ̃ kɔ.lɛɡ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh don uhn kon-SAY(y) ew-TEEL ah mohn koh-LEG
Sentence_Translation: I give useful advice to my colleague.

Sentence: Mon collègue arrive tôt et prépare la réunion.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ kɔ.lɛɡ a.ʁiv to e pʁe.paʁ la ʁe.y.njɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn koh-LEG ah-reev toh ay pray-par lah ray-ew-nyon
Sentence_Translation: My colleague arrives early and prepares the meeting.

Sentence: La réunion dure longtemps,donc je prends un café.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁe.y.njɔ̃ dyʁ lɔ̃.tɑ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ ka.fe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah ray-ew-nyon dewr lon-tahn donk zhuh prahn uhn kah-fay
Sentence_Translation: The meeting lasts a long time,so I take a coffee.

Sentence: Je bois un café fort avant de conduire.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə bwa œ̃ ka.fe fɔʁ a.vɑ̃ də kɔ̃.dɥiʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh bwah uhn kah-fay for ah-vahn duh kon-DWIR
Sentence_Translation: I drink a strong coffee before driving.

Sentence: Je préfère le thé chaud quand il fait gris.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁe.fɛʁ lə te ʃo kɑ̃ il fɛ ɡʁi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pray-fair luh tay shoh kahn eel feh gree
Sentence_Translation: I prefer hot tea when it’s grey outside.

Sentence: Je prends moins de sucre,donc je change mes habitudes.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ mwɛ̃ də sykʁ dɔ̃k ʒə ʃɑ̃ʒ me za.bi.tyd/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn mwehn duh sew-kr donk zhuh shahnzh may zah-bee-tewd
Sentence_Translation: I take less sugar,so I change my habits.

Sentence: J'ajoute du beurre sur le pain chaud.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒa.ʒut dy bœʁ syʁ lə pɛ̃ ʃo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhah-zhoot dew burr sewr luh pehn shoh
Sentence_Translation: I add butter on the warm bread.
Elision_Note: je + ajoute -> j'ajoute; de + le -> du

Sentence: Je bois du lait froid après le sport.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə bwa dy lɛ fʁwa a.pʁɛ lə spɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh bwah dew leh frwah ah-preh luh spor
Sentence_Translation: I drink cold milk after sport.

Sentence: Je casse un œuf et je mélange bien.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə kas œ̃ nœf e ʒə me.lɑ̃ʒ bjɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh kass uhn nuf ay zhuh may-lahnzh byehn
Sentence_Translation: I crack an egg and mix well.

Sentence: Mets du sel,mais pas trop aujourd'hui.
Sentence_IPA: /mɛ dy sɛl mɛ pa tʁo o.ʒuʁ.dɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: meh dew sel meh pah troh oh-zhoor-dwee
Sentence_Translation: Put some salt,but not too much today.

Sentence: Il ajoute du poivre pour relever la soupe.
Sentence_IPA: /il a.ʒut dy pwavʁ puʁ ʁə.lə.ve la sup/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: eel ah-zhoot dew pwavr poor ruh-luh-vay lah soop
Sentence_Translation: He adds pepper to lift the soup.

Sentence: La soupe chaude réchauffe mes mains ce soir.
Sentence_IPA: /la sup ʃod ʁe.ʃof me mɛ̃ sə swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah soop shohd ray-shof may mehn suh swar
Sentence_Translation: The hot soup warms my hands tonight.

Sentence: On prépare le dîner ensemble après le travail.
Sentence_IPA: /ɔ̃ pʁe.paʁ lə di.ne ɑ̃.sɑ̃bl a.pʁɛ lə tʁa.vaj/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: on pray-par luh dee-nay ahn-sahnbl ah-preh luh trah-vyeh
Sentence_Translation: We prepare dinner together after work.

Sentence: Mon ordinateur s'éteint,donc je sauvegarde vite.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ n‿ɔʁ.di.na.tœʁ se.tɛ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə so.və.ɡaʁd vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn nor-dee-nah-tur say-tehn donk zhuh soh-vuh-gard veet
Sentence_Translation: My computer turns off,so I save quickly.
Elision_Note: mon + ordinateur (liaison n); se + éteint -> s'éteint

Sentence: Je lis ton message et je réponds demain.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə li tɔ̃ me.saʒ e ʒə ʁe.pɔ̃ də.mɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh lee ton meh-sazh ay zhuh ray-pon duh-mehn
Sentence_Translation: I read your message and reply tomorrow.

Sentence: Au bureau,je range mes dossiers chaque vendredi.
Sentence_IPA: /o by.ʁo ʒə ʁɑ̃ʒ me do.sje ʃak vɑ̃.dʁə.di/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: oh bew-ROH zhuh rahnzh may doh-SYAY shak vahn-druh-dee
Sentence_Translation: At the office,I file my folders every Friday.

Sentence: J'oublie parfois la clé,donc je sonne chez toi.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒu.bli paʁ.fwa la kle dɔ̃k ʒə sɔn ʃe twa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhoo-BLEE par-fwah lah klay donk zhuh sonn shay twah
Sentence_Translation: I sometimes forget the key,so I ring at yours.

Sentence: La porte grince,donc je la ferme doucement.
Sentence_IPA: /la pɔʁt ɡʁɛ̃s dɔ̃k ʒə la fɛʁm dus.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah port grahns donk zhuh lah fairm doos-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The door creaks,so I close it gently.

Sentence: L'étage du dessus est bruyant la nuit.
Sentence_IPA: /le.taʒ dy də.sy ɛ bʁɥi.jɑ̃ la nɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lay-tazh dew duh-sew eh brwee-YAHN lah nwee
Sentence_Translation: The floor above is noisy at night.,le + étage -> l'

Sentence: Je monte l'escalier lentement avec mon sac lourd.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɔ̃t lɛs.ka.lje lɑ̃t.mɑ̃ a.vɛk mɔ̃ sak luʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh mont les-kah-LYAY lahnt-mahn ah-vek mohn sak loor
Sentence_Translation: I go up the stairs slowly with my heavy bag.

Sentence: L'ascenseur est en panne,donc je prends l'escalier.
Sentence_IPA: /la.sɑ̃.sœʁ ɛ ɑ̃ pan dɔ̃k ʒə pʁɑ̃ lɛs.ka.lje/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah-sahn-sur eh ahn pahn donk zhuh prahn les-kah-lyay
Sentence_Translation: The lift is broken,so I take the stairs.
Elision_Note: le + ascenseur -> l'; le + escalier -> l'

Sentence: Le toit fuit un peu quand il pleut fort.
Sentence_IPA: /lə twa fɥi œ̃ pø kɑ̃ il plø fɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh twah fwee uhn puh kahn eel pleu for
Sentence_Translation: The roof leaks a bit when it rains hard.

Sentence: Le mur est humide,donc j'ouvre la fenêtre.
Sentence_IPA: /lə myʁ ɛ y.mid dɔ̃k ʒuvʁ la fə.nɛtʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh mewr eh ew-meed donk zhoovr lah fuh-netr
Sentence_Translation: The wall is damp,so I open the window.

Sentence: Le plafond est haut,mais la lampe est faible.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pla.fɔ̃ ɛ o mɛ la lɑ̃p ɛ fɛbl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh plah-fon eh oh meh lah lahmp eh fehbl
Sentence_Translation: The ceiling is high,but the lamp is dim.

Sentence: J'allume la lampe quand la pièce est sombre.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒa.lym la lɑ̃p kɑ̃ la pjɛs ɛ sɔ̃bʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhah-lyoom lah lahmp kahn lah pyes eh sohmbr
Sentence_Translation: I turn on the lamp when the room is dark.

Sentence: Cette pièce est lumineuse et très agréable le matin.
Sentence_IPA: /sɛt pjɛs ɛ ly.mi.nøz e tʁɛ za.ɡʁe.a.blə lə ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: set pyess eh lew-mee-NUHZ ay treh zah-gray-ahbl luh mah-tehn
