Sentence_Translation: This room is bright and very pleasant in the morning.

Sentence: Je pose mon sac sur la chaise.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə poz mɔ̃ sak syʁ la ʃɛz/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pohz mohn sak sewr lah shez
Sentence_Translation: I put my bag on the chair.

Sentence: La table est prête pour le dîner ce soir.
Sentence_IPA: /la tabl ɛ pʁɛt puʁ lə di.ne sə swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah tabl eh pret poor luh dee-nay suh swar
Sentence_Translation: The table is ready for dinner tonight.

Sentence: Je prends le couteau et je coupe le pain.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ lə ku.to e ʒə kup lə pɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn luh koo-toh ay zhuh koop luh pehn
Sentence_Translation: I take the knife and cut the bread.

Sentence: La fourchette tombe par terre alors je la lave.
Sentence_IPA: /la fuʁ.ʃɛt tɔ̃b paʁ tɛʁ a.lɔʁ ʒə la lav/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah foor-shet tomb par tair ah-lor zhuh lah lav
Sentence_Translation: The fork falls on the floor so I wash it.

Sentence: J'oublie la cuillère donc je remue avec une fourchette.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒu.bli la kɥi.jɛʁ dɔ̃k ʒə ʁə.my a.vɛk yn fuʁ.ʃɛt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhoo-blee lah kwee-yair donk zhuh ruh-mew ah-vek een foor-shet
Sentence_Translation: I forget the spoon so I stir with a fork.

Sentence: L'assiette est chaude fais attention en la portant.
Sentence_IPA: /la.sjɛt ɛ ʃod fɛ a.tɑ̃.sjɔ̃ ɑ̃ la pɔʁ.tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah-syet eh shohd feh ah-tahn-syon ahn lah por-tahn
Sentence_Translation: The plate is hot be careful while carrying it.

Sentence: Le verre est vide alors je le remplis.
Sentence_IPA: /lə vɛʁ ɛ vid a.lɔʁ ʒə lə ʁɑ̃.pli/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh vair eh veed ah-lor zhuh luh rahn-PLEE
Sentence_Translation: The glass is empty so I fill it.

Sentence: Je cherche la serviette propre dans le placard.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ la sɛʁ.vjɛt pʁɔp dɑ̃ lə pla.kaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh lah sair-vyet prop dahn luh plah-kar
Sentence_Translation: I look for the clean towel in the cupboard.

Sentence: Le placard est plein donc je range ailleurs.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pla.kaʁ ɛ plɛ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə ʁɑ̃ʒ a.jœʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh plah-kar eh plehn donk zhuh rahnzh ah-yehr
Sentence_Translation: The cupboard is full so I tidy elsewhere.

Sentence: Le miroir est sale alors je le nettoie.
Sentence_IPA: /lə mi.ʁwaʁ ɛ sal a.lɔʁ ʒə lə nɛ.twa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh mee-rwar eh sal ah-lor zhuh luh net-twah
Sentence_Translation: The mirror is dirty so I clean it.

Sentence: Je cherche mon téléphone mais il est éteint.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ mɔ̃ te.le.fɔn mɛ il ɛ e.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh mohn tay-lay-FON meh eel eh ay-tehn
Sentence_Translation: I look for my phone but it is off.

Sentence: Mon chargeur est lent,donc je le change.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ ʃaʁ.ʒœʁ ɛ lɑ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə lə ʃɑ̃ʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn shar-zhur eh lahn donk zhuh luh shahnzh
Sentence_Translation: My charger is slow,so I replace it.

Sentence: La batterie descend vite quand j'utilise le GPS.
Sentence_IPA: /la ba.tʁi de.sɑ̃ vit kɑ̃ ʒy.ti.liz lə ʒe.pe.ɛs/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah bah-TREE duh-sahn veet kahn zhew-tee-leez luh zhay-pay-ess
Sentence_Translation: The battery drops quickly when I use GPS.

Sentence: L'écran est trop brillant,alors je baisse la lumière.
Sentence_IPA: /le.kʁɑ̃ ɛ tʁo bʁi.jɑ̃ a.lɔʁ ʒə bɛs la ly.mjɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lay-krahn eh troh bree-yahn ah-lor zhuh bess lah lew-myair
Sentence_Translation: The screen is too bright,so I lower the light.

Sentence: Le clavier colle un peu après le café.
Sentence_IPA: /lə kla.vje kɔl œ̃ pø a.pʁɛ lə ka.fe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh klah-vyay kohl uhn puh ah-preh luh kah-fay
Sentence_Translation: The keyboard sticks a bit after the coffee.

Sentence: La souris ne répond plus,donc je redémarre.
Sentence_IPA: /la su.ʁi nə ʁe.pɔ̃ ply dɔ̃k ʒə ʁe.de.maʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah soo-REE nuh ray-pon plew donk zhuh ray-day-mar
Sentence_Translation: The mouse no longer responds,so I restart.

Sentence: J'oublie mon mot de passe et je recommence.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒu.bli mɔ̃ mo də pas e ʒə ʁə.kɔ.mɑ̃s/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhoo-blee mohn moh duh pahs ay zhuh ruh-koh-mahnss
Sentence_Translation: I forget my password and I start again.

Sentence: Le fichier est lourd,donc l'envoi prend du temps.
Sentence_IPA: /lə fi.ʃje ɛ luʁ dɔ̃k lɑ̃.vwa pʁɑ̃ dy tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh fee-SYAY eh loor donk lahn-vwah prahn dew tahn
Sentence_Translation: The file is heavy,so the upload takes time.
Elision_Note: le + envoi -> l'envoi; de + le -> du

Sentence: Je garde une photo de famille dans mon portefeuille.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ɡaʁd yn fo.to də fa.mij dɑ̃ mɔ̃ pɔʁt.fœj/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh gard een foh-toh duh fah-mee(y) dahn mohn port-fuhy
Sentence_Translation: I keep a family photo in my wallet.

Sentence: La vidéo se charge lentement sur mon réseau.
Sentence_IPA: /la vi.de.o sə ʃaʁʒ lɑ̃t.mɑ̃ syʁ mɔ̃ ʁe.zo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah vee-day-oh suh sharzh lahnt-mahn sewr mohn ray-zoh
Sentence_Translation: The video loads slowly on my network.

Sentence: Je lis le journal pendant le trajet du matin.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə li lə ʒuʁ.nal pɑ̃.dɑ̃ lə tʁa.ʒɛ dy ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh lee luh zhoor-NAL pahn-dahn luh trah-ZHEH dew mah-tehn
Sentence_Translation: I read the newspaper during the morning commute.

Sentence: Je commence un livre nouveau avant de dormir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə kɔ.mɑ̃s œ̃ livʁ nu.vo a.vɑ̃ də dɔʁ.miʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh koh-mahnss uhn leevr noo-VOH ah-vahn duh dor-MEER
Sentence_Translation: I start a new book before sleeping.

Sentence: Je tourne la page et je continue en silence.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tuʁn la paʒ e ʒə kɔ̃.ti.ny ɑ̃ si.lɑ̃s/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh toorn lah pazh ay zhuh kon-tee-new ahn see-lahnss
Sentence_Translation: I turn the page and continue silently.

Sentence: Je prends un stylo pour écrire une note.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ sti.lo puʁ e.kʁiʁ yn nɔt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn uhn stee-loh poor ay-kreer een not
Sentence_Translation: I take a pen to write a note.

Sentence: Mon cahier est plein,donc j'en achète un autre.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ ka.je ɛ plɛ̃ dɔ̃k ʒɑ̃ a.ʃɛt œ̃ notʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn kah-YAY eh plehn donk zhahn ah-shet uhn notr
Sentence_Translation: My notebook is full,so I buy another one.

Sentence: La classe commence à huit heures et tout le monde arrive.
Sentence_IPA: /la klas kɔ.mɑ̃s a ɥit œʁ e tu lə mɔ̃d a.ʁiv/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah klass koh-mahnss ah weet ur ay too luh mohnd ah-reev
Sentence_Translation: Class starts at eight o’clock and everyone arrives.

Sentence: Le professeur explique lentement pour aider les débutants.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pʁɔ.fɛ.sœʁ ɛks.plik lɑ̃t.mɑ̃ puʁ e.de le de.by.tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh proh-feh-SUR ex-pleek lahnt-mahn poor ay-DAY lay day-bew-tahn
Sentence_Translation: The teacher explains slowly to help beginners.

Sentence: L'élève pose une question et le professeur répond.
Sentence_IPA: /le.lɛv poz yn kɛs.tjɔ̃ e lə pʁɔ.fɛ.sœʁ ʁe.pɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lay-lev pohz een kes-TYON ay luh proh-feh-SUR ray-pon
Sentence_Translation: The pupil asks a question and the teacher answers.

Sentence: J'ai un devoir à rendre avant lundi matin.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe œ̃ də.vwaʁ a ʁɑ̃dʁ a.vɑ̃ lœ̃.di ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay uhn duh-vwar ah rahn-dr ah-vahn luhn-dee mah-tehn
Sentence_Translation: I have homework to hand in before Monday morning.

Sentence: L'examen est demain,donc je révise ce soir.
Sentence_IPA: /lɛɡ.za.mɛ̃ ɛ də.mɛ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə ʁe.viz sə swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: leg-zah-mehn eh duh-mehn donk zhuh ray-veez suh swar
Sentence_Translation: The exam is tomorrow,so I revise tonight.

Sentence: Mon quartier est tranquille,surtout le dimanche matin.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ kaʁ.tje ɛ tʁɑ̃.kil syʁ.tu lə di.mɑ̃ʃ ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn kar-TYAY eh trahn-KEEL sewr-TOO luh dee-mahnsh mah-tehn
Sentence_Translation: My neighbourhood is quiet,especially on Sunday morning.

Sentence: Mon voisin fait du bruit quand il cuisine tard.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ vwa.zɛ̃ fɛ dy bʁɥi kɑ̃ il kɥi.zin taʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn vwah-ZEHN feh dew bwee kahn eel kwee-ZEEN tar
Sentence_Translation: My neighbour makes noise when he cooks late.

Sentence: Je vais au supermarché après le travail,sans voiture.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vɛ o sy.pɛʁ.maʁ.ʃe a.pʁɛ lə tʁa.vaj sɑ̃ vwa.tyʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh veh oh sew-pair-mar-SHAY ah-preh luh trah-vyeh sahn vwah-tewr
Sentence_Translation: I go to the supermarket after work,without a car.

Sentence: Le prix a augmenté,donc j'achète moins souvent.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pʁi a oɡ.mɑ̃.te dɔ̃k ʒa.ʃɛt mwɛ̃ su.vɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh pree ah og-mahn-TAY donk zhah-SHET mwehn soo-vahn
Sentence_Translation: The price has gone up,so I buy less often.

Sentence: Je garde un peu d'argent pour les imprévus.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ɡaʁd œ̃ pø daʁ.ʒɑ̃ puʁ le zɛ̃.pʁe.vy/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh gard uhn puh dar-ZHAHN poor lay zan-pray-VEW
Sentence_Translation: I keep a bit of money for unexpected things.

Sentence: Je passe à la banque pour retirer de l'argent.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pas a la bɑ̃k puʁ ʁə.ti.ʁe də laʁ.ʒɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pahss ah lah bahnk poor ruh-tee-RAY duh lar-zhahn
Sentence_Translation: I go to the bank to withdraw money.

Sentence: Ma carte ne marche plus,alors je paie en espèces.
Sentence_IPA: /ma kaʁt nə maʁʃ ply a.lɔʁ ʒə pɛ ɑ̃ nɛs.pɛs/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah kart nuh marsh plew ah-lor zhuh peh ahn ness-pess
Sentence_Translation: My card no longer works,so I pay in cash.

Sentence: Je garde le ticket au cas où je change d'avis.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ɡaʁd lə ti.kɛ o ka u ʒə ʃɑ̃ʒ da.vi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh gard luh tee-KAY oh kah oo zhuh shahnzh dah-VEE
Sentence_Translation: I keep the receipt in case I change my mind.

Sentence: Le magasin ferme bientôt,donc je me dépêche.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ma.ɡa.zɛ̃ fɛʁm bjɛ̃.to dɔ̃k ʒə mə de.pɛʃ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh mah-gah-ZEHN fairm byehn-TOH donk zhuh muh day-pesh
Sentence_Translation: The shop closes soon,so I hurry.

Sentence: Je cherche le rayon des pâtes,mais je me trompe.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ lə ʁɛ.jɔ̃ de pɑt mɛ ʒə mə tʁɔ̃p/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh luh reh-YON day pat meh zhuh muh tromp
Sentence_Translation: I look for the pasta aisle,but I’m mistaken.

Sentence: Ce produit est en rupture,donc je choisis autre chose.
Sentence_IPA: /sə pʁɔ.dɥi ɛ ɑ̃ ʁyp.tyʁ dɔ̃k ʒə ʃwa.zi otʁ ʃoz/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: suh proh-DWEE eh ahn rüp-tewr donk zhuh shwah-ZEE otr shoz
Sentence_Translation: This product is out of stock,so I choose something else.

Sentence: Je fais une liste pour ne rien oublier au magasin.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ yn list puʁ nə ʁjɛ̃ u.bli.je o ma.ɡa.zɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh een leest poor nuh ryehn oo-blee-YAY oh mah-gah-zehn
Sentence_Translation: I make a list so I don’t forget anything at the shop.

Sentence: Le choix est difficile,donc je demande un avis.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ʃwa ɛ di.fi.sil dɔ̃k ʒə də.mɑ̃d œ̃ na.vi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh shwah eh dee-fee-SEEL donk zhuh duh-mahnd uhn nah-VEE
Sentence_Translation: The choice is difficult,so I ask an opinion.

Sentence: J'ai besoin de repos après cette longue journée.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe bə.zwɛ̃ də ʁə.po a.pʁɛ sɛt lɔ̃ɡ ʒuʁ.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay buh-ZWEHN duh ruh-POH ah-preh set lon(g) zhoor-NAY
Sentence_Translation: I need rest after this long day.

Sentence: Je manque d'énergie,donc je marche un peu dehors.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɑ̃k de.nɛʁ.ʒi dɔ̃k ʒə maʁʃ œ̃ pø də.ɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh mah(n)k day-nair-ZHEE donk zhuh marsh uhn puh duh-or
Sentence_Translation: I lack energy,so I walk a bit outside.

Sentence: L'horloge avance,donc je suis en retard ce matin.
Sentence_IPA: /lɔʁ.lɔʒ a.vɑ̃s dɔ̃k ʒə sɥi ɑ̃ ʁə.taʁ sə ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lor-lozh ah-vahns donk zhuh swee ahn ruh-tar suh mah-tehn
Sentence_Translation: The clock is fast,so I’m late this morning.

Sentence: Le minuteur sonne,donc j'éteins le four tout de suite.
Sentence_IPA: /lə mi.nœ.tœʁ sɔn dɔ̃k ʒe.tɛ̃ lə fuʁ tu də sɥit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh mee-nuh-tur sonn donk zhay-tehn luh foor too duh sweet
Sentence_Translation: The timer rings,so I switch off the oven straight away.
Sentence_Breakdown: Le(Art)|the|Art|/lə/|luh;minuteur(le)|timer|Noun|/mi.nœ.tœʁ/|mee-nuh-tur;sonne|rings|Verb|/sɔn/|sonn;donc|so|Conj|/dɔ̃k/|donk;j'|I|Pron|/ʒ/|zh;éteins|switch off|Verb|/e.tɛ̃/|ay-tehn;le(Art)|the|Art|/lə/|luh;four(le)|oven|Noun|/fuʁ/|foor;tout de suite|straight away|Adv|/tu də sɥit/|too duh sweet

Sentence: Le four est chaud,donc je mets des gants.
Sentence_IPA: /lə fuʁ ɛ ʃo dɔ̃k ʒə mɛ de ɡɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh foor eh shoh donk zhuh meh day gahn
Sentence_Translation: The oven is hot,so I put on gloves.

Sentence: Je cherche un gant propre avant de toucher le plat.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ œ̃ ɡɑ̃ pʁɔp a.vɑ̃ də tu.ʃe lə pla/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh uhn gahn prop ah-vahn duh too-SHAY luh plah
Sentence_Translation: I look for a clean glove before touching the dish.

Sentence: Le plat est prêt,donc on passe à table.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pla ɛ pʁɛ dɔ̃k ɔ̃ pas a tabl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh plah eh pret donk on pahss ah tabl
Sentence_Translation: The dish is ready,so we sit down to eat.

Sentence: La route est bloquée,donc je prends un autre chemin.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁut ɛ blɔ.ke dɔ̃k ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ notʁ ʃə.mɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah root eh bloh-KAY donk zhuh prahn uhn notr shuh-mehn
Sentence_Translation: The road is blocked,so I take another route.

Sentence: Au carrefour,je tourne à gauche sans hésiter.
Sentence_IPA: /o kaʁ.fuʁ ʒə tuʁn a ɡoʃ sɑ̃ e.zi.te/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: oh kar-foor zhuh toorn ah gosh sahn ay-zee-TAY
Sentence_Translation: At the crossroads,I turn left without hesitating.

Sentence: Le feu passe au rouge,donc je m'arrête net.
Sentence_IPA: /lə fø pas o ʁuʒ dɔ̃k ʒə ma.ʁɛt nɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh feu pahss oh roozh donk zhuh mah-ret net
Sentence_Translation: The light turns red,so I stop dead.
Elision_Note: à + le -> au; je + m'arrête -> m'

Sentence: Je lis le panneau et je ralentis immédiatement.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə li lə pa.no e ʒə ʁa.lɑ̃.ti i.me.dja.tə.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh lee luh pah-NOH ay zhuh rah-lahn-TEE ee-may-dyah-tuh-mahn
Sentence_Translation: I read the sign and slow down immediately.

Sentence: Le parking est complet,donc je cherche une place.
Sentence_IPA: /lə paʁ.kiŋ ɛ kɔ̃.plɛ dɔ̃k ʒə ʃɛʁʃ yn plas/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh par-king eh kon-PLEH donk zhuh shairsh een plahs
Sentence_Translation: The car park is full,so I look for a space.

Sentence: Je trouve une place facile près de l'entrée.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tʁuv yn plas fa.sil pʁɛ də lɑ̃.tʁe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh troov een plahs fah-SEEL preh duh lahn-TRAY
Sentence_Translation: I find an easy space near the entrance.

Sentence: L'entrée est fermée,donc j'attends dehors un moment.
Sentence_IPA: /lɑ̃.tʁe ɛ fɛʁ.me dɔ̃k ʒa.tɑ̃ də.ɔʁ œ̃ mɔ.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lahn-tray eh fair-MAY donk zhah-tahn duh-or uhn moh-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The entrance is closed,so I wait outside a moment.

Sentence: Je prends la sortie suivante et je reviens en arrière.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ la sɔʁ.ti sɥi.vɑ̃t e ʒə ʁə.vjɛ̃ ɑ̃ na.ʁjɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn lah sor-TEE swee-VAHNT ay zhuh ruh-vyehn ahn nah-ryair
Sentence_Translation: I take the next exit and go back.

Sentence: La gare est loin,donc je pars plus tôt.
Sentence_IPA: /la ɡaʁ ɛ lwɛ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə paʁ ply to/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah gar eh lwehn donk zhuh par plew toh
Sentence_Translation: The station is far,so I leave earlier.

Sentence: Je cherche mon billet,puis je passe le contrôle.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ mɔ̃ bi.jɛ pɥi ʒə pas lə kɔ̃.tʁol/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh mohn bee-YAY pwee zhuh pahss luh kon-trol
Sentence_Translation: I look for my ticket,then I go through the check.

Sentence: Je marche vers le quai et j'attends le train.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə maʁʃ vɛʁ lə kɛ e ʒa.tɑ̃ lə tʁɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh marsh vair luh keh ay zhah-tahn luh trehn
Sentence_Translation: I walk to the platform and wait for the train.

Sentence: Le voyage est long,donc je prends un livre.
Sentence_IPA: /lə vwa.jaʒ ɛ lɔ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ livʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh vwah-YAZH eh lon donk zhuh prahn uhn leevr
Sentence_Translation: The journey is long,so I take a book.

Sentence: Ma valise est lourde,donc je prends un taxi.
Sentence_IPA: /ma va.liz ɛ luʁd dɔ̃k ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ tak.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah vah-LEEZ eh loord donk zhuh prahn uhn tak-see
Sentence_Translation: My suitcase is heavy,so I take a taxi.

Sentence: Le taxi arrive vite et je monte derrière.
Sentence_IPA: /lə tak.si a.ʁiv vit e ʒə mɔ̃t dɛ.ʁjɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh tak-see ah-reev veet ay zhuh mont deh-ryair
Sentence_Translation: The taxi arrives quickly and I get in at the back.

Sentence: Je regarde le plan pour trouver la bonne rue.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁə.ɡaʁd lə plɑ̃ puʁ tʁu.ve la bɔn ʁy/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ruh-gard luh plahn poor troo-VAY lah bon rue
Sentence_Translation: I look at the map to find the right street.

Sentence: La rue est sombre,donc j'allume ma lampe.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁy ɛ sɔ̃bʁ dɔ̃k ʒa.lym ma lɑ̃p/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah rue eh sohmbr donk zhah-lyoom mah lahmp
Sentence_Translation: The street is dark,so I turn on my lamp.

Sentence: Je marche sur le trottoir pour éviter la route.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə maʁʃ syʁ lə tʁɔ.twaʁ puʁ e.vi.te la ʁut/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh marsh sewr luh troh-twar poor ay-vee-TAY lah root
Sentence_Translation: I walk on the pavement to avoid the road.

Sentence: Le virage est serré,donc je roule très doucement.
Sentence_IPA: /lə vi.ʁaʒ ɛ se.ʁe dɔ̃k ʒə ʁul tʁɛ dus.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh vee-RAZH eh seh-RAY donk zhuh rool treh doos-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The bend is tight,so I drive very gently.

Sentence: Le pont est étroit,donc on passe un par un.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pɔ̃ ɛ e.tʁwa dɔ̃k ɔ̃ pas œ̃ paʁ œ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh pon eh ay-twah donk on pahss uhn par uhn
Sentence_Translation: The bridge is narrow,so we cross one by one.

Sentence: La rivière déborde parfois après de fortes pluies.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁi.vjɛʁ de.bɔʁd paʁ.fwa a.pʁɛ də fɔʁt plɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah ree-vyair day-bord par-fwah ah-preh duh fort plwee
Sentence_Translation: The river sometimes overflows after heavy rain.

Sentence: J'oublie mon parapluie,donc je rentre trempé.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒu.bli mɔ̃ pa.ʁa.plɥi dɔ̃k ʒə ʁɑ̃tʁ tʁɑ̃.pe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhoo-blee mohn pah-rah-plwee donk zhuh rahn-truh trahn-pay
Sentence_Translation: I forget my umbrella,so I get home soaked.

Sentence: La météo annonce du vent toute la journée.
Sentence_IPA: /la me.te.o a.nɔ̃s dy vɑ̃ tut la ʒuʁ.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah may-tay-oh ah-nonss dew vahn toot lah zhoor-nay
Sentence_Translation: The forecast announces wind all day.

Sentence: Le vent souffle fort et ferme la fenêtre.
Sentence_IPA: /lə vɑ̃ sufl fɔʁ e fɛʁm la fə.nɛtʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh vahn soofl for ay fairm lah fuh-netr
Sentence_Translation: The wind blows hard and shuts the window.

Sentence: La pluie tombe sans arrêt depuis ce matin.
Sentence_IPA: /la plɥi tɔ̃b sɑ̃ a.ʁɛ də.pɥi sə ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah plwee tomb sahn ah-reh duh-pwee suh mah-tehn
Sentence_Translation: The rain falls non-stop since this morning.

Sentence: La neige couvre la route et ralentit tout.
Sentence_IPA: /la nɛʒ kuvʁ la ʁut e ʁa.lɑ̃.ti tu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah nezh koovr lah root ay rah-lahn-tee too
Sentence_Translation: The snow covers the road and slows everything.

Sentence: Le soleil revient enfin après trois jours gris.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɔ.lɛj ʁə.vjɛ̃ ɑ̃.fɛ̃ a.pʁɛ tʁwa ʒuʁ ɡʁi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh soh-leh(y) ruh-vyehn ahn-fehn ah-preh trwah zhoor gree
Sentence_Translation: The sun finally comes back after three grey days.

Sentence: La chaleur monte vite dans cet appartement.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʃa.lœʁ mɔ̃t vit dɑ̃ sɛ ta.paʁ.tə.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah sha-lur mont veet dahn set ah-par-tuh-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The heat rises quickly in this flat.

Sentence: Je vais à la pharmacie pour acheter des pansements.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vɛ a la faʁ.ma.si puʁ a.ʃə.te de pɑ̃s.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh veh ah lah far-mah-see poor ah-shuh-tay day pahnss-mahn
Sentence_Translation: I go to the pharmacy to buy plasters.

Sentence: J'ai un rendez-vous chez le médecin demain matin.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe œ̃ ʁɑ̃.de.vu ʃe lə med.sɛ̃ də.mɛ̃ ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay uhn rahn-duh-voo shay luh med-sehn duh-mehn mah-tehn
Sentence_Translation: I have an appointment with the doctor tomorrow morning.

Sentence: Le médecin écrit une ordonnance et je la lis.
Sentence_IPA: /lə med.sɛ̃ e.kʁi tyn ɔʁ.dɔ.nɑ̃s e ʒə la li/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh med-sehn ay-kree teen or-doh-nahns ay zhuh lah lee
Sentence_Translation: The doctor writes a prescription and I read it.

Sentence: J'ai une douleur au dos depuis hier soir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe yn du.lœʁ o do də.pɥi jɛʁ swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay een doo-lur oh doh duh-pwee yair swar
Sentence_Translation: I have back pain since last night.

Sentence: Je prends du repos et je coupe mon téléphone.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ dy ʁə.po e ʒə kup mɔ̃ te.le.fɔn/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn dew ruh-poh ay zhuh koop mohn tay-lay-fon
Sentence_Translation: I take some rest and switch off my phone.

Sentence: La fièvre baisse,donc je dors un peu mieux.
Sentence_IPA: /la fjɛvʁ bɛs dɔ̃k ʒə dɔʁ œ̃ pø mjø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah fyev-ruh bess donk zhuh dor uhn puh myuh
Sentence_Translation: The fever goes down,so I sleep a bit better.

Sentence: J'ai la grippe,alors je reste à la maison.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe la ɡʁip a.lɔʁ ʒə ʁɛst a la mɛ.zɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay lah greep ah-lor zhuh rest ah lah meh-zohn
Sentence_Translation: I have the flu,so I stay at home.

Sentence: Je prends un sirop contre la toux avant de dormir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ si.ʁo kɔ̃tʁ la tus a.vɑ̃ də dɔʁ.miʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn uhn see-ROH kontr lah tooss ah-vahn duh dor-meer
Sentence_Translation: I take a cough syrup before sleeping.

Sentence: La toux revient la nuit,donc je bois de l'eau.
Sentence_IPA: /la tus ʁə.vjɛ̃ la nɥi dɔ̃k ʒə bwa də lo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah tooss ruh-vyehn lah nwee donk zhuh bwah duh loh
Sentence_Translation: The cough comes back at night,so I drink water.

Sentence: Mon allergie revient au printemps,surtout le matin.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ a.lɛʁ.ʒi ʁə.vjɛ̃ o pʁɛ̃.tɑ̃ syʁ.tu lə ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn ah-lair-ZHEE ruh-vyehn oh prehn-tahn sewr-TOO luh mah-tehn
Sentence_Translation: My allergy comes back in spring,especially in the morning.

Sentence: Je change de régime,donc je cuisine plus simplement.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɑ̃ʒ də ʁe.ʒim dɔ̃k ʒə kɥi.zin ply sɛ̃.plə.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shahnzh duh ray-zheem donk zhuh kwee-zeen plew sehn-pluh-mahn
Sentence_Translation: I change my diet,so I cook more simply.

Sentence: Je fais du sport trois fois par semaine maintenant.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ dy spɔʁ tʁwa fwa paʁ sə.mɛn mɛ̃.tə.nɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh dew spor trwah fwah par suh-men mehn-tuh-nahn
Sentence_Translation: I do sport three times per week now.

Sentence: L'entraînement est dur,mais je progresse chaque semaine.
Sentence_IPA: /lɑ̃.tʁɛn.mɑ̃ ɛ dyʁ mɛ ʒə pʁɔ.ɡʁɛs ʃak sə.mɛn/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lahn-tren-mahn eh dewr meh zhuh proh-gres shak suh-men
Sentence_Translation: Training is hard,but I improve every week.

Sentence: Je sors la poubelle avant le passage du camion.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə sɔʁ la pu.bɛl a.vɑ̃ lə pa.saʒ dy ka.mjɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh sor lah poo-bel ah-vahn luh pah-sazh dew kah-myohn
Sentence_Translation: I take the bin out before the lorry comes.

Sentence: Le camion arrive tôt et réveille tout le quartier.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ka.mjɔ̃ a.ʁiv to e ʁe.vɛj tu lə kaʁ.tje/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh kah-myohn ah-reev toh ay ray-vay too luh kar-tyay
Sentence_Translation: The lorry arrives early and wakes the whole neighbourhood.

Sentence: Je paie la facture en ligne avant la date limite.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pɛ la fak.tyʁ ɑ̃ liɲ a.vɑ̃ la dat li.mit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh peh lah fak-tewr ahn leen(y) ah-vahn lah dat lee-meet
Sentence_Translation: I pay the bill online before the deadline.

Sentence: Le loyer augmente encore,alors je cherche un studio.
Sentence_IPA: /lə lwa.je oɡ.mɑ̃t ɑ̃.kɔʁ a.lɔʁ ʒə ʃɛʁʃ œ̃ sty.djo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh lwah-yay og-mahnt ahn-kor ah-lor zhuh shairsh uhn stee-dyoh
Sentence_Translation: The rent goes up again,so I look for a studio.

Sentence: Je fais le ménage le samedi,puis je me repose.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ lə me.naʒ lə sa.mə.di pɥi ʒə mə ʁə.poz/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh luh may-nazh luh sah-muh-dee pwee zhuh muh ruh-pohz
Sentence_Translation: I do the housework on Saturday,then I rest.

Sentence: L'aspirateur fait trop de bruit,donc je nettoie plus tard.
Sentence_IPA: /las.pi.ʁa.tœʁ fɛ tʁo də bʁɥi dɔ̃k ʒə nɛ.twa ply taʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah-spee-rah-tur feh troh duh bwee donk zhuh net-twah plew tar
Sentence_Translation: The vacuum is too noisy,so I clean later.

Sentence: Je prends le balai et je balaie l'entrée rapidement.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ lə ba.lɛ e ʒə ba.lɛ lɑ̃.tʁe ʁa.pi.də.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn luh bah-leh ay zhuh bah-leh lahn-tray rah-pee-duh-mahn
Sentence_Translation: I take the broom and sweep the entrance quickly.

Sentence: Le linge sèche près du radiateur toute la nuit.
Sentence_IPA: /lə lɛ̃ʒ sɛʃ pʁɛ dy ʁa.dja.tœʁ tut la nɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh lehnzh sesh preh dew rah-dyah-tur toot lah nwee
Sentence_Translation: The laundry dries near the radiator all night.

Sentence: Je lance une lessive pendant que je prépare le dîner.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə lɑ̃s yn lɛ.siv pɑ̃.dɑ̃ kə ʒə pʁe.paʁ lə di.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh lahns een leh-seev pahn-dahn kuh zhuh pray-par luh dee-nay
Sentence_Translation: I start a wash while I prepare dinner.

Sentence: La machine est en marche,donc je ferme la porte.
Sentence_IPA: /la ma.ʃin ɛ ɑ̃ maʁʃ dɔ̃k ʒə fɛʁm la pɔʁt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah mah-sheen eh ahn marsh donk zhuh fairm lah port
Sentence_Translation: The machine is running,so I close the door.

Sentence: Le frigo est presque vide,donc je fais des courses.
Sentence_IPA: /lə fʁi.ɡo ɛ pʁɛsk vid dɔ̃k ʒə fɛ de kuʁs/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh free-goh eh presk veed donk zhuh feh day koors
Sentence_Translation: The fridge is almost empty,so I do the shopping.

Sentence: Je prends un congé demain pour régler des papiers.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ kɔ̃.ʒe də.mɛ̃ puʁ ʁe.ɡle de pa.pje/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn uhn kon-zhay duh-mehn poor ray-glay day pah-pyay
Sentence_Translation: I’m taking leave tomorrow to sort paperwork.

Sentence: Cette démarche prend du temps,mais je la termine.
Sentence_IPA: /sɛt de.maʁʃ pʁɑ̃ dy tɑ̃ mɛ ʒə la tɛʁ.min/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: set day-marsh prahn dew tahn meh zhuh lah tair-meen
Sentence_Translation: This process takes time,but I finish it.

Sentence: Je signe le papier et je le rends au bureau.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə siɲ lə pa.pje e ʒə lə ʁɑ̃d o by.ʁo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh seen(y) luh pah-pyay ay zhuh luh rahnd oh bew-roh
Sentence_Translation: I sign the paper and hand it in at the office.

Sentence: Je fais une copie au cas où ça disparaît.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ yn kɔ.pi o ka u sa dis.pa.ʁɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh een koh-pee oh kah oo sah dee-spah-reh
Sentence_Translation: I make a copy in case it disappears.

Sentence: Je note l'adresse et je l'envoie par message.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə nɔt la.dʁɛs e ʒə lɑ̃.vwa paʁ me.saʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh not lah-dress ay zhuh lahn-vwah par meh-sazh
Sentence_Translation: I write down the address and send it by message.
Elision_Note: le + adresse -> l'; je + l'envoie -> l'

Sentence: Le code ne marche pas,donc je réessaie calmement.
Sentence_IPA: /lə kɔd nə maʁʃ pa dɔ̃k ʒə ʁe.ɛ.sɛ kal.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh kod nuh marsh pah donk zhuh ray-eh-seh kal-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The code doesn’t work,so I try again calmly.

Sentence: Je répète le mot plusieurs fois pour bien l'entendre.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁe.pɛt lə mo ply.zjœʁ fwa puʁ bjɛ̃ lɑ̃.tɑ̃dʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ray-pet luh moh plew-zyur fwah poor byehn lahn-tahn-dr
Sentence_Translation: I repeat the word several times to hear it properly.

Sentence: Je comprends la phrase,mais pas tous les détails.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə kɔ̃.pʁɑ̃ la fʁaz mɛ pa tus le de.taj/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh kon-prahn lah fraz meh pah tooss lay day-tie
Sentence_Translation: I understand the sentence,but not all the details.

Sentence: La traduction aide beaucoup quand le texte est difficile.
Sentence_IPA: /la tʁa.dyk.sjɔ̃ ɛd bo.ku kɑ̃ lə tɛkst ɛ di.fi.sil/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah trah-dewk-syon aid boh-koo kahn luh tekst eh dee-fee-seel
Sentence_Translation: Translation helps a lot when the text is difficult.

Sentence: Je prépare le repas et je mets la table.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁe.paʁ lə ʁə.pa e ʒə mɛ la tabl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pray-par luh ruh-pah ay zhuh meh lah tabl
Sentence_Translation: I prepare the meal and set the table.

Sentence: Je prends mon déjeuner dehors quand il fait beau.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ mɔ̃ de.ʒø.ne də.ɔʁ kɑ̃ il fɛ bo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn mohn day-zhuh-nay duh-or kahn eel feh boh
Sentence_Translation: I eat my lunch outside when the weather’s nice.

Sentence: Après le dîner,je range tout dans la cuisine.
Sentence_IPA: /a.pʁɛ lə di.ne ʒə ʁɑ̃ʒ tu dɑ̃ la kɥi.zin/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah-preh luh dee-nay zhuh rahnzh too dahn lah kwee-zeen
Sentence_Translation: After dinner,I tidy everything in the kitchen.

Sentence: La cuisine est petite,donc je cuisine simplement.
Sentence_IPA: /la kɥi.zin ɛ pə.tit dɔ̃k ʒə kɥi.zin sɛ̃.plə.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah kwee-zeen eh puh-teet donk zhuh kwee-zeen sehn-pluh-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The kitchen is small,so I cook simply.

Sentence: Je suis une recette facile et je goûte souvent.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə sɥi yn ʁə.sɛt fa.sil e ʒə ɡut su.vɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh swee een ruh-set fah-seel ay zhuh goot soo-vahn
Sentence_Translation: I follow an easy recipe and taste often.

Sentence: La sauce est trop salée,donc j'ajoute de l'eau.
Sentence_IPA: /la sos ɛ tʁo sa.le dɔ̃k ʒa.ʒut də lo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah soss eh troh sah-LAY donk zhah-zhoot duh loh
Sentence_Translation: The sauce is too salty,so I add water.

Sentence: Je mets moins de sel pour garder le goût.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɛ mwɛ̃ də sɛl puʁ ɡaʁ.de lə ɡu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh meh mwehn duh sel poor gar-DAY luh goo
Sentence_Translation: I use less salt to keep the flavour.

Sentence: Je mets du poivre,mais pas trop aujourd'hui.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɛ dy pwavʁ mɛ pa tʁo o.ʒuʁ.dɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh meh dew pwahvr meh pah troh oh-zhoor-dwee
Sentence_Translation: I add pepper,but not too much today.

Sentence: J'ajoute un peu d'huile dans la poêle chaude.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒa.ʒut œ̃ pø dɥil dɑ̃ la pwal ʃod/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhah-zhoot uhn puh dweel dahn lah pwahl shohd
Sentence_Translation: I add a bit of oil in the hot pan.

Sentence: La poêle attache,donc je baisse le feu.
Sentence_IPA: /la pwal a.taʃ dɔ̃k ʒə bɛs lə fø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah pwahl ah-tash donk zhuh bess luh feu
Sentence_Translation: The pan sticks,so I turn down the heat.

Sentence: Je coupe du fromage et je le mets au frigo.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə kup dy fʁɔ.maʒ e ʒə lə mɛ o fʁi.ɡo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh koop dew froh-mazh ay zhuh luh meh oh free-goh
Sentence_Translation: I cut some cheese and put it in the fridge.
Elision_Note: de + le -> du; à + le -> au

Sentence: Le beurre est trop dur,donc je le sors.
Sentence_IPA: /lə bœʁ ɛ tʁo dyʁ dɔ̃k ʒə lə sɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh bur eh troh dewr donk zhuh luh sor
Sentence_Translation: The butter is too hard,so I take it out.

Sentence: Il n'y a plus de lait,alors j'en achète.
Sentence_IPA: /il nja ply də lɛ a.lɔʁ ʒɑ̃ a.ʃɛt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: eel nyah plew duh leh ah-lor zhahn ah-shet
Sentence_Translation: There’s no milk left,so I buy some.
Sentence_Breakdown: Il n'y a|there is not|Expr|/il nja/|eel nyah;plus|any more|Adv|/ply/|plew;de|of|Prep|/də/|duh;lait(le)|milk|Noun|/lɛ/|leh;alors|so|Conj|/a.lɔʁ/|ah-lor;j'|I|Pron|/ʒ/|zh;en|some|Pron|/ɑ̃/|ahn;achète|buy|Verb|/a.ʃɛt/|ah-shet

Sentence: Je casse un œuf et je bats la pâte.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə kas œ̃ nœf e ʒə ba la pat/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh kass uhn nuf ay zhuh bah lah pat
Sentence_Translation: I crack an egg and beat the mixture.

Sentence: Je prends du pain frais chez le boulanger.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ dy pɛ̃ fʁɛ ʃe lə bu.lɑ̃.ʒe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn dew pehn freh shay luh boo-lahn-zhay
Sentence_Translation: I get fresh bread from the baker.

Sentence: Le gâteau est réussi,donc j'en prends une part.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ɡa.to ɛ ʁe.y.si dɔ̃k ʒɑ̃ pʁɑ̃ tyn paʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh gah-toh eh ray-ew-SEE donk zhahn prahn teen par
Sentence_Translation: The cake is a success,so I take a slice.

Sentence: Je n'achète pas de bonbons,mais j'en mange parfois.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə na.ʃɛt pa də bɔ̃.bɔ̃ mɛ ʒɑ̃ mɑ̃ʒ paʁ.fwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh nah-shet pah duh bohn-bohn meh zhahn mahnzh par-fwah
Sentence_Translation: I don’t buy sweets,but I eat some sometimes.

Sentence: Je bois un café léger après le déjeuner.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə bwa œ̃ ka.fe le.ʒe a.pʁɛ lə de.ʒø.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh bwah uhn kah-fay lay-zhay ah-preh luh day-zhuh-nay
Sentence_Translation: I drink a light coffee after lunch.

Sentence: Je préfère le thé chaud quand il fait froid.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁe.fɛʁ lə te ʃo kɑ̃ il fɛ fʁwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pray-fair luh tay shoh kahn eel feh frwah
Sentence_Translation: I prefer hot tea when it’s cold.

Sentence: Je choisis une boisson sans sucre pour le soir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃwa.zi yn bwa.sɔ̃ sɑ̃ sykʁ puʁ lə swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shwah-zee een bwah-son sahn sewkruh poor luh swar
Sentence_Translation: I choose a drink without sugar for the evening.

Sentence: Je prends une chaise et je m'assois près du mur.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ yn ʃɛz e ʒə ma.swa pʁɛ dy myʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn een shez ay zhuh mah-swah preh dew mewr
Sentence_Translation: I take a chair and sit down near the wall.

Sentence: Le canapé est confortable,donc je reste ici ce soir.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ka.na.pe ɛ kɔ̃.fɔʁ.tabl dɔ̃k ʒə ʁɛst i.si sə swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh kah-nah-pay eh kon-for-tabl donk zhuh rest ee-see suh swar
Sentence_Translation: The sofa is comfortable,so I stay here tonight.

Sentence: Je cherche un coussin pour soutenir mon dos.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ œ̃ ku.sɛ̃ puʁ su.tə.niʁ mɔ̃ do/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh uhn koo-sehn poor soo-tuh-NEER mohn doh
Sentence_Translation: I look for a cushion to support my back.

Sentence: L'ampoule a grillé,donc j'en change une rapidement.
Sentence_IPA: /lɑ̃.pul a ɡʁi.je dɔ̃k ʒɑ̃ ʃɑ̃ʒ yn ʁa.pi.də.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lahn-pool ah gree-YAY donk zhahn shahnzh een rah-pee-duh-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The bulb has blown,so I replace one quickly.

Sentence: La prise ne tient plus,alors je débranche tout.
Sentence_IPA: /la pʁiz nə tjɛ̃ ply a.lɔʁ ʒə de.bʁɑ̃ʃ tu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah preez nuh tyehn plew ah-lor zhuh day-brahnsh too
Sentence_Translation: The socket won’t hold,so I unplug everything.

Sentence: Je prends une douche chaude après une longue marche.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ yn duʃ ʃod a.pʁɛ yn lɔ̃ɡ maʁʃ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn een doosh shohd ah-preh een lon(g) marsh
Sentence_Translation: I take a hot shower after a long walk.

Sentence: Je prends une serviette propre et je sèche mes cheveux.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ yn sɛʁ.vjɛt pʁɔp e ʒə sɛʃ me ʃə.vø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn een sair-vyet prop ay zhuh sesh may shuh-vuh
Sentence_Translation: I take a clean towel and dry my hair.

Sentence: Le savon glisse,donc je le pose ailleurs.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sa.vɔ̃ ɡlis dɔ̃k ʒə lə poz a.jœʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh sah-von gleess donk zhuh luh pohz ah-yur
Sentence_Translation: The soap slips,so I put it somewhere else.

Sentence: Je prends du shampoing,puis je rince très longtemps.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ dy ʃɑ̃.pwɛ̃ pɥi ʒə ʁɛ̃s tʁɛ lɔ̃.tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn dew shahn-pwehn pwee zhuh rans treh lon-tahn
Sentence_Translation: I use shampoo,then I rinse for ages.

Sentence: Je regarde dans le miroir et je souris un peu.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁə.ɡaʁd dɑ̃ lə mi.ʁwaʁ e ʒə su.ʁi œ̃ pø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ruh-gard dahn luh mee-rwar ay zhuh soo-REE uhn puh
Sentence_Translation: I look in the mirror and smile a bit.

Sentence: J'ai un cheveu sur la veste,je l'enlève vite.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe œ̃ ʃə.vø syʁ la vɛst ʒə lɑ̃.lɛv vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay uhn shuh-vuh sewr lah vest zhuh lahn-lev veet
Sentence_Translation: I’ve got a hair on my jacket; I remove it quickly.

Sentence: Je mets ma veste et je sors malgré le froid.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɛ ma vɛst e ʒə sɔʁ mal.ɡʁe lə fʁwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh meh mah vest ay zhuh sor mal-gray luh frwah
Sentence_Translation: I put on my jacket and go out despite the cold.

Sentence: Je prends un pull épais quand il fait humide.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ pyl e.pɛ kɑ̃ il fɛ y.mid/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn uhn pewl ay-peh kahn eel feh ew-meed
Sentence_Translation: I take a thick jumper when it’s damp.

Sentence: Je nettoie mes chaussures avant de rentrer chez moi.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə nɛ.twa me ʃo.syʁ a.vɑ̃ də ʁɑ̃.tʁe ʃe mwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh net-twah may sho-sür ah-vahn duh rahn-tray shay mwah
Sentence_Translation: I clean my shoes before going home.

Sentence: Je perds une chaussette,donc je cherche partout.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pɛʁd yn ʃo.sɛt dɔ̃k ʒə ʃɛʁʃ paʁ.tu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh paird een sho-set donk zhuh shairsh par-too
Sentence_Translation: I lose a sock,so I look everywhere.

Sentence: J'oublie mon écharpe,donc j'ai froid au cou.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒu.bli mɔ̃ e.ʃaʁp dɔ̃k ʒe fʁwa o ku/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhoo-blee mohn ay-sharp donk zhay frwah oh koo
Sentence_Translation: I forget my scarf,so my neck is cold.

Sentence: Je mets des gants noirs et je marche dehors.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɛ de ɡɑ̃ nwaʁ e ʒə maʁʃ də.ɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh meh day gahn nwar ay zhuh marsh duh-or
Sentence_Translation: I put on black gloves and walk outside.

Sentence: Je porte un chapeau simple quand il fait soleil.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pɔʁt œ̃ ʃa.po sɛ̃pl kɑ̃ il fɛ sɔ.lɛj/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh port uhn sha-poh sehnpl kahn eel feh soh-leh(y)
Sentence_Translation: I wear a simple hat when it’s sunny.

Sentence: Je prends une casquette,puis je sors courir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ yn kas.kɛt pɥi ʒə sɔʁ ku.ʁiʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn een kass-ket pwee zhuh sor koo-REER
Sentence_Translation: I take a cap,then I go out running.

Sentence: Je cherche la clé et j'ouvre enfin la porte.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ la kle e ʒuvʁ ɑ̃.fɛ̃ la pɔʁt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh lah klay ay zhoovr ahn-fehn lah port
Sentence_Translation: I look for the key and finally open the door.

Sentence: J'ouvre la fenêtre puis je respire l'air frais.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒuvʁ la fə.nɛtʁ pɥi ʒə ʁɛs.piʁ lɛʁ fʁɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhoovr lah fuh-netr pwee zhuh res-peer lair freh
Sentence_Translation: I open the window then I breathe the fresh air.
Elision_Note: je + ouvre -> j'ouvre; le + air -> l'air

Sentence: Je ferme le rideau pour cacher la lumière dehors.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛʁm lə ʁi.do puʁ ka.ʃe la ly.mjɛʁ də.ɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh fairm luh ree-doh poor kah-shay lah lew-myair duh-or
Sentence_Translation: I close the curtain to hide the light outside.

Sentence: L'escalier grince donc je monte très doucement.
Sentence_IPA: /lɛs.ka.lje ɡʁɛ̃s dɔ̃k ʒə mɔ̃t tʁɛ dus.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: les-kah-lyay grens donk zhuh mont treh doos-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The stairs creak so I go up very slowly.

Sentence: Je vis au troisième étage sans ascenseur aujourd'hui.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vis o tʁwa.zjɛm e.taʒ sɑ̃ na.sɑ̃.sœʁ o.ʒuʁ.dɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh veess oh trwah-zyem ay-tazh sahn nah-sahn-sur oh-zhoor-dwee
Sentence_Translation: I live on the third floor without a lift today.
Elision_Note: à + le -> au; sans + ascenseur (liaison n)

Sentence: L'ascenseur est en panne donc je prends l'escalier.
Sentence_IPA: /la.sɑ̃.sœʁ ɛ ɑ̃ pan dɔ̃k ʒə pʁɑ̃ lɛs.ka.lje/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah-sahn-sur eh ahn pan donk zhuh prahn les-kah-lyay
Sentence_Translation: The lift is broken so I take the stairs.
Elision_Note: l’ + ascenseur -> l'ascenseur; l’ + escalier -> l'escalier

Sentence: Je range les assiettes dans le placard du haut.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁɑ̃ʒ le za.sjɛt dɑ̃ lə pla.kaʁ dy o/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh rahnzh lay zah-syet dahn luh plah-kar dew oh
Sentence_Translation: I put the plates away in the top cupboard.
Elision_Note: les + assiettes (liaison z); de + le -> du

Sentence: Je cherche un tiroir vide pour mes papiers.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ œ̃ ti.ʁwaʁ vid puʁ me pa.pje/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh uhn tee-rwar veed poor may pah-pyay
Sentence_Translation: I look for an empty drawer for my papers.

Sentence: L'étagère est pleine donc je trie mes livres.
Sentence_IPA: /le.ta.ʒɛʁ ɛ plɛn dɔ̃k ʒə tʁi me livʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lay-tah-zair eh plen donk zhuh tree may leevr
Sentence_Translation: The shelf is full so I sort my books.

Sentence: La moquette est sale alors je la brosse dehors.
Sentence_IPA: /la mɔ.kɛt ɛ sal a.lɔʁ ʒə la bʁɔs də.ɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah mo-ket eh sal ah-lor zhuh lah bross duh-or
Sentence_Translation: The carpet is dirty so I brush it outside.

Sentence: Je prends une bouteille d'eau et je bois lentement.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ yn bu.tɛj do e ʒə bwa lɑ̃t.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn een boo-tay(y) doh ay zhuh bwah lahn-tuh-mahn
Sentence_Translation: I take a bottle of water and I drink slowly.

Sentence: Je prends un verre propre et je le rince.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ vɛʁ pʁɔp e ʒə lə ʁɛ̃s/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn uhn vair prop ay zhuh luh rans
Sentence_Translation: I take a clean glass and rinse it.

Sentence: Je lave une assiette puis je la range au placard.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə lav yn a.sjɛt pɥi ʒə la ʁɑ̃ʒ o pla.kaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh lav een ah-syet pwee zhuh lah rahnzh oh plah-kar
Sentence_Translation: I wash a plate then put it away in the cupboard.

Sentence: Je prends le couteau et je coupe le pain.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ lə ku.to e ʒə kup lə pɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn luh koo-toh ay zhuh koop luh pehn
Sentence_Translation: I take the knife and cut the bread.

Sentence: Je prends une cuillère et je mélange la sauce.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ yn kɥi.jɛʁ e ʒə me.lɑ̃ʒ la sos/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn een kwee-yair ay zhuh may-lahnzh lah soss
Sentence_Translation: I take a spoon and mix the sauce.

Sentence: Je prends une fourchette et je goûte un peu.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ yn fuʁ.ʃɛt e ʒə ɡut œ̃ pø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn een foor-shet ay zhuh goot uhn puh
Sentence_Translation: I take a fork and taste a bit.

Sentence: Je mets la nappe propre avant l'arrivée des invités.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɛ la nap pʁɔp a.vɑ̃ la.ʁi.ve de zĩ.vi.te/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh meh lah nap prop ah-vahn lah-ree-vay day zeen-vee-tay
Sentence_Translation: I put the clean tablecloth on before the guests arrive.

Sentence: Je plie les serviettes et je les pose sur la table.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pli le sɛʁ.vjɛt e ʒə le poz syʁ la tabl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh plee lay sair-vyet ay zhuh lay pohz sewr lah tabl
Sentence_Translation: I fold the napkins and put them on the table.

Sentence: Je sers le plat chaud et tout le monde mange.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə sɛʁ lə pla ʃo e tu lə mɔ̃d mɑ̃ʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh sair luh plah shoh ay too luh mond mahnzh
Sentence_Translation: I serve the hot dish and everyone eats.
Sentence_Breakdown: Je(Pron)|I|Pron|/ʒə/|zhuh;sers|serve|Verb|/sɛʁ/|sair;le(Art)|the|Art|/lə/|luh;plat(le)|dish|Noun|/pla/|plah;chaud|hot|Adj|/ʃo/|shoh;et|and|Conj|/e/|ay;tout le monde|everyone|Pron|/tu lə mɔ̃d/|too luh mond;mange|eats|Verb|/mɑ̃ʒ/|mahnzh

Sentence: Après le repas je prends un dessert simple.
Sentence_IPA: /a.pʁɛ lə ʁə.pa ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ de.sɛʁ sɛ̃pl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah-preh luh ruh-pah zhuh prahn uhn day-sair sehnpl
Sentence_Translation: After the meal I have a simple dessert.

Sentence: Je lis l'étiquette et je vérifie la date.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə li le.ti.kɛt e ʒə ve.ʁi.fi la dat/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh lee lay-tee-ket ay zhuh vay-ree-fee lah dat
Sentence_Translation: I read the label and check the date.

Sentence: Je compare le prix avant d'acheter ce produit.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə kɔ̃.paʁ lə pʁi a.vɑ̃ da.ʃə.te sə pʁɔ.dɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh kon-par luh pree ah-vahn dah-shuh-tay suh proh-dwee
Sentence_Translation: I compare the price before buying this product.

Sentence: Le magasin ouvre tôt et ferme assez tard.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ma.ɡa.zɛ̃ uvʁ to e fɛʁm a.se taʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh mah-gah-zehn oovr toh ay fairm ah-say tar
Sentence_Translation: The shop opens early and closes quite late.

Sentence: Je cherche au rayon frais et je prends du yaourt.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ o ʁɛ.jɔ̃ fʁɛ e ʒə pʁɑ̃ dy ja.uʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh oh ray-yon freh ay zhuh prahn dew yah-oor
Sentence_Translation: I look in the chilled aisle and take some yoghurt.
Elision_Note: à + le -> au; de + le -> du

Sentence: Je pousse le caddie lentement pour éviter les gens.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pus lə ka.di lɑ̃t.mɑ̃ puʁ e.vi.te le ʒɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pooss luh kah-dee lahn-tuh-mahn poor ay-vee-tay lay zhahn
Sentence_Translation: I push the trolley slowly to avoid people.

Sentence: À la caisse je paie et je range mes achats.
Sentence_IPA: /a la kɛs ʒə pɛ e ʒə ʁɑ̃ʒ me za.ʃa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah lah kess zhuh peh ay zhuh rahnzh may zah-shah
Sentence_Translation: At the checkout I pay and pack my shopping.

Sentence: Je n'ai plus de monnaie donc je paie par carte.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ne ply də mɔ.nɛ dɔ̃k ʒə pɛ paʁ kaʁt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh nay plew duh mo-neh donk zhuh peh par kart
Sentence_Translation: I’ve no change left so I pay by card.

Sentence: Je sors ma carte et je tape mon code.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə sɔʁ ma kaʁt e ʒə tap mɔ̃ kɔd/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh sor mah kart ay zhuh tap mohn kod
Sentence_Translation: I take out my card and type my PIN.

Sentence: Je garde le reçu au cas où ça pose problème.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ɡaʁd lə ʁə.sy o ka u sa poz pʁɔ.blɛm/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh gard luh ruh-sew oh kah oo sah pohz proh-blem
Sentence_Translation: I keep the receipt in case there’s a problem.

Sentence: Le client demande de l'aide et je réponds poliment.
Sentence_IPA: /lə kli.jɑ̃ də.mɑ̃d də lɛd e ʒə ʁe.pɔ̃ pɔ.li.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh klee-yahn duh-mahnd duh led ay zhuh ray-pon poh-lee-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The customer asks for help and I reply politely.

Sentence: La queue avance lentement mais je garde patience.
Sentence_IPA: /la kø a.vɑ̃s lɑ̃t.mɑ̃ mɛ ʒə ɡaʁd pa.sjɑ̃s/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah kuh ah-vahns lahn-tuh-mahn meh zhuh gard pah-syanss
Sentence_Translation: The queue moves slowly but I stay patient.

Sentence: Il est une heure trente et je dois partir.
Sentence_IPA: /il ɛ tyn œʁ tʁɑ̃t e ʒə dwa paʁ.tiʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: eel eh teen ur trahnt ay zhuh dwah par-teer
Sentence_Translation: It is half past one and I must leave.

Sentence: L'horloge retarde un peu donc je la règle.
Sentence_IPA: /lɔʁ.lɔʒ ʁə.taʁd œ̃ pø dɔ̃k ʒə la ʁɛɡl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lor-lozh ruh-tar(d) uhn puh donk zhuh lah reg-l
Sentence_Translation: The clock runs slow so I set it.

Sentence: J'attends une minute puis je rappelle mon ami.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒa.tɑ̃d yn mi.nyt pɥi ʒə ʁa.pɛl mɔ̃ na.mi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhah-tahn(d) een mee-newt pwee zhuh rah-pel mohn nah-mee
Sentence_Translation: I wait a minute then I call my friend back.

Sentence: Je suis en retard donc je marche plus vite.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə sɥi ɑ̃ ʁə.taʁ dɔ̃k ʒə maʁʃ ply vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh swee ahn ruh-tar donk zhuh marsh plew veet
Sentence_Translation: I’m late so I walk faster.

Sentence: Le projet avance bien mais il reste du travail.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pʁɔ.ʒɛ a.vɑ̃s bjɛ̃ mɛ zil ʁɛst dy tʁa.vaj/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh proh-zhay ah-vahns byehn meh zeel rest dew trah-vye
Sentence_Translation: The project is going well but there is work left.

Sentence: La réunion commence à neuf heures et dure longtemps.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁe.y.njɔ̃ kɔ.mɑ̃s a nœ vœʁ e dyʁ lɔ̃.tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah ray-ew-nyon koh-mahnss ah nuh vur ay dewr lon-tahn
Sentence_Translation: The meeting starts at nine and lasts a long time.

Sentence: Mon collègue m'appelle souvent quand il a un doute.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ kɔ.lɛɡ ma.pɛl su.vɑ̃ kɑ̃ il a œ̃ dut/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn koh-leg mah-pel soo-vahn kahn eel ah uhn doot
Sentence_Translation: My colleague often calls me when he has a doubt.

Sentence: J'ai un doute alors je vérifie la réponse encore.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe œ̃ dut a.lɔʁ ʒə ve.ʁi.fi la ʁe.pɔ̃s ɑ̃.kɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay uhn doot ah-lor zhuh vay-ree-fee lah ray-ponss ahn-kor
Sentence_Translation: I have a doubt so I check the answer again.

Sentence: Le résultat est correct mais je veux mieux faire.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ʁe.zyl.ta ɛ kɔ.ʁɛk mɛ ʒə vø mjø fɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh ray-zewl-tah eh koh-rek meh zhuh vuh myuh fair
Sentence_Translation: The result is correct but I want to do better.

Sentence: Mon objectif est simple et je le tiens chaque jour.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ nɔb.ʒɛk.tif ɛ sɛ̃pl e ʒə lə tjɛ̃ ʃak ʒuʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn nob-zhek-teef eh sehnpl ay zhuh luh tyehn shak zhoor
Sentence_Translation: My goal is simple and I stick to it every day.

Sentence: Je copie le fichier sur la clé USB.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə kɔ.pi lə fi.ʃje syʁ la kle y.ɛs.be/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh koh-pee luh fee-shyay sewr lah klay ew-ess-bay
Sentence_Translation: I copy the file onto the USB stick.

Sentence: Le fichier est trop lourd donc je le compresse.
Sentence_IPA: /lə fi.ʃje ɛ tʁo luʁ dɔ̃k ʒə lə kɔ̃.pʁɛs/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh fee-shyay eh troh loor donk zhuh luh kon-press
Sentence_Translation: The file is too large so I compress it.

Sentence: Je tape vite sur le clavier sans regarder.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tap vit syʁ lə kla.vje sɑ̃ ʁə.ɡaʁ.de/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh tap veet sewr luh klah-vyay sahn ruh-gar-day
Sentence_Translation: I type quickly on the keyboard without looking.

Sentence: La souris se bloque alors je redémarre l'ordinateur.
Sentence_IPA: /la su.ʁi sə blɔk a.lɔʁ ʒə ʁe.de.maʁ lɔʁ.di.na.tœʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah soo-ree suh blok ah-lor zhuh ray-day-mar lor-dee-nah-tur
Sentence_Translation: The mouse freezes so I restart the computer.

Sentence: L'écran est trop lumineux donc je baisse la lumière.
Sentence_IPA: /le.kʁɑ̃ ɛ tʁo ly.mi.nø dɔ̃k ʒə bɛs la ly.mjɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lay-krahn eh troh lew-mee-nuh donk zhuh bess lah lew-myair
Sentence_Translation: The screen is too bright so I lower the brightness.

Sentence: J'oublie mon mot de passe et je le réinitialise.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒu.bli mɔ̃ mo də pas e ʒə lə ʁe.i.ni.sja.liz/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhoo-blee mohn moh duh pahss ay zhuh luh ray-ee-nee-syah-leez
Sentence_Translation: I forget my password and reset it.

Sentence: Mon ordinateur chauffe vite donc je l'éteins.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ nɔʁ.di.na.tœʁ ʃof vit dɔ̃k ʒə le.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn nor-dee-nah-tur shoff veet donk zhuh lay-tehn
Sentence_Translation: My computer heats up quickly so I switch it off.
Elision_Note: mon + ordinateur (liaison n); je + éteins -> j'éteins

Sentence: La connexion coupe souvent donc j'attends un peu.
Sentence_IPA: /la kɔ.nɛk.sjɔ̃ kup su.vɑ̃ dɔ̃k ʒa.tɑ̃ œ̃ pø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah koh-nek-syon koop soo-vahn donk zhah-tahn uhn puh
Sentence_Translation: The connection drops often so I wait a bit.

Sentence: Sans internet je travaille moins vite ce matin.
Sentence_IPA: /sɑ̃ nɛ̃.tɛʁ.nɛt ʒə tʁa.vaj mwɛ̃ vit sə ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: sahn nen-ter-net zhuh trah-vye mwehn veet suh mah-tehn
Sentence_Translation: Without internet I work more slowly this morning.

Sentence: Je lis ton message et je réponds tout de suite.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə li tɔ̃ me.saʒ e ʒə ʁe.pɔ̃ tu də sɥit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh lee tohn meh-sazh ay zhuh ray-pon too duh sweet
Sentence_Translation: I read your message and reply right away.
Sentence_Breakdown: Je(Pron)|I|Pron|/ʒə/|zhuh;lis|read|Verb|/li/|lee;ton(Det)|your|Det|/tɔ̃/|tohn;message(le)|message|Noun|/me.saʒ/|meh-sazh;et|and|Conj|/e/|ay;je(Pron)|I|Pron|/ʒə/|zhuh;réponds|reply|Verb|/ʁe.pɔ̃/|ray-pon;tout de suite|right away|Adv|/tu də sɥit/|too duh sweet

Sentence: Je vois le médecin demain pour un contrôle.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vwa lə med.sɛ̃ də.mɛ̃ puʁ œ̃ kɔ̃.tʁol/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh vwah luh may-duh-sehn duh-mehn poor uhn kon-trol
Sentence_Translation: I see the doctor tomorrow for a check-up.

Sentence: Je passe à la pharmacie avant de rentrer.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pas a la faʁ.ma.si a.vɑ̃ də ʁɑ̃.tʁe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pass ah lah far-ma-see ah-vahn duh rahn-tray
Sentence_Translation: I stop by the pharmacy before going home.

Sentence: J'ai un rendez-vous à midi chez le dentiste.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe œ̃ ʁɑ̃.de.vu a mi.di ʃe lə dɑ̃.tist/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay uhn rahn-day-voo ah mee-dee shay luh dahn-teest
Sentence_Translation: I have an appointment at noon at the dentist.

Sentence: Je garde le ticket au cas où je me trompe.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ɡaʁd lə ti.kɛ o ka u ʒə mə tʁɔ̃p/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh gard luh tee-kay oh kah oo zhuh muh tronp
Sentence_Translation: I keep the ticket in case I’m wrong.

Sentence: La station est fermée donc je prends un bus.
Sentence_IPA: /la sta.sjɔ̃ ɛ fɛʁ.me dɔ̃k ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ bys/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah stah-syon eh fair-may donk zhuh prahn uhn bewss
Sentence_Translation: The station is closed so I take a bus.

Sentence: Dans le métro je lis sans faire de bruit.
Sentence_IPA: /dɑ̃ lə me.tʁo ʒə li sɑ̃ fɛʁ də bʁɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: dahn luh may-troh zhuh lee sahn fair duh bwee
Sentence_Translation: On the metro I read without making noise.

Sentence: La rue est calme ce matin malgré la pluie.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁy ɛ kalm sə ma.tɛ̃ mal.ɡʁe la plɥi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah rew eh kahlm suh mah-tehn mal-gray lah plwee
Sentence_Translation: The street is quiet this morning despite the rain.

Sentence: Je marche sur le trottoir pour éviter la boue.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə maʁʃ syʁ lə tʁɔ.twaʁ puʁ e.vi.te la bu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh marsh sewr luh trot-twar poor ay-vee-tay lah boo
Sentence_Translation: I walk on the pavement to avoid mud.

Sentence: La pluie tombe fort donc je rentre rapidement.
Sentence_IPA: /la plɥi tɔ̃b fɔʁ dɔ̃k ʒə ʁɑ̃tʁ ʁa.pi.də.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah plwee tomb for donk zhuh rahntr rah-pee-duh-mahn
Sentence_Translation: The rain is falling hard so I go back quickly.

Sentence: Je prends mon parapluie et je reste au sec.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ mɔ̃ pa.ʁa.plɥi e ʒə ʁɛst o sɛk/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn mohn pah-rah-plwee ay zhuh rest oh sek
Sentence_Translation: I take my umbrella and stay dry.

Sentence: Le vent souffle fort donc je ferme la fenêtre.
Sentence_IPA: /lə vɑ̃ sufl fɔʁ dɔ̃k ʒə fɛʁm la fə.nɛtʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh vahn soofl for donk zhuh fairm lah fuh-netr
Sentence_Translation: The wind blows hard so I close the window.

Sentence: La neige tombe doucement et la rue devient blanche.
Sentence_IPA: /la nɛʒ tɔ̃b dus.mɑ̃ e la ʁy də.vjɛ̃ blɑ̃ʃ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah nezh tomb doos-mahn ay lah rew duh-vyehn blahnsh
Sentence_Translation: Snow falls softly and the street turns white.

Sentence: Le soleil revient et je sors sans manteau.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɔ.lɛj ʁə.vjɛ̃ e ʒə sɔʁ sɑ̃ mɑ̃.to/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh soh-leh(y) ruh-vyehn ay zhuh sor sahn mahn-toe
Sentence_Translation: The sun comes back and I go out without a coat.

Sentence: Je cherche de l'ombre car il fait trop chaud.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ də lɔ̃bʁ kaʁ il fɛ tʁo ʃo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh duh lomb-ruh kar eel feh troh shoh
Sentence_Translation: I look for shade because it is too hot.

Sentence: La température baisse vite quand la nuit arrive.
Sentence_IPA: /la tɑ̃.pə.ʁa.tyʁ bɛs vit kɑ̃ la nɥi a.ʁiv/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah tahn-puh-rah-tewr bess veet kahn lah nwee ah-reev
Sentence_Translation: The temperature drops quickly when night comes.

Sentence: Au printemps les jours sont plus longs et doux.
Sentence_IPA: /o pʁɛ̃.tɑ̃ le ʒuʁ sɔ̃ ply lɔ̃ e du/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: oh preh(n)-tahn lay zhoor sohn plew lon ay doo
Sentence_Translation: In spring the days are longer and mild.

Sentence: En été je bois plus d'eau pendant la journée.
Sentence_IPA: /ɑ̃ e.te ʒə bwa ply do pɑ̃.dɑ̃ la ʒuʁ.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ahn ay-tay zhuh bwah plew doh pahn-dahn lah zhoor-nay
Sentence_Translation: In summer I drink more water during the day.

Sentence: En automne les feuilles tombent et tout change.
Sentence_IPA: /ɑ̃ o.tɔn le fœj tɔ̃b e tu ʃɑ̃ʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ahn oh-ton lay fuhy tomb ay too shahnzh
Sentence_Translation: In autumn the leaves fall and everything changes.

Sentence: En hiver je rentre tôt pour rester au chaud.
Sentence_IPA: /ɑ̃ i.vɛʁ ʒə ʁɑ̃tʁ to puʁ ʁɛs.te o ʃo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ahn ee-vair zhuh rahntr toh poor res-tay oh shoh
Sentence_Translation: In winter I come home early to stay warm.

Sentence: Un nuage cache le soleil puis il revient.
Sentence_IPA: /œ̃ nɥaʒ kaʃ lə sɔ.lɛj pɥi il ʁə.vjɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: uhn new-azh kash luh soh-leh(y) pwee eel ruh-vyehn
Sentence_Translation: A cloud hides the sun then it returns.

Sentence: Le ciel devient clair et je vois les étoiles.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sjɛl də.vjɛ̃ klɛʁ e ʒə vwa le ze.twal/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh syel duh-vyehn klair ay zhuh vwah lay zay-twal
Sentence_Translation: The sky clears and I see the stars.

Sentence: Une étoile brille fort au-dessus de la ville.
Sentence_IPA: /yn e.twal bʁij fɔʁ o.dy.sy də la vil/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: een ay-twal bree(y) for oh-dew-sew duh lah veel
Sentence_Translation: A star shines brightly above the city.

Sentence: La lune est pleine et la nuit est claire.
Sentence_IPA: /la lyn ɛ plɛn e la nɥi ɛ klɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah lewn eh plen ay lah nwee eh klair
Sentence_Translation: The moon is full and the night is clear.

Sentence: La route est longue donc je fais une pause.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁut ɛ lɔ̃ɡ dɔ̃k ʒə fɛ yn poz/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah root eh lon(g) donk zhuh feh een pohz
Sentence_Translation: The road is long so I take a break.

Sentence: Je traverse le pont et j'écoute l'eau dessous.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tʁa.vɛʁs lə pɔ̃ e ʒe.kut lo də.su/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh trah-vairs luh pon ay zhay-koo(t) loh duh-soo
Sentence_Translation: I cross the bridge and listen to the water below.

Sentence: Mon voisin parle fort mais il est gentil.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ vwa.zɛ̃ paʁl fɔʁ mɛ zil ɛ ʒɑ̃.ti/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn vwah-zehn parl for meh zeel eh zhan-tee
Sentence_Translation: My neighbour speaks loudly but he is nice.

Sentence: Ma voisine m'offre un café quand je l'aide.
Sentence_IPA: /ma vwa.zin mɔfʁ œ̃ ka.fe kɑ̃ ʒə lɛd/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah vwah-zeen mofr uhn kah-fay kahn zhuh led
Sentence_Translation: My neighbour offers me a coffee when I help her.

Sentence: Le quartier change vite mais j'aime l'ambiance ici.
Sentence_IPA: /lə kaʁ.tje ʃɑ̃ʒ vit mɛ ʒɛm lɑ̃.bjɑ̃s i.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh kar-tyay shahnzh veet meh zhem lahn-byahns ee-see
Sentence_Translation: The neighbourhood changes fast but I like the atmosphere here.
Elision_Note: je + aime -> j'aime; le + ambiance -> l'ambiance

Sentence: J'entends un bruit étrange derrière la porte.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒɑ̃.tɑ̃ œ̃ bʁɥi e.tʁɑ̃ʒ dɛ.ʁjɛʁ la pɔʁt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhahn-tahn uhn bwee ay-trahnzh deh-ryair lah port
Sentence_Translation: I hear a strange noise behind the door.

Sentence: Le silence revient et je peux enfin penser.
Sentence_IPA: /lə si.lɑ̃s ʁə.vjɛ̃ e ʒə pø ɑ̃.fɛ̃ pɑ̃.se/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh see-lahns ruh-vyehn ay zhuh puh ahn-fehn pahn-say
Sentence_Translation: Silence returns and I can finally think.

Sentence: La fête commence tard mais tout le monde danse.
Sentence_IPA: /la fɛt kɔ.mɑ̃s taʁ mɛ tu lə mɔ̃d dɑ̃s/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah fet koh-mahnss tar meh too luh mond dahns
Sentence_Translation: The party starts late but everyone dances.
Sentence_Breakdown: La(Art)|the|Art|/la/|lah;fête(la)|party|Noun|/fɛt/|fet;commence|starts|Verb|/kɔ.mɑ̃s/|koh-mahnss;tard|late|Adv|/taʁ/|tar;mais|but|Conj|/mɛ/|meh;tout le monde|everyone|Pron|/tu lə mɔ̃d/|too luh mond;danse|dances|Verb|/dɑ̃s/|dahns

Sentence: Pour mon anniversaire je reçois des messages gentils.
Sentence_IPA: /puʁ mɔ̃ a.ni.vɛʁ.sɛʁ ʒə ʁə.swa de me.saʒ ʒɑ̃.ti/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: poor mohn ah-nee-vair-sair zhuh ruh-swah day meh-sazh zhan-tee
Sentence_Translation: For my birthday I receive kind messages.

Sentence: J'offre un cadeau simple et j'écris une carte.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒɔfʁ œ̃ ka.do sɛ̃pl e ʒe.kʁi yn kaʁt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhoffr uhn kah-doh sehnpl ay zhay-kree een kart
Sentence_Translation: I give a simple gift and write a card.

Sentence: L'invité arrive tôt et apporte une bouteille.
Sentence_IPA: /lɛ̃.vi.te a.ʁiv to e a.pɔʁt yn bu.tɛj/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lan-vee-tay ah-reev toh ay ah-port een boo-tay(y)
Sentence_Translation: The guest arrives early and brings a bottle.

Sentence: La musique est forte donc je ferme la porte.
Sentence_IPA: /la my.zik ɛ fɔʁt dɔ̃k ʒə fɛʁm la pɔʁt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah mew-zeek eh fort donk zhuh fairm lah port
Sentence_Translation: The music is loud so I close the door.

Sentence: Je connais cette chanson et je chante doucement.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə kɔ.nɛ sɛt ʃɑ̃.sɔ̃ e ʒə ʃɑ̃t dus.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh koh-neh set shahn-son ay zhuh shahnt doos-mahn
Sentence_Translation: I know this song and sing softly.

Sentence: La danse finit tard et je suis très fatigué.
Sentence_IPA: /la dɑ̃s fi.ni taʁ e ʒə sɥi tʁɛ fa.ti.ɡe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah dahns fee-nee tar ay zhuh swee treh fah-tee-gay
Sentence_Translation: The dance ends late and I am very tired.

Sentence: Je prends une photo nette avec mon téléphone.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ yn fo.to nɛt a.vɛk mɔ̃ te.le.fɔn/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn een foh-toh net ah-vek mohn tay-lay-fon
Sentence_Translation: I take a sharp photo with my phone.

Sentence: Mon téléphone sonne mais je ne réponds pas.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ te.le.fɔn sɔn mɛ ʒə nə ʁe.pɔ̃ pa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn tay-lay-fon son meh zhuh nuh ray-pon pah
Sentence_Translation: My phone rings but I don’t answer.

Sentence: Je reçois un appel tard et je suis surpris.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁə.swa œ̃ na.pɛl taʁ e ʒə sɥi syʁ.pʁi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ruh-swah uhn nah-pel tar ay zhuh swee sewr-pree
Sentence_Translation: I receive a late call and I’m surprised.

Sentence: Ta réponse arrive enfin et je suis rassuré.
Sentence_IPA: /ta ʁe.pɔ̃s a.ʁiv ɑ̃.fɛ̃ e ʒə sɥi ʁa.sy.ʁe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: tah ray-ponss ah-reev ahn-fehn ay zhuh swee rah-sew-ray
Sentence_Translation: Your reply finally arrives and I’m relieved.

Sentence: Je pose une question claire et tu comprends vite.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə poz yn kɛs.tjɔ̃ klɛʁ e ty kɔ̃.pʁɑ̃ vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pohz een kess-tyon klair ay tew kon-prahn veet
Sentence_Translation: I ask a clear question and you understand quickly.

Sentence: Je fais une erreur simple mais je la corrige.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ yn e.ʁœʁ sɛ̃pl mɛ ʒə la kɔ.ʁiʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh een ay-rur sehnpl meh zhuh lah koh-reezh
Sentence_Translation: I make a simple mistake but I correct it.

Sentence: Je donne un exemple simple pour expliquer la règle.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə dɔn œ̃ nɛɡ.zɑ̃pl sɛ̃pl puʁ ɛks.pli.ke la ʁɛɡl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh don uhn neg-zahnpl sehnpl poor eks-plee-kay lah reg-l
Sentence_Translation: I give a simple example to explain the rule.

Sentence: La règle est facile et je la retiens vite.
Sentence_IPA: /la ʁɛɡl ɛ fa.sil e ʒə la ʁə.tjɛ̃ vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah reg-l eh fah-seel ay zhuh lah ruh-tyehn veet
Sentence_Translation: The rule is easy and I remember it quickly.

Sentence: Je fais une révision rapide avant le test demain.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ yn ʁe.vi.zjɔ̃ ʁa.pid a.vɑ̃ lə tɛst də.mɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh een ray-vee-zyon rah-peed ah-vahn luh test duh-mehn
Sentence_Translation: I do a quick revision before the test tomorrow.

Sentence: Je fais un exercice court puis je relis tout.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ œ̃ nɛɡ.zɛʁ.sis kuʁ pɥi ʒə ʁə.li tu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh uhn neg-zair-seess koor pwee zhuh ruh-lee too
Sentence_Translation: I do a short exercise then I reread everything.

Sentence: La lecture me calme et je dors mieux ensuite.
Sentence_IPA: /la lɛk.tyʁ mə kalm e ʒə dɔʁ mjø ɑ̃.sɥit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah lek-tewr muh kahlm ay zhuh dor myuh ahn-sweet
Sentence_Translation: Reading calms me and I sleep better afterwards.

Sentence: Je tourne la page et je continue en silence.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tuʁn la paʒ e ʒə kɔ̃.ti.ny ɑ̃ si.lɑ̃s/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh toorn lah pazh ay zhuh kon-tee-new ahn see-lahns
Sentence_Translation: I turn the page and continue in silence.

Sentence: Je prends un livre court pour le trajet.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ œ̃ livʁ kuʁ puʁ lə tʁa.ʒɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn uhn leevr koor poor luh trah-zhay
Sentence_Translation: I take a short book for the journey.

Sentence: J'aime cet auteur car son style est simple.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒɛm sɛt o.tœʁ kaʁ sɔ̃ stil ɛ sɛ̃pl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhem set oh-ter kar sohn steel eh sehnpl
Sentence_Translation: I like this author because his style is simple.

Sentence: L'histoire est courte mais elle est touchante.
Sentence_IPA: /li.stwaʁ ɛ kuʁt mɛ ɛl ɛ tu.ʃɑ̃t/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lees-twar eh koort meh el eh too-shahnt
Sentence_Translation: The story is short but it is moving.

Sentence: Je finis le chapitre puis je ferme le livre.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fi.ni lə ʃa.pitʁ pɥi ʒə fɛʁm lə livʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh fee-nee luh sha-peetr pwee zhuh fairm luh leevr
Sentence_Translation: I finish the chapter then I close the book.

Sentence: Je vais à la bibliothèque après le travail.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vɛ a la bi.bli.jɔ.tɛk a.pʁɛ lə tʁa.vaj/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh veh ah lah bee-blee-oh-tek ah-preh luh trah-vye
Sentence_Translation: I go to the library after work.

Sentence: Le film commence bientôt alors je coupe mon téléphone.
Sentence_IPA: /lə film kɔ.mɑ̃s bjɛ̃.to a.lɔʁ ʒə kup mɔ̃ te.le.fɔn/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh feelm koh-mahnss byehn-toh ah-lor zhuh koop mohn tay-lay-fon
Sentence_Translation: The film starts soon so I silence my phone.

Sentence: Je regarde une série courte après le dîner.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁə.ɡaʁd yn se.ʁi kuʁt a.pʁɛ lə di.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ruh-gard een say-ree koort ah-preh luh dee-nay
Sentence_Translation: I watch a short series after dinner.

Sentence: L'épisode est drôle et je ris tout seul.
Sentence_IPA: /le.pi.zɔd ɛ dʁol e ʒə ʁi tu sœl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lay-pee-zod eh drol ay zhuh ree too suhl
Sentence_Translation: The episode is funny and I laugh on my own.

Sentence: La télé reste allumée mais personne ne regarde.
Sentence_IPA: /la te.le ʁɛst a.ly.me mɛ pɛʁ.sɔn nə ʁə.ɡaʁd/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah tay-lay rest ah-lew-may meh pair-son nuh ruh-gard
Sentence_Translation: The TV stays on but nobody watches.

Sentence: Je regarde l'écran trop longtemps et j'ai mal.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁə.ɡaʁd le.kʁɑ̃ tʁo lɔ̃.tɑ̃ e ʒe mal/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ruh-gard lay-krahn troh lon-tahn ay zhay mal
Sentence_Translation: I stare at the screen too long and I feel sore.

Sentence: Je change de chaîne car le programme est nul.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɑ̃ʒ də ʃɛn kaʁ lə pʁɔ.ɡʁam ɛ nyl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shahnzh duh shen kar luh proh-gram eh newl
Sentence_Translation: I change channel because the programme is rubbish.

Sentence: Je lis le journal chaque matin au café.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə li lə ʒuʁ.nal ʃak ma.tɛ̃ o ka.fe/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh lee luh zhoor-nal shak mah-tehn oh kah-fay
Sentence_Translation: I read the newspaper every morning at the café.

Meaning: news / piece of news / short story
Sentence: La nouvelle me surprend et je reste silencieux.
Sentence_IPA: /la nu.vɛl mə syʁ.pʁɑ̃ e ʒə ʁɛst si.lɑ̃.sjø/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah noo-vel muh sewr-prahn ay zhuh rest see-lahn-syuh
Sentence_Translation: The news surprises me and I stay quiet.

Sentence: J'allume la radio et j'écoute les infos.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒa.lym la ʁa.djo e ʒe.kut le zɛ̃.fo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhah-lyoom lah rah-dyo ay zhay-koo(t) lay zen-foh
Sentence_Translation: I turn on the radio and listen to the news.
Elision_Note: je + allume -> j'allume; je + écoute -> j'écoute

Sentence: L'émission commence à huit heures ce soir.
Sentence_IPA: /le.mi.sjɔ̃ kɔ.mɑ̃s a ɥit œʁ sə swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lay-mee-syon koh-mahnss ah weet ur suh swar
Sentence_Translation: The show starts at eight o’clock tonight.

Sentence: La publicité passe souvent et ça m'agace.
Sentence_IPA: /la py.bli.si.te pas su.vɑ̃ e sa ma.ɡas/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah pew-blee-see-tay pass soo-vahn ay sah mah-gass
Sentence_Translation: The advert comes on often and it annoys me.

Sentence: Mon abonnement finit bientôt donc je renouvelle.
Sentence_IPA: /mɔ̃ na.bɔ.nə.mɑ̃ fi.ni bjɛ̃.to dɔ̃k ʒə ʁə.nu.vɛl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mohn nah-bon-uh-mahn fee-nee byehn-toh donk zhuh ruh-noo-vel
Sentence_Translation: My subscription ends soon so I renew.

Sentence: Je mets le casque pour parler en ligne.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə mɛ lə kask puʁ paʁ.le ɑ̃ liɲ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh meh luh kask poor par-lay ahn leen(y)
Sentence_Translation: I put on the headset to speak online.

Sentence: J'ai perdu un écouteur dans le métro.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe pɛʁ.dy œ̃ ne.ku.tœʁ dɑ̃ lə me.tʁo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay pair-dew uhn nay-koo-ter dahn luh may-troh
Sentence_Translation: I lost an earbud on the metro.

Sentence: La batterie est faible alors je cherche une prise.
Sentence_IPA: /la ba.tʁi ɛ fɛbl a.lɔʁ ʒə ʃɛʁʃ yn pʁiz/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah bah-tree eh febl ah-lor zhuh shairsh een preez
Sentence_Translation: The battery is low so I look for a socket.

Sentence: Je branche le chargeur et le téléphone charge.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə bʁɑ̃ʃ lə ʃaʁ.ʒœʁ e lə te.le.fɔn ʃaʁʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh brahnsh luh shar-zher ay luh tay-lay-fon sharzh
Sentence_Translation: I plug in the charger and the phone charges.

Sentence: Je trouve une prise libre près de la fenêtre.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tʁuv yn pʁiz libʁ pʁɛ də la fə.nɛtʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh troov een preez leebr preh duh lah fuh-netr
Sentence_Translation: I find a free socket near the window.

Sentence: L'ampoule a grillé donc je la remplace.
Sentence_IPA: /lɑ̃.pul a ɡʁi.je dɔ̃k ʒə la ʁɑ̃.plas/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lahn-pool ah gree-yay donk zhuh lah rahn-plass
Sentence_Translation: The bulb has blown so I replace it.

Sentence: Je prends la lampe et je lis au lit.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ la lɑ̃p e ʒə li o li/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn lah lahmp ay zhuh lee oh lee
Sentence_Translation: I take the lamp and read in bed.

Sentence: J'appuie sur l'interrupteur et la pièce s'éclaire.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒa.pɥi syʁ lɛ̃.tɛ.ʁyp.tœʁ e la pjɛs se.klɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhah-pwee sewr len-teh-rewp-ter ay lah pyess say-klair
Sentence_Translation: I press the switch and the room lights up.
Elision_Note: je + appuie -> j'appuie; se + éclaire -> s'éclaire

Sentence: La pièce est petite mais elle est confortable.
Sentence_IPA: /la pjɛs ɛ pə.tit mɛ ɛl ɛ kɔ̃.fɔʁ.tabl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lah pyess eh puh-teet meh el eh kon-for-tabl
Sentence_Translation: The room is small but it is comfortable.

Sentence: Le plafond est haut et la pièce résonne.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pla.fɔ̃ ɛ o e la pjɛs ʁe.zɔn/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh plah-fon eh oh ay lah pyess ray-zon
Sentence_Translation: The ceiling is high and the room echoes.

Sentence: Je peins le mur en blanc pour plus de lumière.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pɛ̃ lə myʁ ɑ̃ blɑ̃ puʁ ply də ly.mjɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pehn luh mewr ahn blahn poor plew duh lew-myair
Sentence_Translation: I paint the wall white for more light.

Sentence: Le sol est mouillé donc je fais attention.
Sentence_IPA: /lə sɔl ɛ mu.je dɔ̃k ʒə fɛ a.tɑ̃.sjɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh sol eh moo-yay donk zhuh feh ah-tahn-syon
Sentence_Translation: The floor is wet so I’m careful.

Sentence: Une odeur étrange vient de la cuisine ce soir.
Sentence_IPA: /yn o.dœʁ e.tʁɑ̃ʒ vjɛ̃ də la kɥi.zin sə swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: een oh-der ay-trahnzh vyehn duh lah kwee-zeen suh swar
Sentence_Translation: A strange smell comes from the kitchen tonight.

Sentence: Le goût est différent mais je mange quand même.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ɡu ɛ di.fe.ʁɑ̃ mɛ ʒə mɑ̃ʒ kɑ̃ mɛm/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh goo eh dee-fay-rahn meh zhuh mahnzh kahn mem
Sentence_Translation: The taste is different but I eat anyway.

Sentence: J'ai faim alors je prépare quelque chose vite.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe fɛ̃ a.lɔʁ ʒə pʁe.paʁ kɛlk ʃoz vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay fehn ah-lor zhuh pray-par kelk shoz veet
Sentence_Translation: I’m hungry so I quickly make something.

Sentence: J'ai soif donc je bois un grand verre.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe swaf dɔ̃k ʒə bwa œ̃ ɡʁɑ̃ vɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay swaf donk zhuh bwah uhn grahn vair
Sentence_Translation: I’m thirsty so I drink a big glass.

Sentence: Je fais une pause courte puis je reprends.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ yn poz kuʁt pɥi ʒə ʁə.pʁɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh een pohz koort pwee zhuh ruh-prahn
Sentence_Translation: I take a short break then I resume.

Sentence: J'ai besoin de repos mais je continue quand même.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe bə.zwɛ̃ də ʁə.po mɛ ʒə kɔ̃.ti.ny kɑ̃ mɛm/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay buh-zwehn duh ruh-poh meh zhuh kon-tee-new kahn mem
Sentence_Translation: I need rest but I carry on anyway.

Sentence: Après le travail je prends du repos tranquille.
Sentence_IPA: /a.pʁɛ lə tʁa.vaj ʒə pʁɑ̃ dy ʁə.po tʁɑ̃.kil/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah-preh luh trah-vye zhuh prahn dew ruh-poh trahn-keel
Sentence_Translation: After work I take some quiet rest.

Sentence: J'ai une douleur au dos depuis hier soir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe yn du.lœʁ o do də.pɥi jɛʁ swaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay een doo-lur oh doh duh-pwee yehr swar
Sentence_Translation: I have back pain since last night.

Sentence: Il a de la fièvre et il reste au lit.
Sentence_IPA: /il a də la fjɛvʁ e il ʁɛst o li/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: eel ah duh lah fyev-ruh ay eel rest oh lee
Sentence_Translation: He has a fever and stays in bed.

Sentence: J'ai une toux sèche donc je bois chaud.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe yn tus sɛʃ dɔ̃k ʒə bwa ʃo/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay een tooss sesh donk zhuh bwah shoh
Sentence_Translation: I have a dry cough so I drink something hot.

Sentence: Le stress monte vite mais je respire doucement.
Sentence_IPA: /lə stʁɛs mɔ̃t vit mɛ ʒə ʁɛs.piʁ dus.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh stress mont veet meh zhuh res-peer doos-mahn
Sentence_Translation: Stress rises quickly but I breathe slowly.

Sentence: Le calme revient quand je marche seul dehors.
Sentence_IPA: /lə kalm ʁə.vjɛ̃ kɑ̃ ʒə maʁʃ sœl də.ɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh kahlm ruh-vyehn kahn zhuh marsh suhl duh-or
Sentence_Translation: Calm returns when I walk alone outside.

Sentence: Je fais une promenade calme après le déjeuner.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛ yn pʁɔ.mə.nad kalm a.pʁɛ lə de.ʒø.ne/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh feh een proh-muh-nahd kahlm ah-preh luh day-zhuh-nay
Sentence_Translation: I go for a calm walk after lunch.

Sentence: Je vais au parc pour prendre l'air frais.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vɛ o paʁk puʁ pʁɑ̃dʁ laʁ fʁɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh veh oh park poor prahn-druh lair freh
Sentence_Translation: I go to the park to get some fresh air.
Elision_Note: à + le -> au; le + air -> l'

Sentence: Dans la forêt je marche sans parler longtemps.
Sentence_IPA: /dɑ̃ la fɔ.ʁɛ ʒə maʁʃ sɑ̃ paʁ.le lɔ̃.tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: dahn lah foh-reh zhuh marsh sahn par-lay lon-tahn
Sentence_Translation: In the forest I walk without speaking for a while.

Sentence: Un arbre tombe et bloque le chemin après l'orage.
Sentence_IPA: /œ̃ naʁbʁ tɔ̃b e blɔk lə ʃə.mɛ̃ a.pʁɛ lɔ.ʁaʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: uhn narbr tomb ay blok luh shuh-mehn ah-preh loh-razh
Sentence_Translation: A tree falls and blocks the path after the storm.
Elision_Note: un + arbre (liaison n); le + orage -> l'

Sentence: Je prends ce chemin car il est plus court.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pʁɑ̃ sə ʃə.mɛ̃ kaʁ il ɛ ply kuʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh prahn suh shuh-mehn kar eel eh plew koor
Sentence_Translation: I take this route because it’s shorter.

Sentence: Je regarde la carte et je note une adresse.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁə.ɡaʁd la kaʁt e ʒə nɔt yn a.dʁɛs/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ruh-gard lah kart ay zhuh not een ah-dress
Sentence_Translation: I look at the map and note an address.

Sentence: Je cherche l'adresse exacte avant de sortir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʃɛʁʃ la.dʁɛs ɛɡ.zakt a.vɑ̃ də sɔʁ.tiʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh shairsh lah-dress egz-akt ah-vahn duh sor-teer
Sentence_Translation: I look up the exact address before going out.

Sentence: Le numéro est faux donc je recommence la recherche.
Sentence_IPA: /lə ny.me.ʁo ɛ fo dɔ̃k ʒə ʁə.kɔ.mɑ̃s la ʁə.ʃɛʁʃ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh new-may-roh eh foh donk zhuh ruh-koh-mahnss lah ruh-shairsh
Sentence_Translation: The number is wrong so I start the search again.

Sentence: Je note ton nom pour ne pas oublier.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə nɔt tɔ̃ nɔ̃ puʁ nə pa u.bli.je/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh not tohn nohn poor nuh pah oo-blee-yay
Sentence_Translation: I write down your name so I don’t forget.

Sentence: Ton prénom est joli et je le prononce bien.
Sentence_IPA: /tɔ̃ pʁe.nɔ̃ ɛ ʒɔ.li e ʒə lə pʁɔ.nɔ̃s bjɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: tohn pray-non eh zho-lee ay zhuh luh proh-nons byehn
Sentence_Translation: Your first name is nice and I pronounce it well.

Sentence: Je t'envoie l'adresse mail dès que possible.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tɑ̃.vwa la.dʁɛs mɛl dɛ kə pɔ.sibl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh tahn-vwah lah-dress mel dess kuh poss-ee-bl
Sentence_Translation: I’ll send you the email address as soon as possible.

Sentence: Je remplis le formulaire et je signe à la fin.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁɑ̃.pli lə fɔʁ.my.lɛʁ e ʒə siɲ a la fɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh rahn-plee luh for-mew-lair ay zhuh seen(y) ah lah fehn
Sentence_Translation: I fill in the form and sign at the end.

Sentence: Ma signature est simple et je la fais vite.
Sentence_IPA: /ma siɲa.tyʁ ɛ sɛ̃pl e ʒə la fɛ vit/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah seen-yah-tewr eh sehnpl ay zhuh lah feh veet
Sentence_Translation: My signature is simple and I do it quickly.

Sentence: Je range le document dans un dossier clair.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁɑ̃ʒ lə dɔ.ky.mɑ̃ dɑ̃z œ̃ dɔ.sje klɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh rahnzh luh dok-ew-mahn dahnz uhn dos-syay klair
Sentence_Translation: I file the document in a clear folder.

Sentence: Le dossier est complet mais il manque une page.
Sentence_IPA: /lə dɔ.sje ɛ kɔ̃.plɛ mɛ zil mɑ̃k yn paʒ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh dos-syay eh kon-pleh meh zeel mahnk een pazh
Sentence_Translation: The file is complete but one page is missing.

Sentence: Je trouve une photo ancienne dans une boîte.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tʁuv yn fo.to ɑ̃.sjɛn dɑ̃z yn bwat/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh troov een foh-toh ahn-syen dahnz een bwat
Sentence_Translation: I find an old photo in a box.

Sentence: Je ferme la boîte et je la mets au placard.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə fɛʁm la bwat e ʒə la mɛt o pla.kaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh fairm lah bwat ay zhuh lah met oh plah-kar
Sentence_Translation: I close the box and put it in the cupboard.

Sentence: Le placard est plein donc je trie mes affaires.
Sentence_IPA: /lə pla.kaʁ ɛ plɛ̃ dɔ̃k ʒə tʁi me za.fɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: luh plah-kar eh plehn donk zhuh tree may zah-fair
Sentence_Translation: The cupboard is full so I sort my things.

Sentence: J'ai une affaire urgente et je dois sortir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒe yn a.fɛʁ yʁ.ʒɑ̃t e ʒə dwa sɔʁ.tiʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhay een ah-fair oor-zhahnt ay zhuh dwah sor-teer
Sentence_Translation: I have an urgent matter and must go out.

Sentence: Je perds la clé puis je la retrouve dehors.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə pɛʁ la kle pɥi ʒə la ʁə.tʁuv də.ɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh pair lah klay pwee zhuh lah ruh-troov duh-or
