Sentence_Translation: Actually, I changed my mind.

Sentence: Par contre, je suis d'accord.
Sentence_IPA: /paʁ kɔ̃tʁ ʒə sɥi da.kɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: par kontr zhuh swee dah-KOR
Sentence_Translation: However, I agree.

Sentence: Donc, on continue.
Sentence_IPA: /dɔ̃k ɔ̃ kɔ̃.ti.nɥ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: donk on kon-tee-NYU
Sentence_Translation: So, we continue.

Sentence: Ainsi, tout devient plus simple.
Sentence_IPA: /ɛ̃.si tu də.vjɛ̃ ply sɛ̃pl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: an-SEE too duh-vyan plu sanpl
Sentence_Translation: Thus, everything becomes simpler.

Sentence: Alors, qu'est-ce qu'on fait ?
Sentence_IPA: /a.lɔʁ kɛs kɔ̃ fɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah-LOR kess kon feh
Sentence_Translation: So, what do we do?
Sentence_Breakdown: Alors|so;qu'est-ce qu'on fait|what do we do

Sentence: Sinon, on annule.
Sentence_IPA: /si.nɔ̃ ɔ̃ a.nyl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: see-NON on ah-nyul
Sentence_Translation: Otherwise, we cancel.

Sentence: Je travaille pendant une heure.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə tʁa.vaj pɑ̃.dɑ̃ yn œʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh trah-vy pon-DAN oon ur
Sentence_Translation: I work for an hour.

Sentence: J'attends depuis midi.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒa.tɑ̃ də.pɥi mi.di/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhah-tan duh-PWEE mee-DEE
Sentence_Translation: I’ve been waiting since noon.

Sentence: Je reste jusqu'à lundi.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁɛst ʒys.ka lœ̃.di/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh rest zhus-KAH lun-DEE
Sentence_Translation: I’m staying until Monday.

Sentence: Appelle-moi avant de partir.
Sentence_IPA: /a.pɛl mwa a.vɑ̃ də paʁ.tiʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah-pell mwah ah-VAN duh par-TEER
Sentence_Translation: Call me before you leave.

Sentence: On en parle après.
Sentence_IPA: /ɔ̃ n‿ɑ̃ paʁl a.pʁɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: on non parl ah-PREH
Sentence_Translation: We’ll talk about it afterwards.

Sentence: Avant de sortir, je vérifie la porte.
Sentence_IPA: /a.vɑ̃ də sɔʁ.tiʁ ʒə ve.ʁi.fi la pɔʁt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah-VAN duh sor-TEER zhuh vay-ree-fee lah port
Sentence_Translation: Before going out, I check the door.
Sentence_Breakdown: Avant de sortir|before going out;je vérifie|I check;la porte|the door

Sentence: Après avoir mangé, je sors.
Sentence_IPA: /a.pʁɛ a.vwaʁ mɑ̃.ʒe ʒə sɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah-PREH ah-vwar mon-ZHAY zhuh sor
Sentence_Translation: After eating, I go out.
Sentence_Breakdown: Après avoir mangé|after eating;je sors|I go out

Sentence: Pars avant que ça ne commence.
Sentence_IPA: /paʁ a.vɑ̃ kə sa nə kɔ.mɑ̃s/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: par ah-VAN kuh sah nu koh-MANS
Sentence_Translation: Leave before it starts.

Sentence: On a parlé après que tu es parti.
Sentence_IPA: /ɔ̃ n‿a paʁ.le a.pʁɛ kə ty e paʁ.ti/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: on nah parl-AY ah-PREH kuh tyu ay par-TEE
Sentence_Translation: We talked after you left.
Sentence_Breakdown: On|we;a parlé|spoke;après que|after;tu es parti|you left

Sentence: Je reste parce que je dois finir.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁɛst paʁs kə ʒə dwa fi.niʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh rest pars kuh zhuh dwah fee-NEER
Sentence_Translation: I’m staying because I have to finish.
Sentence_Breakdown: Je reste|I stay;parce que|because;je dois finir|I must finish

Sentence: Puisque tu es là, aide-moi.
Sentence_IPA: /pɥis.kə ty e la ɛd mwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: pwee-sk tyu ay lah ed mwah
Sentence_Translation: Since you’re here, help me.

Sentence: Comme d'habitude, je pars tôt.
Sentence_IPA: /kɔm da.bi.tyd ʒə paʁ to/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: kom dah-bee-tyud zhuh par toh
Sentence_Translation: As usual, I leave early.

Sentence: Si tu veux, on peut attendre.
Sentence_IPA: /si ty vø ɔ̃ pø a.tɑ̃dʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: see tyu vuh on puh ah-tandr
Sentence_Translation: If you want, we can wait.
Sentence_Breakdown: Si|if;tu veux|you want;on peut attendre|we can wait

Sentence: Même si c'est tard, j'y vais.
Sentence_IPA: /mɛm si s‿ɛ taʁ ʒi vɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mem see set tar zhee veh
Sentence_Translation: Even if it’s late, I’m going.
Sentence_Breakdown: Même si|even if;c'est tard|it’s late;j'y vais|I’m going

Sentence: Tout est prêt, sauf le dessert.
Sentence_IPA: /tu t‿ɛ pʁɛ sof lə de.sɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: too tay preh sof luh day-SAIR
Sentence_Translation: Everything is ready, except the dessert.

Sentence: Je viens, sauf si je travaille.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vjɛ̃ sof si ʒə tʁa.vaj/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh vyan sof see zhuh trah-vy
Sentence_Translation: I’ll come unless I’m working.
Sentence_Breakdown: Je viens|I come;sauf si|unless;je travaille|I work

Sentence: On est en retard à cause du trafic.
Sentence_IPA: /ɔ̃ n‿ɛ ɑ̃ ʁə.taʁ a koz dy tʁa.fik/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: on nay an ruh-TAR ah kohz du trah-FEEK
Sentence_Translation: We’re late because of the traffic.
Sentence_Breakdown: On|we;est en retard|are late;à cause du trafic|because of the traffic

Sentence: Grâce à toi, c'est réglé.
Sentence_IPA: /gʁas a twa s‿ɛ ʁe.gle/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: gras ah twah set ray-GLAY
Sentence_Translation: Thanks to you, it’s sorted.
Sentence_Breakdown: Grâce à toi|thanks to you;c'est réglé|it’s sorted

Sentence: Malgré la pluie, on sort.
Sentence_IPA: /mal.gʁe la plɥi ɔ̃ sɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mal-GRAY lah plwee on sor
Sentence_Translation: Despite the rain, we’re going out.
Sentence_Breakdown: Malgré la pluie|despite the rain;on sort|we go out

Sentence: Je bois mon café sans sucre.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə bwa mɔ̃ ka.fe sɑ̃ sykʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh bwah mon kah-FAY san syukr
Sentence_Translation: I drink my coffee without sugar.
Sentence_Breakdown: Je bois|I drink;mon café|my coffee;sans sucre|without sugar

Sentence: Je viens avec toi.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vjɛ̃ a.vɛk twa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh vyan ah-vek twah
Sentence_Translation: I’m coming with you.

Sentence: Je suis contre cette idée.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə sɥi kɔ̃tʁ sɛt i.de/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh swee kontr set ee-DAY
Sentence_Translation: I’m against that idea.

Sentence: Je suis pour cette option.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə sɥi puʁ sɛt ɔp.sjɔ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh swee poor set op-syon
Sentence_Translation: I’m in favour of this option.

Sentence: C'est entre toi et moi.
Sentence_IPA: /s‿ɛ ɑ̃tʁ twa e mwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: set antr twah ay mwah
Sentence_Translation: It’s between you and me.
Sentence_Breakdown: C'est|it is;entre toi et moi|between you and me

Sentence: Parmi eux, il y a un expert.
Sentence_IPA: /paʁ.mi ø il j‿a ɛ̃n ɛk.spɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: par-MEE uh eel yah an eks-PAIR
Sentence_Translation: Among them, there’s an expert.
Sentence_Breakdown: Parmi eux|among them;il y a|there is;un expert|an expert

Sentence: Selon lui, c'est impossible.
Sentence_IPA: /sə.lɔ̃ lɥi s‿ɛ ɛ̃.pɔ.si.bl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: suh-LON lwee set an-poh-SEE-bl
Sentence_Translation: According to him, it’s impossible.
Sentence_Breakdown: Selon lui|according to him;c'est impossible|it’s impossible

Sentence: D'après les chiffres, ça baisse.
Sentence_IPA: /da.pʁɛ le ʃifʁ sa bɛs/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: dah-PREH lay sheefr sah bess
Sentence_Translation: According to the figures, it’s falling.
Sentence_Breakdown: D'après|according to;les chiffres|the figures;ça baisse|it drops

Sentence: Au lieu de répondre, il ignore.
Sentence_IPA: /o ljø də ʁe.pɔ̃dʁ il i.ɡnɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: oh lyuh duh ray-POND-r eel ee-NYOR
Sentence_Translation: Instead of replying, he ignores it.
Sentence_Breakdown: Au lieu de|instead of;répondre|replying;il ignore|he ignores

Sentence: Plutôt que d'attendre, on part.
Sentence_IPA: /ply.to kə da.tɑ̃dʁ ɔ̃ paʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: plu-TOH kuh dah-tandr on par
Sentence_Translation: Rather than wait, we leave.

Sentence: Je viens afin de t'aider.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə vjɛ̃ a.fɛ̃ də t‿e.de/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh vyan ah-fan duh tay-DAY
Sentence_Translation: I’m coming in order to help you.
Sentence_Breakdown: Je viens|I come;afin de t'aider|to help you

Sentence: Je répète pour que tu comprennes.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁe.pɛt puʁ kə ty kɔ̃.pʁɛn/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ray-PET poor kuh tyu kon-PREN
Sentence_Translation: I repeat so that you understand.
Sentence_Breakdown: Je répète|I repeat;pour que|so that;tu comprennes|you understand

Sentence: Je parle doucement afin que ce soit clair.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə paʁl du.sə.mɑ̃ a.fɛ̃ kə sə swa klɛʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh parl doo-suh-man ah-fan kuh suh swah klair
Sentence_Translation: I speak softly so that it’s clear.
Sentence_Breakdown: Je parle doucement|I speak softly;afin que|so that;ce soit clair|it’s clear

Sentence: Dès que j'arrive, je t'appelle.
Sentence_IPA: /dɛ kə ʒa.ʁiv ʒə ta.pɛl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: dess kuh zhar-eev zhuh tah-pell
Sentence_Translation: As soon as I arrive, I call you.
Sentence_Breakdown: Dès que|as soon as;j'arrive|I arrive;je t'appelle|I call you

Sentence: Quand tu peux, réponds-moi.
Sentence_IPA: /kɑ̃ ty pø ʁe.pɔ̃ mwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: kon tyu puh ray-PON mwah
Sentence_Translation: When you can, reply to me.

Sentence: Lorsque tu es prêt, on part.
Sentence_IPA: /lɔʁs.kə ty e pʁɛ ɔ̃ paʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: lorsk tyu ay preh on par
Sentence_Translation: When you’re ready, we leave.
Sentence_Breakdown: Lorsque|when;tu es prêt|you’re ready;on part|we leave

Sentence: Tant que ça marche, on continue.
Sentence_IPA: /tɑ̃ kə sa maʁʃ ɔ̃ kɔ̃.ti.nɥ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: tan kuh sah marsh on kon-tee-NYU
Sentence_Translation: As long as it works, we continue.
Sentence_Breakdown: Tant que|as long as;ça marche|it works;on continue|we continue

Sentence: Attends jusqu'à ce que je revienne.
Sentence_IPA: /a.tɑ̃ ʒys.ka sə kə ʒə ʁə.vjɛn/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah-tan zhus-KAH suh kuh zhuh ruh-vyen
Sentence_Translation: Wait until I come back.
Sentence_Breakdown: Attends|wait;jusqu'à ce que|until;je revienne|I come back

Sentence: Dès demain, on commence.
Sentence_IPA: /dɛ də.mɛ̃ ɔ̃ kɔ.mɑ̃s/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: dess duh-MAN on koh-MANS
Sentence_Translation: From tomorrow, we start.

Sentence: Ça prend environ dix minutes.
Sentence_IPA: /sa pʁɑ̃ ɑ̃.vi.ʁɔ̃ diz mi.nyt/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: sah pran on-vee-RON deez mee-NUT
Sentence_Translation: It takes about ten minutes.

Sentence: C'est exactement ça.
Sentence_IPA: /s‿ɛ ɛg.zak.tə.mɑ̃ sa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: set eg-zakt-uh-MAN sah
Sentence_Translation: That’s exactly it.

Sentence: Approximativement, on a fini.
Sentence_IPA: /a.pʁɔk.si.ma.ti.və.mɑ̃ ɔ̃ n‿a fi.ni/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ah-prok-see-ma-teev-MAN on nah fee-NEE
Sentence_Translation: Roughly, we’re done.

Sentence: En général, ça fonctionne.
Sentence_IPA: /ɑ̃ ʒe.ne.ʁal sa fɔ̃k.sjɔn/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: on zhay-nay-RAL sah fonk-syon
Sentence_Translation: In general, it works.

Sentence: En particulier, ce point est crucial.
Sentence_IPA: /ɑ̃ paʁ.ti.ky.lje sə pwɛ̃t ɛ kʁy.sjal/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: on par-tee-kyu-lyay suh pwan-t ay kryu-SYAL
Sentence_Translation: In particular, this point is crucial.
Sentence_Breakdown: En particulier|in particular;ce point|this point;est crucial|is crucial

Sentence: Notamment le week-end.
Sentence_IPA: /nɔ.ta.mɑ̃ lə wi.kɛnd/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: noh-tah-MAN luh wee-kend
Sentence_Translation: Especially at the weekend.

Sentence: Principalement le matin.
Sentence_IPA: /pʁɛ̃.si.pa.lə.mɑ̃ lə ma.tɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: pran-see-pah-luh-MAN luh mah-TAN
Sentence_Translation: Mainly in the morning.

Sentence: Je le dis simplement.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə lə di sɛ̃.plə.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh luh dee san-pluh-MAN
Sentence_Translation: I’m simply saying it.

Sentence: Explique-le clairement.
Sentence_IPA: /ɛk.splik lə klɛ.ʁə.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: eks-pleek luh klair-uh-MAN
Sentence_Translation: Explain it clearly.

Sentence: Fais-le rapidement.
Sentence_IPA: /fɛ lə ʁa.pi.də.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: feh luh rah-pee-duh-MAN
Sentence_Translation: Do it quickly.

Sentence: Va lentement.
Sentence_IPA: /va lɑ̃.tə.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: vah lan-tuh-MAN
Sentence_Translation: Go slowly.

Sentence: Ça s'oublie facilement.
Sentence_IPA: /sa su.bli fa.si.lə.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: sah soo-BLEE fah-see-luh-MAN
Sentence_Translation: It’s easily forgotten.

Sentence: Ça se répare difficilement.
Sentence_IPA: /sa sə ʁe.paʁ di.fi.si.lə.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: sah suh ray-par dee-fee-see-luh-MAN
Sentence_Translation: It’s hard to repair.

Sentence: Finalement, on a réussi.
Sentence_IPA: /fi.na.lə.mɑ̃ ɔ̃ n‿a ʁe.y.si/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: fee-nah-luh-MAN on nah ray-yu-SEE
Sentence_Translation: In the end, we succeeded.
Sentence_Breakdown: Finalement|in the end;on a réussi|we succeeded

Sentence: Normalement, ça suffit.
Sentence_IPA: /nɔʁ.ma.lə.mɑ̃ sa sy.fi/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: nor-ma-luh-MAN sah syu-FEE
Sentence_Translation: Normally, that’s enough.

Sentence: Justement, je voulais te dire ça.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒys.tə.mɑ̃ ʒə vu.lɛ tə diʁ sa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhus-tuh-MAN zhuh voo-LEH tuh deer sah
Sentence_Translation: Precisely, that’s what I wanted to tell you.
Sentence_Breakdown: Justement|precisely;je voulais|I wanted;te dire|to tell you;ça|that

Sentence: Heureusement, on a le temps.
Sentence_IPA: /œ.ʁøz.mɑ̃ ɔ̃ n‿a lə tɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: uh-ruz-MAN on nah luh tan
Sentence_Translation: Fortunately, we have time.

Sentence: Malheureusement, c'est fermé.
Sentence_IPA: /ma.lœ.ʁøz.mɑ̃ s‿ɛ fɛʁ.me/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: mah-luh-ruz-MAN set fair-MAY
Sentence_Translation: Unfortunately, it’s closed.

Sentence: Franchement, je n'y crois pas.
Sentence_IPA: /fʁɑ̃ʃ.mɑ̃ ʒə ni kʁwa pa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: fransh-MAN zhuh nee krwah pah
Sentence_Translation: Frankly, I don’t believe it.
Sentence_Breakdown: Franchement|frankly;je n'y crois pas|I don’t believe it

Sentence: Il va probablement pleuvoir.
Sentence_IPA: /il va pʁɔ.ba.blə.mɑ̃ plø.vwaʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: eel vah proh-bah-bluh-MAN pluh-vwar
Sentence_Translation: It will probably rain.

Sentence: Certainement pas.
Sentence_IPA: /sɛʁ.tɛn.mɑ̃ pa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: sair-ten-MAN pah
Sentence_Translation: Certainly not.

Sentence: Évidemment, ça dépend.
Sentence_IPA: /e.vi.da.mɑ̃ sa de.pɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: ay-vee-dah-MAN sah day-pan
Sentence_Translation: Obviously, it depends.

Sentence: On prend l'autre option, sinon rien.
Sentence_IPA: /ɔ̃ pʁɑ̃ lo.tʁɔp.sjɔ̃ si.nɔ̃ ʁjɛ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: on pran lo-tr'op-syon see-NON ryan
Sentence_Translation: We take the other option, otherwise nothing.

Sentence: En fin de compte, on n'a pas le choix.
Sentence_IPA: /ɑ̃ fɛ̃ də kɔ̃t ɔ̃ n‿a pa lə ʃwa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: on fan duh kont on nah pah luh shwah
Sentence_Translation: When all’s said and done, we don’t have a choice.
Sentence_Breakdown: En fin de compte|in the end;on n'a pas le choix|we don’t have a choice

Sentence: Au départ, je n'étais pas convaincu.
Sentence_IPA: /o de.paʁ ʒə ne.tɛ pa kɔ̃.vɛ̃.ky/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: oh day-PAR zhuh nay-teh pah kon-van-KYU
Sentence_Translation: At first, I wasn’t convinced.
Sentence_Breakdown: Au départ|at first;je n'étais pas|I wasn’t;convaincu|convinced

Sentence: Au début, c'était difficile.
Sentence_IPA: /o de.by se.tɛ di.fi.sil/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: oh day-BYU say-teh dee-fee-SEEL
Sentence_Translation: At the beginning, it was difficult.

Sentence: Ensuite, on verra.
Sentence_IPA: /ɑ̃.sɥit ɔ̃ vɛ.ʁa/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: on-SWEET on vay-rah
Sentence_Translation: Then we’ll see.

Sentence: Puis, on passe à autre chose.
Sentence_IPA: /pɥi ɔ̃ pas a otʁ ʃoz/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: pwee on pass ah otr shohz
Sentence_Translation: Then we move on.
Sentence_Breakdown: Puis|then;on passe|we move;a autre chose|to something else

Sentence: D'abord, on vérifie les faits.
Sentence_IPA: /da.bɔʁ ɔ̃ ve.ʁi.fi le fɛ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: dah-BOR on vay-ree-fee lay feh
Sentence_Translation: First, we check the facts.

Sentence: J'avais déjà essayé auparavant.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒa.vɛ de.ʒa e.sɛ.je o.pa.ʁa.vɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhah-veh day-ZHA ay-say-YAY oh-pah-rah-VAN
Sentence_Translation: I’d already tried beforehand.

Sentence: Désormais, je note tout.
Sentence_IPA: /de.zɔʁ.mɛ ʒə nɔt tu/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: day-zor-MEH zhuh not too
Sentence_Translation: From now on, I write everything down.

Sentence: Dorénavant, on fait plus simple.
Sentence_IPA: /dɔ.ʁe.na.vɑ̃ ɔ̃ fɛ ply sɛ̃pl/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: dor-ay-nah-VAN on feh plu sanpl
Sentence_Translation: From now on, we keep it simpler.
Sentence_Breakdown: Dorénavant|from now on;on fait|we do;plus simple|simpler

Sentence: Je réponds immédiatement.
Sentence_IPA: /ʒə ʁe.pɔ̃ i.me.dja.tə.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: zhuh ray-pon ee-may-dyah-tuh-MAN
Sentence_Translation: I reply immediately.

Sentence: On avance progressivement.
Sentence_IPA: /ɔ̃ na.vɑ̃s pʁɔ.gʁe.si.və.mɑ̃/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: on nah-vans proh-gray-see-vuh-MAN
Sentence_Translation: We move forward gradually.

Sentence: Peu à peu, ça s'améliore.
Sentence_IPA: /pø a pø sa sa.me.ljɔʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: puh ah puh sah sah-may-LYOR
Sentence_Translation: Little by little, it improves.
Sentence_Breakdown: Peu à peu|little by little;ça s'améliore|it improves

Sentence: Tout au long de la journée, je cours.
Sentence_IPA: /tu to lɔ̃ də la ʒuʁ.ne ʒə kuʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: too toh lon duh lah zhoor-NAY zhuh koor
Sentence_Translation: Throughout the day, I’m running about.
Sentence_Breakdown: Tout au long de|throughout;la journée|the day;je cours|I run about

Sentence: Au maximum, ça prend une heure.
Sentence_IPA: /o mak.si.mɔm sa pʁɑ̃ yn œʁ/
Sentence_Eng_Approx: oh mak-see-mom sah pran oon ur
Sentence_Translation: At most, it takes an hour.
Sentence_Breakdown: Au maximum|at most;ça prend|it takes;une heure|an hour

Sentence: Au minimum, il faut prévenir.
Sentence_IPA: /o mi.ni.mɔm il fo pʁe.və.niʁ/
